 तुजविण अन्य त्रिभुवनीं नाहीं कवणा काय देशी ।। मागत्याचा पत्ता नाहीं तूंचि सर्वदेशीं ।।१।।
 दत्तचरणाची साक्ष मी देतों कांहीं न मागें ।। कृपादृष्टीनें दीन दासा पाहीं अनुरागें ।।२।।
 कर्तृत्वाचें असह्य ओझें घेईं तूं मागें ।। निश्चिंतीनें सहज दत्त भजनरंगीं रंगे ।।३।।

नमन करणें निंदकासी ।। शांतीसाधन साधकासी ।।धृ०।।
 मलापहारी निंदकसरिता ।। चित्तशुद्धि दे त्वरिता ।।१।। 
 मोल न घेतां शुद्ध करिती ।। आपण जाती अधोगतीं ।।२।।
 निंदक जन हे गुरू मानुनी ।। दत्त नमन त्या करी दुरूनी ।।३।।

स्वस्थ पडुनी राहीं ।। श्रीगुरुपायीं ।।धृ०।।
 भुक्तिमुक्तिची आस न करीं ।। सर्व चिंता तो वाही ।।१।।
 बालस्वभावें भजतां गुरूसी ।। राखील प्रेमळ आई ।।२।।
 अनिमित्य सोयरा दत्त ।। बुडवी प्रेमडोहीं ।।३।।

सद्गुरूचे चरण पहीले ।। आत्मस्वरूप सहज देखिलें ।।धृ०।। 
 सद्गुरु आत्मा माझा सत्य ।। अंतर बाह्य सर्व मावळलें ।।१।।
 शांतातीत कला सद्गुरूची ।। निजभक्तांसी भजनीं कळे ।।२।।
 दत्तवचनें कृतकृत्य जाहलों ।। नित्य वृत्ति ब्रह्मानंदीं खेळे ।।३।।

गमतीखातर वरिली नोवरी ।। ऊर्ध्वरेता ब्रह्मचारी।।धृ०।।
 शांत सहजचि या संसारीं ।। परमार्थाची नाहीं उजरी ।।१।।
 भोग भोगुनी सदा अभोक्ता ।। विषयीं ब्रह्मानंदलहरी ।।२।।
 आहे नाहीं गिळुनी दत्त ।। खेळे स्वानंदसागरीं ।।३।।

आलों वस्तीसी ।। येथें ।। आलों वस्तीसी ।।धृ०।।
 तीन दिवस राहणे माझें ।। सदा परदेशी ।।१।।
 कोणी नाहीं माझें येथें ।। आहे निराशी ।।२।।
 सहजानंदीं वस्ती माझी ।। दत्तपदवासी ।।३।।

खाउनी उच्छिष्ट सद्गुरूचें ।। मस्त मी झालों ।।धृ०।।
 संसारी जन देखुनी किमपि ।। अंतरीं न भ्यालों ।।१।।
 निदसुऱ्याचें बोलणें शास्त्र ।। ऐकुनी मी हंसलों ।।२।।
 बालावधूत धन्य सद्गुरु ।। दत्तपदीं रमलों ।।३।।

शांति परदेशी जाहली ।। संतजनां शरण आली ।।धृ०।।
 शांति होउनियां दासी ।। गुरुपुत्रचरणवासी ।।१।।
 न मिळे भक्तीसी नोवरा ।। धांवुनी आली भक्तघरा ।।२।।
 मुक्ति सदा ही कुमारी ।। दत्त भोगुनी ब्रह्मचारी ।।३।।

अलक्ष्य आम्ही निरुपम खूण नाहीं आम्हां ।। अवधूतपदीं सदा लोळतों मिळलों परब्रह्मा ।।धृ०।।
 येणें जाणें राहणें टाकुनी वर्ततो सदा ।। भोग्य भोक्ता भोग नाहीं ठाव न भेदा ।।१।। 
 बंध मोक्ष मुळीं नाहीं निवृत्ति धंदा ।। कैवल्यासी पाठ देउनी भोगितों स्वानंदा ।।२।।
 भला भेटला बालावधूत चिंता नाहीं कदा ।। शांतिसागरीं बुडी देउनी दत्तभजन सदा ।।३।।

अखंड शांतिदाता सद्गुरु आजि मज मिळला ।। कल्पित भ्रांति सारुनी सर्व व्यवहारीं खेळला ।।धृ०।।
 सुख दुःख हे धर्म मनाचे पाहुनी हासिन्नला ।। लेप नाहीं या कल्पिताचा बोध नाहीं मळला ।।१।।
 आहे तैंसे आहे सर्व विकार नुदेला ।। सहज खेळ स्वरूपाचा स्वभाव न ढळला ।।२।।
 अवधूतपदीं दत्त रमतो बोधोदय झाला ।। एकानेक भेद गिळुनी स्वरूपीं विसावला ।।३।।

ma.Pad_Language: कां रे गुरुसी शरण न जासी
ma.Lyrics_Language:
कां रे गुरुसी शरण न जासी ।। व्यर्थ दुःख भोगिसी ।।धृ०।।
 सद्गुरु प्रेमळ राखितो तुज ।। व्यर्थ चिंता कां वाहसी ।।१।।
 सद्गुरुबोध श्रवण न करितां ।। रात्रंदिन तळमळसी ।।२।।
 दत्तानुभवसिद्ध पहा हा ।। डुलतो प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।

स्वानंदाचें भोजन करितां ।। तृप्तीनें ढेंकर दिधली ।।धृ०।।
 गुरुशिष्यांची मिठी पडली ।। बोधवार्ता निमली ।।१।।
 आनंदासी नाहीं ठाव ।। तुर्याहि लाजली ।।२।।
 धन्य दत्त हा अवधूताचा ।। धन्य दत्तमाउली ।।३।।

गुरु ठेवील तैसें रहावें ।। कैवल्य-सुख भोगावें ।।धृ०।।
 अनंत स्त्रिया भोगुनी निशिदिनीं ।। ब्रह्मचारी म्हणवावें ।।१।। 
 सर्व जगाची हिंसा करुनी ।। दयाळुत्व मिरवावें ।।२।। 
 दत्तगुरूसी गिळुनी सहज ।। प्रेमें भजनीं नाचावें ।।३।।

सांगूं मी काय नवल जाहलें ।। सर्वांठायीं ब्रह्म दिसलें ।।धृ०।।
 आणिक न दिसे ब्रह्मावांचुनी ।। अंतर्बाह्य तेंचि संचलें ।।१।।
 आपुल्याठायीं आपण विलसें ।। चिद्विलासीं प्रेम प्रगटलें ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरुची कृपा होतां ।। ब्रह्मानंदीं वृत्ति खेळे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Shall I tell You what miracle happened I
Every where Super Soul is seen II Refrain II
Excluding Super Soul nothing else is seen I
Inside out it alone is filled II 1 II
Itself stays in its own place I(1) 
In Chidvilas Love has become apparent II 2 II
On solemnizing of blessings of Preceptor Datt I
Notion plays in pleasure of being Super Soul II 3 II
(1) (2) Super Soul is aloof from everything but still it manifests all entities of Universe. What we see in Chidvilas as living entity, Shiva, Universe is in fact manifestation of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सेव्यसेवक भाव दावुनी ।। स्वानंद स्वानंद भोगितो ।।धृ०।।
 सुखदुःखाची करुनी कल्पना ।। सहजानंद प्रगट करितो ।।१।।
 मिथ्या बंध मोक्ष कल्पुनी ।।शिष्य सद्गुरु आपण होतो ।।२।।
 पराकाष्ठा ही दत्ताची ।। बालमुकुंदपदीं लोळतो ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Demonstrating distinction of Servable and Serving (1) I
Pleasure of Self enjoys Pleasure of Self (2) II Refrain II
Making imagination of Happiness and sorrow I
Unfolds pleasure of effortlessness II 1 II
Imagining false bonding and salvation I
Himself becomes Preceptor and Disciple II 2 II
This is ultimate state of Datt (3) I
Rolls at feet of Balmukund II 3 II
(1) (2) Super Soul itself has created us disciples who pray Super Soul i.e. our own self. With this one that is already store of pleasure enjoys pleasure of being omnipresent Super Soul every where 
(3) Datt is non existent, He is Super Soul only, Experiencing this Datt stays state of being Super Soul that is ultimate

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आहें मी तरी सर्व आहें ।। नाहीं मी तरी सर्व नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 माझे ठायीं जगविलास ।। सहजींसहज दिसतो पाहीं ।।१।।
 मीचि निमाल्या कांही नाहीं ।। द्वैताद्वैत भाव तेही ।।२।।
 जीवनमरण रहित स्वरूप ।। दत्तगुरु हा आपण पाहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
If I am there (1) everything is there I
If I am not there, Everything does not exist II Refrain II
Manifestation of Universe at my place I
Is observed just as it is II 1 II
If I is extinguished nothing is there I
Not even feeling of Duality Non duality (2) II 2 II
Form of Super Soul is without Birth and Death I
Observe! You Yourself are Preceptor Datt II 3 II
(1) Everything exists or not only because of Super Soul 
(2) Every thing is Super Soul Remove self pride and see that only Super Soul exists even duality non duality are imaginations

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ॐ शांति शांति शांति: ।। गुरुबाळपदीं रति ।।धृ०।।
 कांहीं न झालें न आलें ।। सहज ब्रह्मस्थिति ।।१।।
 सर्वांठायीं एकचि विलसे ।। नाहीं द्वैतभीति ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंद सद्गुरु माझा ।। दत्तभजनप्रीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
OM SHANTIH SHANTIH SHANTIH (1) I
Regaling at feet of Preceptor Balavadhut II Refrain II
Nothing did happen nothing did come I
Everything is normal state of Super Soul II 1 II
Every where only one thing dwells(2) I
No fear of Duality II 2 II
Balmukund is my Preceptor I
Pant has affection for His Prayer(3) II 3 II
(1) Super Soul Balavadhut alone exists, No one else is there, thus we do not have fear, doubts, shame We are fully composed
(2) Super Soul
(3) Everything taking place is Prayer of Preceptor Pant has affection for this Prayer

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पुरे फजिती नको संसृति ।। देईं चरणीं भक्ति ।।धृ०।।
 ध्यानीं मूर्ति आनंद चित्तीं ।। वदनीं नामकीर्ति ।।१।।
 नलगे भुक्ति नलगे मुक्ति ।। देईं निश्चिंती ।।२।।
 नलगे संगति नलगे विरति ।। देईं भजनप्रीति ।।३।।
 पुरे अहंकृति पुरे विषयरति ।। पुरे द्वैतभ्रांति ।।४।।
 पुरे तुझा खेळ पुरवीं माझी आळ ।। दत्तभजनीं प्रीति ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Enough of humiliation Let me have No mundane Life I
Give devotion of feet II Refrain II
In contemplation Your Icon, In heart Pleasure I
In mouth Your glory and Name II 1 II
I do not want enjoyment, nor Salvation I
Give me worry free state II 2 II 
I do not want Company, Nor seclusion I
Give me enchantment of Prayer II 3 II
Enough of Self Pride, enough of enchantment of sensual objects I Enough of delusion of Duality(1) II 4 II
Enough of Your game play, fulfill my desires I
Give me enchantment of Prayer of Datt II 5 II
(1) Feeling that I am different from Preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ढकलूं नको द्वारीं पडलों ।। प्रेम देईं मजला ।।धृ०।।
 भक्तवत्सल ब्रीद मिरविशी ।। लाज माझी तुजला ।।१।।
 सर्व टाकुनी शरण मी आलों ।। तूंचि सर्व मजला ।।२।।
 अवधूतप्रेमासाठीं नित्य ।। दत्त सदा भुकेला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have fallen at door , DO not push me away I
Give Love to Me II Refrain II
You flaunt title of Compassionate of Devotees I
Care of my Shame is with You II 1 II
I have surrendered giving up every thing I
For Me You are everything II 2 II
Datt is ever Hungry for I
Love of Avadhut (1) II 3 II
(1) Experience of Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नेणों महिमा तुझा दत्ता ।। अघटित तव लीला ।।धृ०।।
 देउनी वचन सत्य करिसी ।। विस्मय मज जाहला ।।१।।
 प्रमाणासी उरों न देसी ।। आम्नायही लाजला ।।२।।
 भक्ताभिमानी भक्तसखा तूं ।। अनुभव हा ठसला ।।३।।
 भक्ती प्रिय गुरुबालावधूत ।। दत्तासी विकला ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! I do not know Your Greatness I
Your feat is Unprecedented II Refrain II
Giving Vow You make it to be true I
I have Surprize II 1 II
Not allowing Evidence to remain I
Even Vedas shied(1) II 2 II
You are Proud of Devotees,Companion of Devotees I
This experience is imbibed II 3 II
Preceptor Balavadhut is fond of Devotion I
Is sold (2) to Datt ( Pant ) Ii 4 II
(1) Vedas could not explain
(2)Balavadhut and Pant have become one

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सत्यप्रतिज्ञ भक्ताभिमानी ।। सद्गुरुबालमुकुंद ।।धृ०।।
 अमूर्त परी रूप धरूनी ।। तोषवी भक्तवृंद ।।१।।
 जीव शिव जग आपण होउनी ।। खेळतो आनंदकंद ।।२।।
 शुद्धाद्वैत बालावधूत ।। भजनीं दत्त धुंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor Balmukund Champion of Devotees I
Makes his Vows true II Refrain II
Being formless holds human form I
Satiates groups of Devotees II 1 II
Being himself Living entity, Shiv, Universe I
The source of pleasure dwells II 2 II
In prayer of this Pure Non dual Balavadhut I
Pant is engrossed II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कासया नरजन्मा येसी ।। गुरु नेणतां व्यर्थचि तूं मरसी ।।धृ०।।
 शरण्य सद्गुरु पाळितो भक्तां ।। संशय मनीं कां घेशी ।।१।।
 योगक्षेमाची वाहतो चिंता ।। पाळितो अहर्निशीं ।।२।।
 भुक्तिमुक्ति देतो दत्त ।। बुडवितो प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why do You take Human Birth I
Not knowing Preceptor You die in vain II Refrain II
Surrenderable Preceptor protects Devotees I
Why do You hold doubts in Mind II 1 II
Takes care of Needs and Welfare I
Protects day and night II 2 II
Datt delivers Enjoyments and Salvation I
Submerges us in juice of Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experience of omnipresent Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पूर्ण बोध झाला ज्यासी ।। भोगी निजशांति ।।धृ०।।
 विषयवासना नाहीं मनीं ।। निर्विषय स्थिति ।।१।।
 सुखदुःखांचें नाहीं भान ।। सदानंद चित्तीं ।।२।।
 जिवन्मुक्ति सहज भोगितो ।। दत्तभजनरति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
One who has received complete knowledge of Self I
Enjoys True Peace II Refrain II
No desires of Sensual objects in Mind I
State of absence of Sensual Objects II 1 II
No awareness of Happiness Sorrow I
At Heart Always Pleasure II 2 II
Enjoys Salvation while living effortlessly I
Regalement in Prayer of Datt II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझा मीचि बाधक साधक ।। मजला मीचि शांतिदायक ।।धृ०।।
 बंधनकर्ता माझा मीचि ।। मोक्षदाता माझा मीचि ।।१।।
 शिष्य सद्गुरु माझा मीचि ।। बोधक बोध्य माझा मीचि ।।२।।
 विश्वब्रह्म माझा मीचि ।। दत्तावधूत माझा मीचि ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I only am facilitator, obstructing one I
To me I only am deliverer of Peace II Refrain II
One binding me is I myself I
I am the Teacher and I am the one taught II 2 II
Super Soul of Universe is I Myself I
I myself am Datt and Avadhut II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
चित्सिंधु सद्गुरु साची ।। प्रत्यय कल्लोळ शिष्य मीची ।।धृ०।।
 स्वसंवेद्य खूण प्रगटतां ।। गुरुशिष्य झाले तत्वतां ।।१।।
 निजानुभव सद्गुरूचा ।। तोची निजशिष्य साचा ।।२।।
 अवधूतक्रीडा स्वात्मानंदीं ।। दत्त लोळे सद्गुरुपदीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Ocean of Soul is really Preceptor I
Corroborating Turbulence is I the Disciple II Refrain II
On unfolding of the Self Realized knowledge I
We in principle remained Preceptor and Disciple II 1 II
One Experiencing true experience of Super Soul I
Is the true Disciple II 2 II
Play of Avadhut is in pleasure of realization of Self I
Pant rolls at feet of Preceptor (1) II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
निर्गुण मीचि सगुण मीचि ।। असून सर्व नाहीं मीचि ।।धृ०।।
 कर्मी मीचि अकर्मी मीचि ।। कर्माकर्मातीत मीचि ।।१।।
 अज्ञ मीचि ज्ञानी मीचि ।। ज्ञानाज्ञानातीत मीचि ।।२।।
 बद्ध मीचि मुक्त मीचि ।। दत्तावधूतप्रेम मीचि ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am the one without attributes, I am the one holding attributes I
Being everything I do not exist at all II Refrain II
I am the one performing things I
I am the one who has not tasks I
I am the one beyond Tasks and Tastelessness II 1 II
I am the one ignorant of Soul I
I am the one knowing the Soul I
I am the one beyind Knowledge and Ignorance II 2 II
I am the one bound in cycle of Death and Rebirth I
I am the one emancipate from bond I 
I am the unity of Datt and Avadhut II 3 II 
I am the Super Soul inspiring all actions , beyond all actions
Origimal motivation force of Universe

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सहजसमाधि सहज भोगितों ।। सहजी सहज जगीं खेळतों ।।धृ०।।
 बंधु मेहुणा म्हणती मजला ।। सर्वांसी मी अलिप्त राहतों ।।१।।
 कोणी न माझे कोणाचा न मी ।। एकला आलों एकला राहतों ।।२।।
 आलों नाहीं गेलो नाहीं ।। दत्तप्रेमरसीं सदा खेळतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I enjoy effortlessly Samadhi(1) I
I okay in universe without efforts II Refrain IIThey cakk me Brother Brother in Law, I
I remain aloof to all II 1 II
Nobody is of mine, I am of None I
I have come alone I stay alone II 2 II
I have not come I have not gone I
I always play in Juice of Love of Datt (2)II 3 II
(1) State of absence of notions, Unity with Super Soul
(2)Experiencing Super Soul every wherre

ma.Lyrics_Language: अलक्ष्य स्वरूप माझें पाहीं ।। लक्षण न मजला ।।धृ०।। सच्चिदानंद अर्थवाद ।। वेदही वदला ।।१।। माझें माझें म्हणती मजला ।। खूण न कवणाला ।।२।। प्रगट असुनी गूढ सदा मी ।। दत्त पदीं रमला ।। ३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See my form is beyond Target I
I have no Characteristics II Region II
Even Vedas talked about I
Meaning of Sachhidanand (1) is my Form II 1 II
They call me mine mine I
My true form is not known to anyone II 2 II
I am apparent still always secret I
Pant regales at Feet II 3 II
(1) Super Soul is truth, it is the soul of everyone and it is the knowledge of unity of Super Soul and Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वांठायीं भरुनी सदा ।। कोणा न दिसला ।।धृ०।।
 भूमिभागीं फिरतां कैंसी ।। जाणती खगलीला ।।१।।
 देहाभिमानें पाहूं जातां ।। गुरु नाहीं मिळला ।।२।।
 तनुमनधन अर्पितां चरणीं ।। दत्त गृहीं आला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Ever pervading all places I
is not seen by anyone II Refrain II
Wandering on the earth (1) I
How do they know feat of birds II 1 II
Trying to observe pride of body I
Preceptor is not obtained II 2 II
On surrendering at feet body mind and wealth I
Datt came to Home (2) II 3 II
(1) Faith that I am seperate from Super Soul
(2) Heart of devotee

ma.Lyrics_Language:
खेळत खेळत या संसारीं ।। कैवल्यासी जाऊं ।।धृ०।।
 विधि निषेध नाहीं करुनी ।। सद्गुरुचरण गाऊं ।।१।।
 बंधमोक्षा रजा देउनी ।। स्वस्वरूपीं राहूं ।।२।।
 सदानंद गुरुदत्तस्वरूप ।। पाहुनी न पाहूं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Playing Playing in this Life I
Let us go to state of Salvation II Refrain II
Making doables and non doables non existence I
Let us Sing feet of preceptor II 1 II
Doing away Bonding (1) and Salvation I
let us remain in our own form II 2 II
Ever joyful form of Preceptor I
Let us See but not See (2) II 3 II
(1) Imagination that due to past sins we fall in cycle of Birth and Death and have to seek salvation
(2) Preceptor is Super Soul, when we see Him as Super Soul we do not see Him as Preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नकळे कोणा खूण गुरूची ।। गुढस्थिति गुरूची साची ।।धृ०।।
 असुनी प्रगट जनां न दिसला ।। श्रेष्ठ श्रुतीनें वाखणिला ।। शास्त्रां नकळे खूण त्याची ।।१।।
 तोचि सत्याज्ञानानंद ।। जगचि सर्व सुखाचा कंद ।। कूटस्थ शरीरीं तोचि ।।२।।
 प्रत्ययमात्र विश्व दिसतें ।। द्रष्टादृश्य आपण होतें ।। दत्ता सदा प्रेमरुची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
No one knows Mark of Preceptor I
State of Preceptor is really Mysterious II Refrain II
Being obvious is not seen by People I
Is praised as Superior by Vedas I
His Characteristics are not known to Shastras II 1 II
He Himself is Truth, Knowledge of Truth, and Pleasure of unity of Both I
Universe itself is but source of Pleasure I
He Himself is resident in Body II 2 II
Universe seen is but example of Him I
He becomes the visible and invisible things I
Pant has always affinity for pleasure of being Super Soul II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
परब्रह्म हा सिद्धावधूत ।। भक्तां खेळवितो ।। अवधूत ।।धृ०।।
 हरिहरब्रह्मां वंद्य पुरुष हा ।। मूढा उद्धरितो ।। अवधूत ।।१।।
 कांहीं न होउनी सर्व जाहला ।। अलिप्त राहतो ।। अवधूत ।।२।।
 प्रेमळ माय निजभक्तांची ।। दत्त हृदयीं भरतो ।। अवधूत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Proven Avadhut the Super Soul I
Makes Devotees play I Avadhut II Refrain II
This Human revered by Brahma Vishnu and Shiva I
Emancipates ignorant ones I Avadhut II 1 II
Without being anything manifested everything I
Remains aloof I Avadhut II 2 II
Affectionate Mother of true Devotees I
Fills in heart of Pant I Avadhut II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
होउनी गुरुपुत्र अजुनी कां रे भ्रांति ।। कासयाची खंती करिसी आतां ।।१।।
 कल्पित भवासी भितोसी रे लंडी ।। अभिमान सांडीं गुरुपायीं ।।२।।
 सूर्यागृहीं वस्ती करूनियां सदा ।। अंधारासी मंदा भितोसी कां ।।३।।
 कल्पवृक्षातळीं बैसोनी निशिदीनीं ।। भीक दीनवाणीं मागसी तूं ।।४।।
 पाठीराखा दत्त प्रेमळ असतां ।। कैवल्याची चिंता आतां काय ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Dear! being Child of Preceptor why still have delusion I
What Feeling of distress do you have now II Refrain II
Dear ! You coward fear from imaginary Bhava (1) I
Abandon Self Pride at feet of Preceptor II 1 II
Staying always in house of Sun I
O Dimwit ! Why do you fear from Darkness II 2 II
Sitting beneath Kalpvriksha (2) day and night I
You indulge in Begging pitiably II 3 II
Affectionate Datt ! being Supporter at Back I
Why is worry of Kaivalya (3) Now II 4 II
(1) Cycle o Death and Rebirth
(2) Tree that fulfills all desires 
(3) State of Salvation

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सिद्ध अवधूत ।। अवधूत आत्माराम ।। भक्तां आनंदधाम ।।धृ०।।
 जगीं हा ज्ञानी ।। ज्ञानी तो साचा ।। तेथें मायाभाव कैंचा ।।१।।
 बंधमुक्तीची ।। मुक्तीची नाहीं वार्ता ।। नित्यमुक्त तत्त्वतां ।।२।।
 सहज समाधि ।। समाधि भोगी सदा ।। दत्त सेवी प्रेमानंदा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Avadhut Proven Seer I
Avadhut is Soul inside I
Home of pleasure for Devotees II Refrain II
He is self realized in Universe I
Truly Self realized I
How can there be feeling of Illusion II 1 II
Bonding and Salvation (1) I
No News of Salvation I
Principally ever emancipated II 2 II
Effortless Samadhi (2) I
Samadhi ever enjoys I
Pant enjoys Pleasure of love (3) II 3 II
(1) Imagination that we suffer trips of Death and Rebirth due to past sins when trips end is Salvation
(2) State of absence of notions and unity with Super Soul
(3) Experience of omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरुपुत्र झालों आम्ही ।। रमतों सहज परब्रह्मीं ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेमाची वाहतो चिंता ।। सद्गुरुची माता पिता ।।१।।
 चिंता आम्हां नाहीं कांहीं ।। सद्गुरुपदीं निश्चिंत पाहीं ।।२।।
 गुरु ठेविल तैसें राहूं ।। जगताप सहज साहूं ।।३।।
 वक्रदृष्टींने पाहे न कोणी ।। झाली गुरुभक्तीची शिराणी ।।४।।
 गुरुमाय राखिते सदा ।। सहज भोगूं ब्रह्मानंदा ।।५।।
 मुक्तिललना द्वारीं लोळे ।। निजशांति तिजसवें खेळे ।।६।।
 स्वयंसिद्ध दत्तपायीं ।। मुक्ति शांति मिळती पाहीं ।।७।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
We have become Children of Preceptor I
We regale in Super Soul Effortlessly II Refrain II
Takes care of our needs and welfare I
Preceptor is our Father and Mother II 1 II
We have no worries at all I
Worry free at feet of Preceptor II 2 II
We will remain as Preceptor keeps us I
Bear troubles of people easily II 3 II
No one looks with crooked vision I
Touched peak of Devotion of Preceptor II 4 II
Mother Preceptor always protects I
Shall effortlessly enjoy pleasure of being Super Soul II 5 II
Lady Salvation rolls at door I
True peace accompanies in games II 6 II
At self proven feet of Datt (1) I
Salvation and peace meet each other II 7 II
(1) Having realized that I am the Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पाखंडयांनीं पाठ पुरविली ।। वृत्ति सद्गुरुभजनीं वळली ।।धृ०।।
 काय जाणोनी लागती पाठी ।। जाहलों जनवादहिंपुटी ।।१।।
 नको म्हणतां येती मजकडे ।। सेवुनी आपण होती वांकडे ।।२।।
 निंदकासी देउनी शांति ।। दत्तभजनीं अखंडप्रीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Heterodox follow at Backs I 
Notions turned to Prayer of Preceptor II Refrain II 
Follow our back do not know with what knowledge II 
Giving peace to Criticizers I
Affection fully in Prayer of Datt II 3 II
became gloomy by Comments of People II 1 II 
Come to me in spite of Barring I 
Serving themselves become hostile II 2 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
छळतां छळतां जग हें भागलें ।। म्हणुनी गुरुपदीं राहीं मी उगलें ।।धृ०।।
 निंदारूपें स्तविती मजला ।। हेचि सदा मी भोगीं सोहळे ।।१।।
 वैरी न कोणी जगीं दिसती ।। आप्तइष्ट विश्व सगळें ।।२।।
 दत्तपदीं अखंड रमलों ।। निजप्रेमाब्धि सहज उसळे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Harassing Harassing these people tired I
Therefore I stay silent at Preceptor's Feet II Refrain II
Praise me in the form of Criticism I
I always enjoy these very ceremonies II 1 II
No enemies seem in the world I
Whole Universe is related and Favorable II 2 II
Forever I regaled at Feet of Datt I
Ocean of True Love (1) rises up without reasons II 3 II
(1) Experience that Super Soul is manifested everywhere

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सकळ वैभव सद्गुरुपायीं ।। सहज प्राप्त जाहलें ।।धृ०।।
 ब्रह्मादीक लाळ घोंटिती ।। ऐसें सुख मिळलें ।।१।।
 इहपर भोग तुच्छ वाटती ।। मन राही उगलें ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंदचरणीं दत्त ।। शांतिसुखें खेळे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
All grandeur at feet of Preceptor I
is attained without efforts II Refrain II
Brahma and others generate slava I
Such pleasure is achieved II 1 II
Enjoyments of this life and beyond seem paltry I
Mind remains composed II 2 II
Pant at feet of Balmukund I
plays in pleasure of Peace II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शांति देईं मज शत्रूसी ।। प्रीति देईं मज मित्रासी ।।धृ०।।
 उभय स्वरूपें नांदतो सद्गुरु ।। नित्य हाचि उपदेशी ।।१।।
 इष्टानिष्ट सद्गुरुरूप ।। सर्वांतरवासी ।।२।।
 एकपणेंविण एकचि आत्मा ।। दत्तसमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Give peace to my enemies I
Give Love to my friends II Refrain II
In both forms Preceptor only dwells I
He only Teaches this knowledge II 1 II
Beneficial Detrimental is form of Preceptor I
Residing in inner core of Every one II 2 II
Super is one without oneness I
Pant has become one with it II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language: शांतिदाता सद्गुरु माझा ।। हृदयीं नांदतो ।।धृ०।। तनु मन धन अर्पितां चरणीं ।। भक्तचिंता वाहतो ।।१।। निर्गुण प्रभु भक्तकार्या ।। सगुण रूप धरितो ।।२।। ब्रह्मानंदस्वरूपदत्त ।। प्रेमभरें डुलतो ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
My Preceptor deliverer of Peace I
Dwells in Heart II Refrain II
On surrendering Body, Mind and Wealth at Feet I
Takes care of worries of Devotees II 1 II
Attributeless Lord for Cause of Devotees I
Holds form of Human II 2 II
Pant the form of pleasure of being Super Soul I
Swings filled with Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experiencing that every thing is Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालमुकुंदपायीं पडलों ।। निश्चिंत जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेमाची वाहतो चिंता ।। तद्भजनीं उरलों ।।१।।
 कोठें नसे अहंममता ।। स्वस्वरूपीं भरलों ।।२।।
 दत्त दत्त गुरुदत्त म्हणतां ।। दत्तभजनीं रंगलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I fell at feet of Balmukund I
Became worry free II Refrain II
Takes care of needs and Welfare I
I remained in His Prayer II 1 II
Self Pride exists no where I
I filled in my own Form (1) II 2 II
Saying DATT DATT GURUDATT I
I regaled in Prayer of Datt II 3 II
(1) Form of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्व स्फूरद्रूप पाहीं ।। स्फूर्तिविणें अन्य नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 जगराहटीहि चिद्विलास ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूप तें ही ।।१।।
 श्रुतिशास्त्रांचा नाहीं गलबला ।। अनुभविता नाहीं ।।२।।
 बालावधूत प्रेमळ सद्गुरु ।। दत्त लोळे पायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe ! Everything is form of Inspiration I
Nothing is there excluding Inspiration II Refrain II
Transactions of World is Chidvilas(1) I
That too is form of Super Soul II 1 II
No Hubbub of Vedas and Shastras I
No one is there who experiences II 2 II
Balavadhut is Affectionate Preceptor I
Pant rolls at Feet II 3 II
(1) Every thing that occurs is creation of Chit- Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आमुची आम्हां न कळे खूण ।। जगा आम्ही मूढ जाण ।।धृ०।।
 आमुचे ठायीं आम्ही नाहीं ।। आम्हां आम्ही निर्वाण ।।१।।
 आम्ही तृप्त आम्हांमाजी ।। कोण वांछी विषयकांजी ।।२।।
 गुरुशिष्य आम्हां आम्ही ।। दत्तावधूतपरब्रह्मीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
We do not understand our Identity I
For the World we are ignorant II Refrain II
We are not at our place I
For Us we are the Salvation II 1 II
We are satiated in ourselves I
Who will desire soup of Sensual Pleasures II 2 II
For us we are Preceptor, we are Disciple I
Pant and Avadhut at the Super Soul II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कासया चिंता करिसी ।। शरण जाउनी गुरूसी ।।धृ०।।
 तनु मन धन अर्पण केलें ।। व्यर्थ कां ओझें वाहसी ।।१।।
 योगक्षेमाची चिंता सद्गुरु ।। वाहतो अहर्निशीं ।।२।।
 दत्तस्वानुभव अवधूत पदीं ।। विलसे प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why do You indulge in worrying I
After Surrendering to Preceptor II Refrain II
Body Mind and Wealth is surrendered I
Why bear their burden in futility II 1 II
Preceptor day and night I
Takes care of needs and welfare II 2 II
At feet of Avadhut Datt in experience of self I
Pant manifests in juice of Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experience of omnipresent Super Soul every where

ma.Pad_Language: स्वानुभव सिद्धांत ऐकतां ।। बहिरा मी जाहलों
ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वानुभव सिद्धांत ऐकतां ।। बहिरा मी जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 अरूप रूप नयनीं पाहतां ।। अंध मी गमलों ।।१।।
 अगम्य स्थळीं जाउनी सहज ।। पांगुळ मी जाहलों ।।२।।
 बालावधूतस्वरूप पाहतां ।। दत्तप्रेमें न्हालों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Listening doctrines of Self Experience I
I became Dumb (1) II Refrain II
Observing formless form in eyes I
I felt I am blind (2) II 1 II
Going at unreachable place effortlessly I
I became lame (3) II 2 II
Observing form of Balavadhut I
I bathed in Love of Datt (4) II 3 II
(1) I became Preceptor I did not remain to listen 
(2) I became Preceptor I did not remain to observe, my vision did not remain separate
(3) I lost all awareness of body and became one with Super Soul 
(4) I started experiencing Datt everywhere

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कंठ दाटतो काय मी बोलूं ।। मौन दिसे बरवें ।।धृ०।।
 सर्वब्रह्म मीचि जाहलों ।। कोणि कुणा गावें ।।१।।
 भोग्य भोक्ता भोग मीचि ।। त्रिपुटी न ठावें ।।२।।
 स्वानंदामृतें तृप्त होउनी ।। दत्त भजतों भावें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Throat chokes, what shall I speak |
Silence seems better || Refrain ||
I myself became entire omnipresent Super soul |in
Who shall sing whom || 1 ||
I am the enjoyer, enjoyment and the enjoyable |
Distinction of the three is unknown || 2 ||
Becoming satisfied with nectar of pleasure of self |
I pray Datt with full devotion || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूसी मी गिळिलें ।। मजसी सद्गुरूनें गिळिलें ।।धृ०।।
 स्वानुभवसागरीं गुरू- ।। शिष्यहि बुडाले ।।१।।
 पाहूं जातां कांहीं नाहीं ।। भान मावळलें ।।२।।
 प्रत्ययरूप सद्गुरु माझा ।। विश्वहि जाहलें ।।३।।
 दत्तावधूत भजनीं खेळती ।। जनीं नवल जाहलें ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I swallowed Preceptor |
I was swallowed by Preceptor || Refrain ||
In the ocean of experience of self |
Both Preceptor and Disciple too sank || 1 ||
Trying to observe nothing is seen |
Awareness extinguished || 2 ||
My preceptor is in the form of experience |
And so became Universe too || 3 ||
Datt and Avadhut play in Prayer |
A miracle occurred in World || 4 ||
Everything is Preceptor, creation of Preceptor, Transactions are Preceptors creations, this is a big miracle

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सिद्धावधूत आजि देखियला ।। माझा मीपणा समूळ निवाला ।।धृ०।। 
 शांत स्वरूप गुरूचें पाहतां ।। प्रपंचभाव स्वरूपीं बुडाला ।।१।। 
 प्रारब्धचेष्टा असुनी मावळली ।। अवधूतबोध स्थिरावला ।।२।। 
 खेळ खेळुनी प्रेम दिधलें ।। दत्तभाव समूळ गेला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Today I saw Proven Avadhut |
My self pride was calmed from source 
|| Refrain ||
Observing quiescent form of Preceptor |
Thought of Prapanch (1) mergef in the form (2)|| 1 ||
Mischief of Prarabdh (3) was there but extinguished |
Teaching of Avadhut is stabilized || 2 ||
Delivered Love (4), playing in gameplay |
Thought of Pant(5) totally disappeared || 3 ||
(1) Universe is expansion of Earth, Water, Air, Fire, and Sky
(2) Form of Preceptor
(3) Assumption that fruits of sins are delivered in next birth
(4) Pleasure of experience everything is Me 
(5) Self pride that I am Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वज्ञ मी सर्वसाक्षी मी ।। सर्वाधिष्ठान ।।धृ०।। 
 सर्वींसर्व मीचि होउनी ।। सर्वांहुनी आन ।।१।। 
 आन नव्हें मी ऐक्य स्वरूप।। सहज द्वैतभान ।।२।। 
 भान सांडिलें दत्तगुरुपदीं ।। त्रिपुटीरहित भजन ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Omniscient am I , witness to all am I |
I am the base for everything || Refrain ||
I myself became everything every where |
Still distinct from every one || 1 ||
I am not different I am form of Unity |
Awareness of duality is for no reason || 2 ||
Leaving awareness at feet of Preceptor |
Prayer without performer, listener and Prayer || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भली एक मौज आजि जाहली ।। प्रसन्न दत्तगुरुमाउली ।।धृ०।। 
 जन्मचि नाहीं मृत्यु कैंचा ।। लक्षचौंऱ्यांशी मिथ्या ठरली ।।१।।
 बंधमोक्ष कल्पित कथा ।। जीवन्मुक्ति द्वारीं लोळली ।।२।। 
 बालमुकुंदपदीं दत्त निमाला ।। निजप्रेमाची सुगी जाहली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
One great miracle occurred today |
Mother Preceptor Datt blessed us 
|| Refrain ||
Birth itself is absent how death can be |
Trip of eighty four lakhs (1) was proved false. || 1 ||
Bonding and salvation are imaginary stories |
Salvation while living rolled at door || 2 ||
Datt extinguished at feet of Balmukund |
Harvest of True Love (2) was reaped || 3 ||
(1) Imaginary 84 lakh species through which one passes before getting Human birth - 9 lakh aquatic, 20 lakh trees, 11 lakh insects, 10 lakh birds, 30 lakhs animals 4 lakh human species
(2) Experience of Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूपदीं वृत्ति रंगली ।। अहंवृत्ति गळली ।।धृ०।। 
 ज्ञानाज्ञान शब्दजीवन ।। बंधमोक्षवृत्ति गेली ।।१।। 
 सर्वांठायीं स्वरूप विलसें ।। चिद्विलासीं मात जाहली ।।२।।
 बालावधूत प्रेमळ सद्गुरु ।। दत्तबाळाची माउली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Notions regaled at feet of Preceptor |
Notion of self is dropped out || Refrain ||
Knowledge and ignorance are born of words |
Notion of bonding (1) and salvation disappeared || 1 ||
Super soul manifests in all places |
Story of chidvilas(2) came into existence. || 2 ||
Balavdhut is affectionate preceptor |
The mother of child Datt || 3 ||
(1) Assuming cycle of death and rebirth based on past sins 
(2) Everything is manifestation of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूसी शरण मी गेलों ।। जीवन्मुक्त जाहलों ।।धृ०।। 
 तनु मन धन अर्पिलें चरणीं ।। मीपण उल्लंघिलों ।।१।। 
 बोधादित्य उगवला सहज ।। अज्ञाना विसरलों ।।२।। 
 सर्वीं सर्व मीचि विलसे ।। दत्तभजनीं रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I surrendered to preceptor |
I became emancipated while living. || Refrain ||
I surrendered body, mind wealth at feet |
I surpassed self pride || 1 ||
Sun of teachings has dawned |
I forgot ignorance || 2 ||
I only manifest everything everywhere |
I regaled in prayer of Datt (1) || 3 ||
(1) Everything happening is prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
काय कृपा ही अवधूताची ।। जीवन्मुक्ति भोगितों साची ।।धृ०।।
 साधन शीण नाहीं मजला ।। चिंता केवीं मिथ्या भवाची ।।१।।
 नाहीं जन्म मज मृत्यु कैंचा ।। तत्त्वमसीचा लक्ष्य मीची ।।२।।
 बालावधूत धन्य सदगुरु ।। दत्ता अद्वय भजनरुची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What of this grace of Avadhut |
I truly enjoy salvation while living || Refrain ||
I had no trouble of means of penance |
How can there be worry of false bhava (1) || 1 ||
I did not have birth, how can there be death |
I am the object(2) of TATVAMASI || 2 ||
Balavdhut is great preceptor |
Datt has affinity of non dual prayer(3) || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of Death and rebirth
(2) Tatvamadi means You are That, this that is I the Super Soul
(3) Experience that I am omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Pad_Language: स्वानुभवसिद्धांतखूण ही सांगतों ऐका ।। मोक्षमार्ग हाचि निका
ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वानुभवसिद्धांतखूण ही सांगतों ऐका ।। मोक्षमार्ग हाचि निका ।।धृ०।।
 नाहीं बंध नाहीं मोक्ष ।। नाहीं द्वैतरेखा ।। अवधूताची ही भाका ।।१।।
 मुक्तस्थितीं जग वर्ततें ।। नाहीं मनीं शंका ।। पाहीं अवधूत अकलंका ।।२।।
 आलें नाहीं गेलें नाहीं ।। कैंचा काळधोका ।। कोण धरी यमलेखा ।।३।।
 ज्ञानाचें कवाड उघडलें ।। विश्व अशेखा ।। आत्मरवि शोभे देखा ।।४।।
 आम्ही मुक्त तुम्ही मुक्त ।। बद्धभाव टाका ।। गर्जे दत्तनामडंका ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Listen! I tell you evidence of self experienced Doctrine |
This alone is path of Salvation || Refrain ||
No bonding, No salvation | No line of Duality |
This is promise of Avadhut || 1 ||
Universe runs in state of Salvation |
No doubt in mind | 
Observe the blemishless Avadhut || 2 ||
Nothing comes, Nothing goed | 
How can be danger of Death |
Who cares for Yama(2) || 3 ||
Door of knowledge has opened |
Observe ! Entire Universe is |
Adorned by Super Soul || 4 ||
We are emancipated, You are emancipated |
Leave feeling of Bonding(3) |
Roars Timpani of Name of Datt || 5. ||
(1) We are not bound by cycle of death and birth, since we are Super Soul, we all are in Salvation
(2)Death god
(3) Imagination that due to past sins we get into cycle of Death and Rebirth

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूची अतर्क्य लीला ।। चालत मोक्ष घरीं आला ।।धृ०।। 
 वरदहस्त मस्तकीं पडतां ।। जीवभाव गेला ।।१।। 
 बोधामृतपान करितां ।। संशय जिरला ।।२।। 
 भाव निमग्न सद्गुरुपायीं ।। दत्त प्रेमें धाला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Feat of Preceptor is beyond logic |
Salvation came walking to Home 
|| Refrain ||
On the blessing hand being placed on head |
Feeling of being living entity extinguished 
|| 1 ||
Drinking nectar of teachings |
Doubts (1) disseminated at the spot || 2 ||
Notions submerged at feet of Preceptor |
Pant is filled with Love (2) || 3 ||
(1) Doubt that I am living entity separate from super soul 
(2) Experience of Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरुगारुडी कैसा पाहीं ।। भजतां मीपणा उरी नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 सहज भावें मी शरण गेलों ।। देहभान नुरलें कांहीं ।।१।। 
 वेदागम्य स्थिति ही झाली ।। माझे मजला न कळे कांहीं ।।२।। 
 वाचा निमली बोलूं काय ।। दत्तचि भरला दिशा दाही ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe how preceptor magician is |
On praying self pride does not remain || Refrain ||
I surrendered faithfully without efforts |
Awareness of body did not remain anymore || 1 ||
State unknown to Vedas crystallized* |
My things are not understood by Me || 2 ||
Speech ceased what shall I speak |
Datt alone is filled in ten directions || 3 ||
* State of being Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
तरीच जन्मा यावें ।। दास गुरूचे व्हावें ।।धृ०।। 
 इहपरभोग नश्वर अवघे ।। कासया मना व्हावें ।।१।। 
 झालेंपणाचें कैवल्य नलगे ।। सहजस्थितीनें राहावें ।।२।।
 त्रिपुटी गिळुनी दत्त नांदतो ।। प्रेमें सदा डुलावें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
One shall take birth only if |
He becomes devotee of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Enjoyments of this life or beyond are all transient |
Why should mind have them || 1 ||
Fulfillment of being blessed is not needed |
One shall stay in state of normalcy(1) || 2 ||
Datt dwells swallowing performance, performer and object (2) |
One shall forever undulate in experience of love (3) || 3 ||
(1) Unperturbed by happiness and sorrow, enjoying eternal pleasure .
(2) Super soul alone id performer, performance and object
(3) Experiencing omnipresent Datt everywhere.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्ता तुझें नाम जीवन मला ।।धृ०।।
 भवभय हारक निजसुखदायक ।। अनुभव हा ठसला ।।१।।
 नामामृतपानें अमर जाहलों ।। भवफेरा चुकला ।।२।।
 वेदशास्त्राचें रहस्य नाम ।। भाव हा प्रगटला ।।३।।
 काय कैवल्य नाम कंठीं जरी ।। दत्त नामा भुलला ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt! Your Name is Vital energy for Me II Refrain II
Remover of fear of Bhava(1) Deliverer of True Pleasure I
This experience is imbibed II 1 II
I became immortal drinking nectar of Name I
Cycle of Bhava(1) is missed II 2 II
What is Salvation , If Name is in Throat (2) I
Pant (Datt) is deluded by Name II 3 II
(1) Repeated Trips of death and rebirth due to past sins
(2) While we chant Name of Datt, we do not remain ourselves, We are emancipated Super Soul itself

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मूढमति मी दीनदयाळा ।। हातीं धरीं मजला ।।धृ०।।
 नेणें मी ध्यान नेणे मी ज्ञान ।। नकळे साधन मजला ।।१।।
 अनन्यभावें शरण मी तुज ।। म्हणावीं मज आपुला ।।२।।
 घेईन जन्म परी चरण न सोडीं ।। भक्ति देईं मजला ।।३।।
 भजनानंदें लोळेन द्वारीं ।। टाकुनी मुक्तीला ।।४।।
 आन न मागे ठेवीं हृदयीं ।। दत्तपदकमला ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Compassionate of Humble ones ! I am dimwit I
Hold me by Hand II Refrain II
I do not know Contemplation, I do not know Self Knowledge I
Means of Penance are not known to me II 1 II
I Surrender to You with faith Ananya(1) I
Be instrumental to call me 'Mine' II 2 II
I will take rebirths, but will not leave Feet I
Deliver me Devotion II 3 II
I will roll at door in pleasure of Prayer I
Giving away Salvation (2) II 4 II
I do not ask for anything else I
Keep Lotus Feet(3) of Datt in my Heart II 5 II
(1) Faith that You alone are Savior
(2) Salvation achieved through penance is less important, I am already emancipated, I do not care for it.
(3) Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूनें दिधली मजला स्थिति ।। काय देऊं वाचे हातीं ।।धृ०।। 
 माझें स्वरूपीं मीचि निमलों ।। माझी मजला न कळे गती ।।१।। 
 सगळा डोळा स्वयंप्रकाश ।। द्रष्ट्याची न हाललीं पातीं ।।२।। 
 मजला वर्णितां शब्द लाजला ।। अनुभवितां मावळली स्फूर्ति ।।३।।
 बालावधूत धन्य सद्गुरु ।। अद्वय भजनीं दत्ता शांति ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor delivered me my own state I
What shall I Give Speech to Speak II Refrain II
I myself extinguished in my own form I
I do not know what my fate is II 1 II
Entire Eye becomes Light of Self (1) I
Even eyelid of Observer did not move (2) II 2 II
Words shied in describing Me (3) I
Experiencing inspiration extinguished II 3 II
Balavadhut is great Preceptor I
Datt has pleasure in Non Dual Prayer (4) II 4 II
(1) Entire eye is illuminated with the light of Super Soul 
(2) Without efforts of living entity the light was seen by it.
(3)This my form as Super Soul is beyond description by words
(4)Performer of prayer and object of Prayer became one

ma.Lyrics_Language:
उठली भजनानंदलहरी ।।धृ०।।
 प्रेमसागर उचंबळला देवभक्तां नाहीं उरी ।। देवचि भक्त भक्तचि देव उपचाराची परी ।।१।। 
 देवचि सर्व स्वयंप्रकाश भक्तां नाहीं उरी ।। अंतरीं देव बाहेरी देव भक्ति कोण करी ।।२।। 
 देव दाटला देउळ नाहीं अंतरीं बाहेरी ।। धन्य गुरु हा बालावधूत दत्तहृदयमंदिरीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Wave of Pleasure of Prayer has arisen II Refrain II
Ocean of Love (1) had turbulence, God and Devotee did not remain I
God is devotee,Devotee is God became mere formality II 1 II
God is all light of Self Devotee has no place at all I
God is within God is outside who will do devotion II 2 II
God is filled inside and out Temple itself extinguished,(2) I
Great is this Preceptor Balavadhut, in the Temple of Heart of Datt (Pant) II 3 II
(1) Every where only Super Soul is seen
(2) Place of God itself as well became God

ma.Lyrics_Language:
काय वर्णूं मी अवधूतकृपा ।। कंठ हा दाटतो ।।धृ०।। 
 आपला म्हणवुनी आपुला केला ।। आपणची नटतो ।।१।। 
 माझा मीपणा समूळ गिळुनी ।। चिद्रवि झळकतो ।।२।।
 सहजबोधें सहजसमाधि ।। दत्तभजनीं रमतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What shall I describe blessings of Avadhut I
This throat is choked II Refrain II
Calling 'Mine' converted into His own I
Himself is manifested II 1 II
Swallowing totally My Self pride I
Sun of Soul Shines II 2 II
Normally attained Samadhi (1) through normal teachings I
Pant becomes engrossed in Prayer II 3 II
(1) State of intermingling with Super Soul, Lack of awareness of Surrounding. Lack of notions fully sublimated state

ma.Lyrics_Language:
झाला स्वेच्छाचि विधी ।। स्वैर झाली समाधि ।। धृ०।।
 विषय मीचि विषयी मीचि ।।भोगा न संधि ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मानंदीं विरली वृत्ति ।। नाहीं उपाधि ।।२।।
 दत्तभजनीं मन निमग्न झालें ।। खवळे प्रेमोदधि ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
oluntary actions became Rule I
Wantonness became Samadhi(1) II Refrain II
I am the sensual object, I am the enjoyer I
No opportunity for Enjoyment II 1 II
Notions disappeared in pleasure being Super Soul I
No obligations duties II 2 II
Mind got engrossed in Prayer of Datt I
Sea of Love (2) uproared II 3 II
(1) Notionlessness, absence of awareness of mundane affairs, in trance, experiencing that I am one with Super Soul
(2) Experiencing that I am the Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भलें रें सद्गुरूनें केलें ।। माझें मीपण गिळिलें ।।धृ०।।
 आहे तें सारुनी नाहीं तें दाविलें ।। दाविलेंपण वायां गेलें ।।१।।
 आंधळ्यानें देखिलें ।। बहिऱ्यानें ऐकिलें ।। पांगळ्यानें मेरूशिखर लंघिलें ।।२।।
 आहे तेंचि नाहीं नाहीं तेंचि आहे ।। आहेनाहींपण मिथ्या रे ।।३।।
 देखे तो अंध न देखे डोळस ।। दृश्य द्रष्टा स्वतः झाला रे ।।४।।
 सहज उत्थान सहज समाधि ।। दत्त बाळपदीं रतला रे ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor did blissful thing |
Swallowed my self price || Refrain ||
Removing existent demonstrated non existent |
Demonstration became wasteful (1) || 1 ||
Blind did see, Deaf did hear |
Lame ascended top of Meru(2) || 2 ||
Existing does not exist, Non existent exists(3) |
Existent non existent is falcity || 3 ||
One who sees is blind, Non observer is visionary |
Himself became Sight and observer || 4 ||
Samadhi without efforts, arousing without efforts |
Pant regales at feet of Balavadhut || 5 ||
(1) Distinction of existence was extinguished
(2) Topmost crest in. India
(3) What we feel exists is manifestation of super soul which according to us does not exist.
(4) Coming out from trance of Samadhi

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सिंहबालका हसती जंबुका ।। काय नवल जाहलें ।। विपरीत कार्य कसें घडलें ।।धृ०।।
 महासागरा आग लागली ।। जल हें तान्हेलें ।। सूर्या गडद कसें पडलें ।। १।।
 चंद्र तापला अग्नि निवाला ।। गगन आकुंचिलें ।। वायूसी स्थैर्य प्राप्त जाहलें ।।२।।
 ज्ञानिया चिंता अघटित दत्ता ।। दास तुझे तापले ।। नवल हें वंदीं दत्त पाउलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What a miracle happened l
Wolves laughed at Lion Cubs l
How opposite thing occurred ll Refrain ll
Fire was set to ocean l
Water became thirsty l
How darkness covered Sun ll 1 ll
Moon became hot, Fire cooled down l
Sky is shrinked l
Air got stabilized ll 2 ll
O Datt ! Unprecedented worries for Realized persons l
Your devotees are agitated l
Observing this miracle Pant respects feet of Datt ll 3 ll
A realized persons worrying, crying, like unrealized persons is a miracle

ma.Lyrics_Language:
संगत संताची बरवी ।। अंतरीं भवबाधा नुरवी ।।धृ०।।
 सज्जनसंग पवित्र काशी ।। सत्क्रिया करवी ।।१।।
 जान्हवी वाहे संतचरणीं ।। बहु ताप शमवी ।।२।। 
 मुक्तिदाता सज्जनबोध ।। दत्तस्वरूप दावी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Company of Saints is better I
Does not allow trouble of Bhava(1)to remain inside II Refrain II
Association with virtuous people is pious Benaras(2) I
Makes us perform virtuous actions II 1 II
Ganges(3) flows at feet of Saints I
Calms many torments II 2 II
Teachings of Saints is deliverer of Salvation I
Shows form of Datt (4)
(1) All mundane affairs
(2) Holy city removing effects of all Sins
(3) The Holy RIver Washing all SIns
(4) Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
करूनियां काय घटपट घटपट ।।धृ०।।
 शांति नसे जरी अंतरीं कांहीं ।। व्यर्थ तुझी हि खटपट खटपट ।।१।।
 आपणां नेणतां साधन सर्व ।। करूनी सर्व लटपट लटपट ।।२।।
 मृत्तिका तंतू दत्त जाणतां ।। भिन्न नुरे जग घटपट घटपट ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What use pondering on Pot and Cloth II Refrain II
If there is no inner peace I
This Your effort is futile II 1 II
Not knowing Self I
Performing all means is all scurried performance II 2 II
Knowing that soil(in pot), and filament(in cloth) is Datt I
The universe the Pot and Cloth does not remain different II 3 II
All pots are made from soil filament is base for all cloths.Experiencing this is self knowledge. without this all efforts are futile.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्ता हा स्तवनहार अर्पितों तुला ।। अनुभव सह प्रेमभरें आजि गुंफिला ।।धृ०।।
 त्रिभुवनीं तूं थोर म्हणुनी श्रुतीनें गाईलें ।। गातां गातां अनंत म्हणुनी शास्त्र भागलें ।। जिकडे तिकडे तव स्वरूप सहज संचलें ।। दाता, त्राता, शास्ता, भयहर्ता, सुखकर्ता, चित्सविता, भेट दे मला ।।१।।
 निर्गुण तूं सगुण होसी भक्ततारका ।। अक्रियत्वें करिसी क्रिया विश्वरक्षका ।। दैन्य दुःख हरुनी जनां सौख्यकारका ।। सदया, पाया, ध्याया, दे शक्ति, निजभक्ति, मनशांति, भक्तवत्सला ।।२।।
 सर्वव्यापि कोठें पाहूं ठाव न मला ।। परात्पर स्थिति केवीं गाऊं तूजला ।। चेतोपर रूप ध्यान भाव नूरला ।। अमना, शमना, नमना, चिद्भुवना, भवदमना, गुरुकवना, दत्त शोभला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! I offer this garland of praise to You I
Strung together today with Experience and Love(1) II Refrain II
Vedas have sung that You are great in three worlds (2) I
Shastras tired singing You as Endless Endless I
Everywhere Your form is easily filled I
O Deliverer ! Savior ! i Ruler ! I 
Remover of fear I Creator of Happiness I Sun of Soul I
Give me Your meeting II 1 II
O Savior of Devotees! You are attribute less, but hold Human Form I
O Protector of Universe ! You are non performer(3) but perform actions I
You make people happy removing their miseries and sorrows I
O Kind hearted ! Compassionate of Devotees ! Give Prowess to Contemplate Your Feet I True Devotion,Peace of Mind II 2 II
You are Omnipresent, I do know where to search You I
Your state is Superior to Superior, How Can I Sing You I
Your form is beyond Consciousness, contemplation did not remain I
O Mindless ! I O Alleyer(4) ! I Respectable ! In home of Soul I 
Defeater of Bhava (5)IDatt is adorned in Poem of Preceptor(6) II 3 II 
(1) Observing Super Soul every where 
(2) Earth, Heaven, Hell
(3) You are non performer, but all things are performed by You
(4) Remover of troubles
(5) Cycle of Death and Rebirths
(6) This poem is composed by Preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जाणुनी दत्ता स्थिति माझी ।। काय अंत पाहसी ।।धृ०।।
 सर्वज्ञ तूं सर्वसाक्षी तूं ।। वेड पांघरसी ।।१।
 सूत्रधार तूं बाहुली मी ।। ओझें कां वाहसी ।।२।।
 दत्ता कोण पोषी जरी तूं ।। उपेक्षा करिसी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! Knowing my state I
What test do You take II Refrain II
You know everything You are witness to everything I
You Take cover of ignorance II 1 II
You are the String controller (1), I am the Puppet I
Why do You bear the Burden (2) II 2 II
Who will Nurture Pant I
If You neglect II 3 II
(1) Puppet show played by String controller wherein You control actions of Me the Puppet
(2) I have no separate existence and therefore no burden

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कां रे पदरीं न घेसी ।। निजशांति न देसी ।।धृ०।।
 श्रवण न म्हणों तरी दिशा श्रोत्र ।। धांवा कानीं न घेसी ।।१।।
 न दिसे म्हणों तरी सूर्य नेत्र तुझा ।। दास स्थिति न पहासी ।।२।।
 नेणें म्हणों तरी चिद्विलास तुझा ।। दत्ता न सुखविसी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Dear! Why don't take me in lap l
Why Do not give me True Peace ll Refrain ll
To say You can not hear, All directions are Your ears l
Why You do not take prayers in ears(1) ll 1 ll
To say You can not see, then Sun is Your eye l
Why You do not see state (2) if Devotee ll 2 ll
To say You do not know, Then all things are Your Chidvilas(3) l
Why do You not make Pant happy ll 3 ll
(1) Do not listen my prayer
(2) Distress
(3) Every thing is Creation of Yours- Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालबुद्धि मी तळमळतों ।। बागूलबावा भय दाखवितो ।।धृ०।। 
 प्रेमळ माय तूं जवळी असतां ।। खेळत खेळत व्यर्थ भ्रमतों ।।१।।
 नाहीं स्वातंत्र्य माझें कांहीं ।। नाचविसी तैसा मी नटतों ।।२।।
 आस दुजी नाहीं चरणीं ठेवीं ।। दत्तभजनप्रेम नित्य मागतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have wit of child I agitate I
Bugaboos (1) frighten me II Refrain II
You affectionate mother being near I
I get into delusion while playing in Mundane affairs II 1 II
There is no independence of Mine at all I
I prank as You make me dance II 2 I
INo other desire, keep me at feet i 
I always beg Love(2) of Prayer of Datt II 3 II
(1) Mundane affairs are not real like Bugaboos but do frighten me
(2) All Mundane affairs are Your creations and are Your Prayer

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझा सदयहृदय दत्त ।।धृ०।।
 भक्ताभिमानी भक्तोद्धार ।। भक्तहृदयीं वसत ।।१।।
 भवभयहारक मुक्तिदायक ।। शांत ठेवी चित्त ।।२।।
 भजनप्रीय भक्तमाय ।। सतत स्मरे दत्त ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
My Datt has kind heart || Refrain ||
Champion of Devotees, l
Emancipating Devotees l
Resides in heart of Devotees || 1 ||
Remover of fear of Bhava l
Deliverer of Salvation l
Keeps mind calm || 2 ||
Fond of prayer l
Mother of Devotees l
Is always remembered by Datt (Pant) || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वजीवन सद्गुरुराया रे ।।धृ०।।
 सर्वपोषका सर्वतोषका ।। सर्व नमिती तव पाया रे ।।१।।
 सर्वाधारा सर्वाकारा ।। व्यापक सर्वांठाया रे ।।२।।
 सर्वानंदा चित्सुखकंदा ।। शांतवीं दत्तहृदया रे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Dear ! Preceptor King you are entire living world
|| Refrain ||
O Dear ! Satiater of all Nurturer of All |
All salute at You Feet || 1 ||
O Dear ! Support of All, Manifested in All |
Pervaded in All places || 2 ||
O Dear ! Giving pleasure to All, The source of Happiness of Soul |
Calm the heart of Datt( Pant Maharaj ) || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रणवागम्य स्वरूप तुझें ।। केवीं गाऊं तुजला ।।धृ०।।
 चेतोपर स्थिति तुझी ।। ध्याना ठाव नुरला ।।१।।
 व्याप्यव्यापकरहित अससी ।। ठाव न यात्रेला ।।२।।
 अनंत निर्गुण वैभव तुझें ।। सगुणीं दत्त रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Your form is not understandable by Omkar |
How shall I sing You || Refrain ||
Your state is beyond inspiration |
No scope remained for contemplating || 1 ||
You are excluding Pervader and Pervaded |
No scope for pilgrimage || 2 ||
Your majesty is Endless, without attributes |
Pant regales in Your Human. Form (1) || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मम चित्त-चकोरा-चंद्रा ।। देईं भेटी परमोदारा ।।धृ०।।
 बहुत दिन झाले भेटीसी ।। अजुनी किती तरी दूर राहसी ।। तुजविणें व्यर्थ पसारा ।।१।।
 भक्तवत्सल ब्रीद कां गेलें ।। अवतारकाज कीं सरलें ।। सदा तरूण नव्हेसी म्हातारा ।।२।।
 करुणा येऊं दे आतां तरी ।। दीन दासा घेईं पदरीं ।। पाहीं दत्ता भजनतत्परा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Moon of the Chukar bird (1) of my Heart |
O most Benevolent meet me || Refrain ||
Many days have passed since we met |
Still How many days will you stay away |
Without You the whole expanse is worthless || 1 ||
Has your reputation of being compassionate of Devotees gone |
Or has the purpose of your Incarnation achieved |
You are always Young, never old || 2 ||
Let mercy come to You at least now |
Take humble servant in your lap |
Oh Datt ! Promptly coming on prayer! Take my care 
|| 3 ||
(1) A bird which lives for moonlight

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्त माझा गुरुराजा ।। देखियला डोळेभरी ।।धृ०।।
 हातीं धरूनी एकांतीं नेलें ।। बोधामृत पाजियलें ।। आत्मप्रकाश प्रगटुनी ।। विश्वरूप दाविलें भारी ।।१।।
 करूणासागर उचंबळला ।। पाषाणाचा देव केला।। स्वरूपठाव दाखविला ।। मीपणासी नाहीं उरी ।।२।।
 दयाळु हा गुरुराज ।। शिरीं ठेवी करकंज ।। धरूनी पोटीं दाविलें गुज ।। आत्मशांति दिधली करीं ।।३।।
 मूळघरची वाट दावुनी ।। सद्गुरूसी दाविलें नयनीं ।। अखंड दत्त भेटी देउनी ।। निजानंदी प्रेम भरी ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Datt my Preceptor Lord |
Is observed to fulfillment of eyes || Refrain ||
Took me to secret place holding my hand |
Served me with nectar of Teachings |
Unfolding inner light of my soul |
Demonstrated great Universal form of SuperSoul || 1 ||
Ocean of mercy surged up |
Converted stone (me) into God |
Demonstrating place of form of Soul |
No place remained for Self Pride || 2 ||
This Preceptor Lord is full of Mercy |
Keeps lotus hand on Head |
Revealed secret taking in lap |
Delivered peace of soul in Hand || 3 ||
Showing path of Original Home (1) |
Showed Preceptor before eyes |
Giving permanent unity with Super Soul |
Filled love(2) in True Pleasure of being Supersoul || 4 ||
(1) Super Soul
(2) Experience of being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आला पहा बालावधूत ।। दत्तभजनीं नाचत ।। शिवजंगम शिवजंगम वदत ।। बाळ माझा ।।१।।
 आंगी विभूतीचा पट्टा ।। केशरीनाम ललाट ।। ब्रह्मविणा हातीं सोटा ।। बाळ माझा ।।२।।
 जटाभार शिरावरी ।। दाढी रुळे नाभीवरी ।। दीन बाळांचा कैवारी ।। बाळ माझा ।।३।।
 भगवी कौपीन झळाळी ।। वामकक्षीं दिव्य झोळी ।। धांवुनी आला बाळमेळीं ।। बाळ माझा ।।४।।
 भजनीं उभा ठाकला ।। भक्तें जयजयकार केला ।। प्रेमानंदें असे भरला ।। बाळ माझा ।।५।।
 दुजा नाहीं ब्रह्मानंद ।। हाचि माझा निजछंद ।। भावें भजा आनंदकंद ।। बाळ माझा ।।६।।
 सावध करूनी पुत्राला ।। गर्जुनी सांगे सर्वत्राला ।। म्हणे भक्ति प्रीय मजला ।। बाळ माझा ।।७।।
 दत्तबाळरूप अभिन्न ।। नका धरूं अभिमान ।। देई खूण कृपाघन ।। बाळ माझा ।।८।।
 भेदभाव उडाला ।। भक्तमेळा प्रेमें भिजला ।। दत्तरूपीं अखंड निजला ।। बाळ माझा ।।९।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See Balavdhut has come |
Dancing in prayer of Datt(1) |
Pronouncing " Shiv jangam" " Shiv jangam" |
My Balavadhut || Refrain ||Strips of ashes on body |
Orange tilak on forehead |
Holding in hand Super soul's Veena(2) and stick | My Balavadhut || 1 ||
Burden of matted hair on head |Beard adores upto navel |
Champion of humble devotees | My Balavadhut || 2 ||
Saffron lion cloth glares |Divine Jhola (3) on left limb |
Came running in meeting of children | My Balavadhut || 3 ||
Stood up in Prayer |Devotees acclaimed his Victory |
Is filled with pleasure of Love (4) | My Balavadhut || 4 ||
Brahmanand (5) is not different |This is my permanent hobby |
Prey the source of pleasure with Faith | My Balavadhut || 5 ||
Making the Son aware |Proclaims and tells everyone |
Says Devotion is liked by me | My Balavadhut || 6 ||
Form of Pant and Balavadhut is uniform |Do not hold self pride |
Indicates the secret the store of blessings | My Balavadhut || 7 ||
Feeling of Distinction flew away |Group of devotees was soaked in love |
Slept permanently in form of Super Soul | My Balavadhut || 8 ||
(1) All transactions are prayer of Datt
(2) Harp with single string fixed upon pumpkin fruit 
(3) Loose cotton bag
(4) Experience of super soul every where
(5) Pleasure of (4)

ma.Lyrics_Language:
घोंटवीन लाळ ब्रह्मज्ञान्या हातीं ।। मुक्तां आत्मस्थिति सांडवीन ।।१।।
 गगनाचीं सालें काढूनी टाकीन ।। शून्याचा गाभा निवर्तीन ।।२।।
 विदेहाची मान मोडूनी टाकीन ।। शास्त्राची मुक्ति गाळईन ।।३।।
 मिथ्यादत्तपणा बाळचरणधूळीं ।। कांहीं न होऊन अोवाळीन ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I will make cognitor of Super Soul to slobber(1) |
Make the emancipated leave state of Soul (2)
|| Refrain ||
I will remove skin of sky(3) |
And end the core of Zero (4) || 1 ||
I will break the neck of the one without body(5) |
And filter the Salvation of Shastra (6) || 2 ||
Cognition of being Datt is false, I remain dust at feet of Balavadhut |
I will wave Arti without becoming anything (7) || 3 ||
(1) Cognitor of Super Soul will envy the state of being Super Soul itself
(2) State of emancipation is bellow state of being Super Soul
(3) Being Super soul is becoming much bigger than sky
(4) Super Soul is microer than zero
(5) Loosing awareness of body still leaves pride of being body less which is broken in state of Super Soul
(6) Emancipated had pride of emancipation which to be filtered to reach state of Super Soul
(7) I will loose all awareness, all cognition, and become Super soul itself.where Arti too will not remain .

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरूचा घाला आला ।। भेदभाव समूळ गेला ।१।।
 पंचविसांचा संग तुटला ।। सोळांचाही भंग झाला ।।२।।
 नेणीवेची वाढ खुंटली ।। जाणीवेची वृत्ति सुटली ।।३।।
 तूर्यातीत भाव गेला ।। महाप्रकाशीं प्रणव भरला ।।४।।
 बालमुकुंदसंग घडला ।। निजानंदीं दत्त बुडाला ।।५।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Attack of preceptor has arrived |
Distinction feeling has gone from roots || Refrain ||
Compny of Twenty five ia broken |
Sixteen too have been destroyed || 1 ||
Growth of ignorance has ceased |
Notion of consciousness is freed (2)|| 2 ||
Feeling of being beyond Turya (3) has hone |
In great light Omkar has filled (4) || 3 ||
Company of Balmukund is realized |
Datt is submerged in true peace || 4 || 
(1) eyes, ears, nose, tongue, skin,,hands, feet, generation organ, skin, earth, water, fire, air, sky and their actions
(2) feeling that I know is gone
(3) I have teacher beyond Unmani mindlessness.
(4) every where inside Super soul is seen
(5) Full pleasure of original form of Super soul is against

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गा तुम्ही शिमगा ।। निजहित उमगा ।। प्रणवध्वनी परिसा ।। अखंड ।।धृ०।।
 दहा पांच एक करूनी साधा पौर्णिमा ।। विवेकपव्कान्न सेवुनी धरा निःकामा ।।१।।
 चहुंदेहाच्या चव्हाट्यावरी खुंट उभा करा ।। भावाचा ।। पंचकोशगत कल्पनाशेणी त्वरित गोळा करा ।।२।।
 ज्ञानाग्नी चेतवुनी झडकरी वासना भस्म करा ।। विरति विभूती आंगी चर्चुनी ।। बोधसोटा धरा ।। हातीं ।।३।।
 मिथ्याकल्पनाधूळ उडवित तत्त्वमार्गीं भरा ।। भक्तिपिचकारी हातीं घेउनी प्रेमरंगें मारा ।।४।।
 अहंकार काम जाळुनी आतांचि जीवदशा लोपा ।। तत्त्वमसि महावाक्य बोधें हरा पुण्यपापा ।।५।।
 मायातीत मायाविधुर सदाही पुकारा ।। काळातीत सहज होउनी द्वैतभाव मारा ।।६।।
 अद्वय अमलें धुंद होउनी भवमडकें फोडा ।।
 मनवारूवरी विन्मुख बैसुनी अहंममता सोडा ।।७।।
 वृत्तितळीं निमग्न होउनी समरस सुख पहा ।। ब्रह्मरूपाचें मम जाणुनी निश्चिंत गुरूपदीं रहा ।।८।।
 अवधूतपायीं पुर्ण भरंवसा करीं निर्धारा ।। सद्गुरुनाम गर्जत नित्य दत्तरूपीं भरा ।।९।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
You sing Shimga (1) l Realize true benefit l
Listen Always l Sound of Omkar ll Refrain ll
Accumulating ten and five (2)attain Pournima (3) l
Consuming sweetmeat of Discernment take up to Desireless state ll 1 ll
In square of four bodies erect pole of devotion l
Accumulate immediately cowgung chips of five koshas (4) ll 2 ll
Igniting fire of knowledge quickly convert sensual desires into ashes l
Applying ashes of detachment on body hold in hand stick of teachings ll 3 ll
Blowing up dust of fictitious ideas fill it with path of principles l
Holding hand pump of devotion spray color of love (5) ll 4 ll
Burning self pride and sensual desires end present state of Living entity l
By teaching of Big Statement of TATVMASI Do away with sins and virtuous things ll 5 ll
Always call for the one beyond illusion, free from illusion ,(6)l
Effortlessly becoming superior to time, kill feeling of Duality ll 6 ll
Being intoxicated with influence of non duality, break pot of Bhava (7) l
Sitting reverse on horse of mind, leave pride of self ll 7 ll
Becoming absorbed at bottom of notions, (notionlessness) observe pleasure of being one with soul l
Realizing secret of form of Super soul, stay worry free at feet of Preceptor ll 8 ll
With full faith at feet of Avadhut, make determination l
Proclaiming name of Preceptor, fiil in the form of Datt ll 9 ll
(1) Ceremony of colors where people make sound by beating wrist back on mouth 
(2) Five big powers, Five organs of knowledge, Five organs of actions,and actions of both of them. 
(3) Full moon night 
(4) Outer body created by food, Inner body of Respirations, inner core of Mind intellect etc. , much inner body of knowledge, and body of pleasure.
(5) Experience of being Super Soul present every where
(6) Super soul is creator illusion it is beyond illusion 
(7) Cycle of death and rebirth 
Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
फकीरी गुजर गयीं गुजरान ।।धृ०।।
 कोई दिन सुका कोई दिन भूका ।। कोई दिन बनिया दुकान ।।१।।
 कोई दिन जंगल ।। कोई दिन मेहल ।। कोई दिन गुरुका मकान ।।२।।
 कोई दिन योगी कोई दिन भोगी ।। कोई दिन दत्तनिरंजन ।।३।।

पहा पहा गुरुबालमुकुंद ।। भक्तभजनीं रमतो ।। अवधूत ।।धृ०।।
 भस्मभूषित तनु सुंदर सुकुमार पादुका पदीं लेईतो ।। कौपीन कांसे दंडकमंडलु भक्तकाजा श्रमतो ।।१।।
 भक्तवत्सलब्रीद मिरवितो त्रिभुवनीं भक्तगृहीं वसतो ।। भक्तीचा भुकेला दयाळु प्रभु हा प्रेमभरें डुलतो ।।२।।
 अभेद ज्ञान सहज युक्तीनें निजभक्तां देतो ।। धन्य माय बालमुकुंद म्हणुनी दत्त मौन धरितो ।। ३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Living of Dervish passed ll Refrain ll
Some days dry, Some days Hungry l
Some days shopkeeper at shop ll 1 ll
Some days in forest, Some days in palace l
Some days in Home of Precrptor ll 2 ll
Some days yogin,Some days self indulgent l
Some days in Niranjan(1), with Datt ll 3 ll
(1) Place of Super Soul Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
करूनियां काय करकर करकर ।।धृ०।।
 होईं सावध भज सद्गुरूसी ।। काळ कापी तुज चरचर चरचर ।।१।।
 व्यर्थ अहंता धरूनी मरणा ।। भिसी नित्य थरथर थरथर ।।२।।
 निराभिमानें शरण जाउनी ।। दत्तगुरूसी स्मरस्मर स्मरस्मर ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe! Observe! Preceptor Balmukund l Avadhut l
Regales in Prayers of Devotees ll Refrain ll
Handsome Tender Body adorned with ash wearing Padukas (1) in feet l
Lion cloth at waist, with stick and water pot, strives for cause of Devotees ll 1 ll
Flaunts label as Compassionate of Devotees in three worlds, stays at Home of Devotees l
This Compassionate lord is Hungry of Devotion,swings in influence of Love(2)ll 2 ll
Gives true Devotees knowledge of non duality in normal ways diplomatically l
Knowing the Greatness of Mother Balmukund, Datt keeps silence ll 3 ll
(1) Wooden footrests
(2) Experiencing super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
छळ करितां जन येई उत्तेजन ।। गुरूचें भजन कराया ।।धृ०।।
 छळ न करिती परिक्षा घेती ।। निजशांति द्याया ।।१।।
 स्वार्थं सांडुनी परार्थ झटती ।। बोध दृढ कराया ।।२।।
 निंदोत जन आनंद मजला ।। भजतों दत्तराया ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Performing what DODO DODO (1)ll Refrain ll
Be alert pray Preceptor l
The Death God trembles before you CHAR CHAR CHAR CHAR (2) ll 1 ll
In vain holding self pride l
You fear death always THAR THAR THAR THAR ll 2 ll
Surrendering in unassuming manner l
REMEMBER REMEMBER REMEMBER PRECEPTOR DATT ll 3 ll
(1) Repeated annoying follow up to do this, do that.
(2) Extreme fear

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्त भजावा दत्त ।। दयानिधि ।।धृ०।।
 ज्ञानमार्गी अवधूत ।। त्रिभुवनीं गाती सदा भक्त ।।१।।
 भजकां करितो शांत ।। भक्तभजनीं तो डुलत ।।२।।
 प्रत्ययमात्रें स्थित ।। सर्वींसर्व दत्तबालावधूत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
On people doing harrassment l
It acts as impetus to perform Prayer of Preceptor ll Refrain ll
They do not harass, Examine you l
To deliver permanent peace ll 1 ll
Leaving self interest, strive for welfare of others l
To stabilize the teachings ll 2 ll
Let people criticize I have pleasure l
I pray King Datt ll 3 ll

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्फूरद्रूप गुरूचें पहातां ।। वृत्ति लीन झाली ।।धृ०।।
 स्फुरते सत्ता सर्वां ठायीं ।। विश्वरूपें दिसली ।।१।।
 सिध्दानुभव स्वयंप्रकाश ।। प्रत्ययीं खूण लाधली ।।२।।
 स्वानंदाब्धि मग्न दत्त हा ।। प्रेमाची केली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Datt should prayed Datt l
The Store of Compassion ll Refrain ll
The Avadhut on path of Self Knowledge l
Devotees sing always in three worlds(1)
ll 1 ll
Calms down the praying one l
Himself swings in prayer of Devotees ll 2 ll
Is existing in the form of Experience l
The Balavadhut-Datt is everything everywhere ll 3 ll
(1) Heaven, Earth, Hell

ma.Lyrics_Language:
निजप्रेमसागरामाजी ।। बुडी म्यां दिधली आजी ।।धृ०।।
 निजप्रेम प्रेम घोंटितें ।। निज प्रेम स्वरूपीं अटतें ।।१।।
 प्रेमासी प्रेमाची मिठी ।। प्रेमासी नाहीं पोटपाठी ।।२।।
 प्रेमळ स्वरूप दत्ताचें ।। निजप्रेमें भजनीं नित्य नाचे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing form of Preceptor as inspiration l
Notions get surrendered ll Refrain ll
The power inspires at all places l
And is seen in form of Universe ll 1 ll
The experience of Super Soul in the form of Light of Self l
The mark is understood in Experience ll 2 ll
This Datt is engrossed in ocean of Pleasure of Self l
The whole play of Love (1)ll 3 ll
(1) Experience of omnipresent Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
झाडीं चरणधूळ मस्तकीं आतां ।।धृ०।।
 पदरजस्पर्श होई जरी मज ।। स्वप्नींही नाठवे भवचिंता ।।१।।
 लोळेन धुळीं सर्वकाळीं ।। येईल मुक्ति सहज हातां ।।२।।
 हृदयीं ध्यान तुझें वदनीं नाम दत्ता ।। सेवीन नित्य प्रेमामृता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
In this ocean of everlasting Love(1) I
I took a dip II Refrain II
True Love sips Love (1) I
True Love dries up in form of Self II 1 II
Love embraces Love I
Love has no stomach no back(2) II 2 II
Form of Datt is Compassionate I
dances in prayer always, in Everlasting Love II 3 II
(1) Experiencing that everything everywhere is Super Soul
(2) Front and Back are (1), there is nothing except (1)

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अखंड शांति मिळाली ।। झालों अढळ ब्रह्मचारी।।धृ०।।
 गृह गिळुनी ग्रुहस्थ झालों ।। पहा नवल परी ।। १।।
 जन वन नाहीं वानप्रस्थ मी ।। सर्वत्र फेरी ।।२।।
 न्यासान्यासारहित यती मी ।। फकीर दत्तद्वारीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Now sprinkle dust(1) of your feet on my Head II Refrain II
If I get touch of the Dust of Feet I
Worries of Bhava (2) will not be remembered even in Dreams II 1 II
I will roll in the dust at all times I
Salvation will easily come in Hand (3) II 2 II
O Datt ! With Your contemplation at heart, Your name in Mouth I
I will always consume nectar of Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experience that I am Super Soul 
(1) Cycle of Death nd Rebirth
(3) Since I am Super Soul I have no bonding of Death and Rebirth So I am emancipated

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रेमळ सद्गुरु आजि देखियला ।। हृदयग्रंथिभेद जाहला ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेमाची वाहतो चिंता।। भवभ्रम समूळ गेला ।।१।।
 स्फूर्तिरूपें सद्गुरु नांदे ।। अहंभाव पूर्ण गळला ।।२।।
 द्वैताद्वैत दत्तस्वरूप ।। सहजानंद सहज उदेला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Found permanent Peace I
I became Celibate(1) II Refrain II
I became homely swallowing Home (2) I
See the Miracle II 1 II
I know no People ,no Forest, Still Stay in Forest (3) I
Wandering every where II 2 II
I am a Sanyasin without attachment, detachment I
A Monk at Door of Datt II 3 II
THESE ARE FOUR ASHRAMAS 
Celibacy- Brahmcharya, Married life- Gruhasthashram , Forest living Vanprasth, and leaving everything -Sanyas 
(1) I follow experience that I am Super Soul
(2) I perform Temporal affairs understanding that knowing them to be false
(3) To me crowd of people and forest are the same. I stay alone away from people 
(4) I have taken up last Ashram without detaching anything not am I attached to anything

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहा सद्गुरुमूर्ति ।। आज हृदयीं साठविली ।।धृ०।।
 संसाराचा वीटची आला ।। धन्य गुरुमाऊली ।।१।। 
 अंतर्बाह्य माय राखिते ।। चिंता ती कसली ।।२।। 
 बालमुकुंद दत्तप्रभु हा ।। प्रेमसुगी जाहली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Today Affectionate Preceptor is Seen I
Knot of Heart (1) is today untied II Refrain II
Takes care of Needs and Welfare I
Delusion of Bhava(2) has gone from roots (3) II 1 II
Preceptor dwells in the form of Inspiration I
Self Pride is totally dropped II 2 II
Duality Nonduality is form of Datt I
Pleasure of Normalcy is dawned without efforts II 3 II
(1) Doubt that I am Living Entity different from Super Soul is gone 
(2) Cycle of Death and Rebirth 
(3) Root of delusion of Bhava is the presumption that I am living entity This root itself has been removed

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्त परब्रह्म प्रभु देखियला ।। मिथ्या भ्रम समूळ निमाला ।।धृ०।।
 सहज स्फूरद्रूप जग हें जाहलें ।। बंधमोक्षभाव गळला ।।१।।
 सर्वीं सर्व ब्रह्मानंद ।। त्रिपुटीभाव कदा नुदेला।।२।।
 स्वानंदसागरीं स्वानंदें खेळतो ।। स्वानंदोन्मत्त दत्त हा भला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Look ! Icon of Preceptor I
Is today stored in Heart II Refrain II
I have got ennui of Mundane affairs I
Great is Mother Preceptor II 1 I 
Mother protects inside out I
What type of worry will be there II 2 II
This Balmukund is Lord Datt I
Harvest of Love (1) has crystallized II 3 II
(1) Evidence of Super Soul every where is experienced

ma.Lyrics_Language:
असुनी तूं अविनाशी ।। मरणा व्यर्थचि तूं भिसी ।।धृ०।।
 स्फूरद्रूपीं मन हें जाहलें ।। खेळे विश्वविलासीं ।।१।।
 हरिहरब्रह्म कल्पित स्वरूप ।। असती काळग्रासी ।।२।।
 कैवल्यसुख सहज दत्ता ।। डुलतो प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Datt ! Super Soul Lord is seen I
False delusion (1) ended from roots II Refrain II
This Universe came into being in the form of inspiration (2)without efforts I
Idea of Bonding(3) and Salvation was dropped out II 1 II
Everything Every where is pleasure of being Super Soul I
Feeling of Trio (4) never did dawn II 2 II
I played in ocean of pleasure of self, with pleasure of self I
This Great Datt is frantic with Pleasure of Self II 3 II
(1) Delusion that I am a living entity 
(2) Universe is born out of inspiration of Super Soul
(3) Imagining cycle of death and birth due to past sins 
(4) Performer, Performance and task to be performed

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अवधूता शरण जाईं ।। नित्य निश्चिंत होईं ।।धृ०।।
 नाहीं प्रपंच निवृत्ति कैंची ।। चिद्विलासडोहीं ।।१।।
 त्रिपुटीरहित विलसे विश्व ।। भोक्ता यासी नाहीं ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदे उन्मत दत्त ।। लीन सद्गुरुपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
You being immortal I In vain You, fear the Death II Refrain II
This mind came into being in the form of inspiration (1) I
Plays in the expanse of Universe II 1 II 
Brahma Vishnu and Mahesh are imaginary forms I
Are all fodder of Death(2) II 2 II 
Datta has pleasure of Salvation without efforts I 
Who swings in Juice of Love(3) II 3 II
(1) Super soul inspires mind of Living entity 
(2) Brahma Vishnu and Shiv do not exist in super soul. They are imaginary and have an end.
(3) Experience of Omnipresent Super Soul every where.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहातां गुरूची आनंदमूर्ति ।। तन्मय मी जाहलों । आपुला भाव विसरलों ।।धृ०।।
 अमूर्त परी मूर्त जाहला ।। भक्तकाजा विकला ।। भूवरीं सहज अवतरला ।। अंतर्बाह्य स्वरूप विलसे ।। एकदेशी दिसला ।। एक तो अनेकची जाहला ।। झाला म्हणणें अर्थवाद हा ।। ऐकुनी मी हंसलों ।।१।।
 स्फुरद्रूप हा सद्गुरु माझा ।। सर्वांठायीं विलसे ।। शोधितां बहुत जाहले पिसे ।। " सर्वं खलु इदं ब्रह्म"।। श्रुति ही गर्जतसे ।। ऐकुनी भ्रमले जन कैसे ।। पाहुनी मूर्ति निमली स्फूर्ति ।। तल्लीन मी जाहलों ।।२।।
 धन्य धन्य हा धन्य सद्गुरु ।। धन्य बोध उदेला ।। अनादिभ्रम सर्व गेला ।। तुटली हृदयग्रंथि संशय समूळ हा गेला ।। द्वैतभावचि निमाला ।। कैवल्यासी सारुनी मागें ।। दत्तभजनीं रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Go surrender to Avadhut I And Become worryfree forever II Refrain II No mundane living, How can be detachment I in pond of Chidvilas (1) II 1 II 
Universe manifests without doer, deed, object I There is no enjoyer for it II 2 II
Datt is delirious in pleasure of being Super Soul I Humble at feet of Preceptor II 3 II (1)Chit is Super Soul that manifests in the universe through five powers Earth,Water,Fire,Air and Sky

ma.Lyrics_Language:
झाडीं चरणधूळ मस्तकीं माझ्या ।। नलगे आणिक कांही ।।धृ०।।
 इहभोग नलगे परभोग नलगे ।। नलगे सायुज्य तेंही ।।१।।
 भक्तिसुख जरी अनेक जन्म ।। घेईन तव पायीं ।।२।।
 प्रेमळ माय तूं अंतरीं बाहेरी ।। दत्ता रक्षिसी पाहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Preceptor's icon of pleasure | I became one with it |
I forgot awareness of self || Refrain ||Being Himself bodyless, took up Human Form 
|Is sold for cause if Devotees |Effortlessly incarnated on earth |
Inside and out manifests Super Soul |He is seen as unidirectional |
Being single he became manifold |Saying 'he became' is interpreting meaning the word Listening I laughed (1) || 1 ||
My this Preceptor takes form as per inspiration |Manifesting in all places | 
Searching Him many ones got frenzied |'SARVAM KHALU IDAM BRAHM' (2) |
Proclaimed even Vedas |Listening how people are still perplexed |
Observing Icon | Inspiration calmed |I became engrossed || 2 ||
Great, Great, This Preceptor is Great |Great teaching has dawned |
All eternal illusion has gone (3) Knot of heart is severed, doubt has gone from its bud(3) |Feeling of duality itself has calmed down |
Pushing Salvation back |I regaled in prayer of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Everything is Preceptor, then saying Preceptor manifests is incorrect so I laughed
(2) 'All this is The Super Soul Itself ' - Vedas
(3) Doubt that I am living entity has gone and knowledge that I am Super Soul has dawned.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरुमुद्रित पोळ संसारीं फिरतो ।। जाणुनी सेवी नरा ।।धृ०।। 
 मायाकल्पित ढोसुनी पाडिलें ।। अंतका दरारा ।।१।।
 पाप पुण्य आणि बंध मोक्ष हे ।। नाणीं मनींहि जरा ।।२।।
 तूर्यापिठवरी वस्ति जयाची ।। ब्रह्मानंदचारा ।।३।।
 दत्तगुरुपायीं वस्ति जयाची ।। धुंद भक्त खरा ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Sprinkle dust of Your feet on my head (1)|
Nothing else is needed || Refrain ||
Enjoyment of this life is not needed , enjoyment beyond this life is not needed (2) |
Not needed even salvation of nearness (3) || 1 ||
If pleasure of devotion is there , I will |
Take many births at your feet || 2 ||
You are the affectionate mother inside out(4) |
O Datt ! See You protect us || 3 ||
(1) Your feet is form of Super soul sprinkle experience of this form in my head.
(2) The enjoyment of routines and enjoyment during self realuzation
(3) Experience of being near to Super Soul.
(4) You are within me as well as in all beings

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आम्ही दत्ताचे घरचे पिसे ।। पाहुनी जन आम्हां हंस ।।धृ०।।
 नाहीं आम्हांसी जन्ममरण ।। नाही काळाचेंही स्मरण ।। आम्हां जगचि मिथ्या दिसे ।।१।।
 आम्हांमध्ये आम्ही नाहीं ।। दुजयाची वार्ता कांहीं ।। आम्हां चोरूनी आम्ही असे ।।२।।
 सर्वांठायी आम्ही विलसतों ।। चिद्विलास हा भासतो ।। मूढासी द्वैत हें भासे ।।३।।
 सर्वत्र बालावधूत ।। भावाभावविरहित दत्त ।। जग डुले निजप्रेमरसें ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
A Vagabond impressed with mark of Preceptor wanders in the world (1)|
O Man ! Know Him! Serve Him ! || Refrain ||
He pulled down things imagined by illusion with blow |
Even Death God has His See (2) || 1 ||
Virtue, Sin, Bonding,(3) Salvation |
Does not bring in mind even a bit || 2 ||
Whose stay is on stage of Turya (4)|
And feeds on pleasure of being Super Soul || 3 ||
Who resides at feet of Preceptor Datt |
He is the true Absorbed Devotee || 4 ||
(1) A devotee fully charged with experience of grace of Preceptor
(2) He demolished the untrue living entity, God, Universe realizing it as as Super Soul
(3) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth as an outcome of past sins
(4) State where we experience super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्ता तुझी वर्णूं मी महिमा किती ।।धृ०।।
 तव चरणां जे शरण येती ।। नाहीं त्या संसृति ।।१।।
 भक्ति शिकवुनी भजन करविसी ।। देशी चरणीं प्रीति ।।२।।
 निजप्रेमासी कैवल्य लाजलें ।। दत्ता स्वरूपरति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
We are madmen in home of Datt |
Observing people laugh at us || Refrain ||
We do not have birth and death |
Nor we have memory of Death God |
The Universe itself appears delusive to us || 1 ||
We are inside ourselves |
Another one is not even in news |
We exist hiding from us || 2 ||
We dwell in all places |
This is felt as Chidvilas (1) |
This appears as duality to Ignorant || 3 ||
Balavadhut is every where |
Datt is beyond existence and non existence (2) |
Universe swings with juice of Love (3) || 3 ||
(1) Every thing is creation of super soul Chit.
(2) Before anything existed Datt was there and is reason for all existing ones
(3) Experiencing that the Super soul is enjoying by manifesting in the universe.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
एकोभावें दत्त भजतां ।। नाही संसृतीचिंता ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेम वाहतो प्रभू ।। तोचि माता पिता ।।१।।
 भक्ताभिमानी भक्तवत्सल ।। भक्तजनत्राता ।। २।।
 अनंन्यभावें भजतां पाय ।। सहज सुख दत्ता ।। ३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt! How much shall I describe your greatness || Refrain ||
Those who surender at your feet |
They do not have mundane tasks || 1 ||
You teach us Devotion and make us perform Prayer |
Giving us affection at your feet || 2 ||
Even Kaivalya (1) shied at True Love (2) |
Pant has enchantment at Form of Self (3) || 3 ||
(1) State of being emancipation
(2) Experiencing that I Super Soul manifest everywhere
(3) Form of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य तोचि दैवाचा ।। झाला गुरुपुत्र साचा ।।धृ०।।
 नाही संसृतिचिंता त्यासी ।। दुःखभाव कैंचा ।। १।।
 जन्मचि नाही आत्मस्वरूपीं ।। मृत्यु तो कैंचा ।। २।।
 सहजी सहज चिद्विलास ।। धन्य दत्तगुरूचा ।। ३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
On praying Datt with faith of unity |
Worries of Mundane living are not there 
|| Refrain ||
Lord takes care of needs and welfare |
He alone is Mother and Father || 1 ||
Proud of devotees, Caring for devotees |
Savior of group of devotees || 2 ||
Worshipping feet with faith Ananya(1) |
Datt (Pant) has effortless pleasure || 3 ||
(1) Faith that He alone and none other is saviour

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सहज मी भोगी स्वानंदा ।। भजुनी सद्गुरु आनंदकंदा ।।धृ०।।
 त्राता दाता सद्गुरु माझा ।। नाहीं चिंता कदा ।।१।।
 विषम संसृति समचि झाली ।। सद्गुरुसेवा हाचि धंदा ।।२।।
 दत्तप्रभु हा अंतरीं बाहेरी ।। लागती भक्त प्रेमछंदा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He alone is fortunate l
Who becomes True Son of Preceptor ll Refrain ll
He does not have worries of Temporal Affairs l
How can be feeling of sorrows ll 1 ll
In the form of Super Soul Birth itself is not there l
How can there be death ll 2 ll
Normally without efforts is Chidvilas (1) l
Of Great Preceptor Datt ll 3 ll
(1) All things taking place are manifestation of Super Soul Chit.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भक्तवत्सल दत्त शिरीं असतां ।। कासया चिंता ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेमाचें ओझें वाही ।। तोचि प्रेमळ माता ।।१।।
 इहपरबंध तोडुनी सहज ।। कैवल्यदाता ।।२।।
 अनन्यभावें भजतां त्यासी ।। निजशांति दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I effortlessly enjoy pleasure of Self (Super Soul ) |
Praying Preceptor Source of Pleasure || Refrain ||
My Savior, Benefactor is Preceptor |
Never have I worry || 1 ||
Uneven Life became quite even |
Service of Preceptor is the Vocation || 2 ||
This Lord Datt is inside out |
Devotees have taken up to habit of experiencing Super Soul every where || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्फूर्ति टाकुनी पहातां दत्त ।। माझा मीचि झालों ।।सर्वांठायीं मीचि भरलों ।।धृ०।।
 मजवांचुनी आणिक नाहीं ।। गुरुशिष्य झालों ।। मजला मीचि सहज भजलों ।।१।।
 बंध मोक्ष हा खेळ कल्पुनी।। प्रेमामाजीं रमलों ।।ब्रह्मानंदीं सहज गमलों ।।२।।
 आलें नाही गेलें नाहीं ।। पाहुनी मी हंसलों ।। दत्ता निजप्रेमें स्मरलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
When Compassionate of Devotees Datt is on Head(1)|
Why worries || Refrain ||
Carries burden of needs and welfare |
He alone is affectionate mother || 1 ||
Easily severing bond of this life and beyond | Delivers. Kaivalya Salvation (2)|| 2 ||
Praying Him with faith Ananya (3) |
Pant had eternal peace || 3 ||
(1) Supports us
(2) Experience that I am Super Soul 
(3) Faith that He alone and none else is Savior

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझी खूण मजला न कळे ।। काय सांगूं इतरां ।।धृ०।।
 इतरचि नाहीं मम स्वरूपीं ।। नाहीं भेदशिरा ।।१।।
 एकानेक विरहित मीचि ।। विश्वपसारा ।।२।।
 प्रेमास्तव मी भक्त जाहलों ।। दत्त देव खरा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Datt removing inspiration |
I became My own |
I filled in all places (1) || Refrain ||
Nothing other than Me exists |
I became Preceptor and Disciple |
I prayed myself without efforts || 1 ||
Imagining game of Bonding (2), Salvation |
I regaled in Love (3) |
I dwelled effortlessly in pleasure if being Super Soul || 2 ||
Nothing did come, Nothing did go |
Observing I laughed |
Remembered Datt with permanent Love (3) || 3 ||
(1) Super soul fills everything which I am
(2) Imagination that due to past sins I fall in cycle of birth and death
(3) Experiencing Super Soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कासया करूं मी चिंता।। माझा सद्गुरुनिशिदीनीं त्राता ।।धृ०।।
 स्वस्थ मी गुरूच्या चरणीं पडलों ।। नाहीं मीपणा आतां।।१।।
 भक्ताभिमानी बालावधूत।। तोचि सर्व कर्ता ।।२।।
 दत्तस्वरूप हृदयीं नांदे ।। पाजवी प्रेमामृता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I do not know my own origin |
What shall I tell others || Refrain ||
In my form none other exists |
No limit of distinction || 1 ||
I am alone without distinction of one and many |
Which is expansion of universe || 2 ||
I became Devotee for sake of Love |
True God is Datt || 3 ||
Gist: Super soul is only true God, manifesting as Devotee to Pray itself this enchantment of Super Soul manifesting this universe is Love

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कांही दिवस खेळ खेळुनी ।। जाऊं निजधामा ।।धृ०।।
 आमुची स्थिती झाली अकळ ।। हरिहरब्रह्मा ।।१।।
 पहातां पहातां नाहीं होऊं ।। गिळुनी रुपनामा ।।२।।
 येतां जातां सहज दावूं ।। दत्तनिजप्रेमा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why shall I indulge in worrying |
My Preceptor is Savior day and night || Refrain ||
I lay quiet at feet of Preceptor |
No no pride of self || 1 ||
Balavadhut is champion of Devotees |
He is performer of everything || 2 ||
Form of Datt dwells in Heart |
Suckles me nectar of Love (1) || 3 ||
(1) Giving me experience of being omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य मी दैवाचा ।। मिळला निजप्रेमा गुरूचा ।।धृ०।।
 संसाराची नाही चिंता ।। द्वैतभाव कैंचा ।।१।।
 योगक्षेम वाहतो सद्गुरु ।। त्राता तो साचा ।।२।।
 प्रेम देउनी भाव प्रगटी ।। प्रेमळ दत्ताचा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
laying our roles for some days |
We will go to Our original place || Refrain ||
Our state has become not understandable |
To Brahma Vishnu and Mahesh (1) || 1 ||
While you observe we will extinguish |
Swallowing our Form and Name (2) || 2 ||
While we come (birth) and go (death) we will demonstrate |
True Love (3) of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Three Gods said to be in charge of Generation(Birth), Organisation ( present state) and 
Destruction (Death )
(2) We will remain as Super Soul beyond our Form and Name
(3) Super Soul manifests all universe for sake of pleasure which is Love

ma.Lyrics_Language:
हेंचि मागणें सतत दत्ता ।। भजनप्रेम देईं ।।धृ०।।
 भक्ति देउनी उत्सव करवीं ।। भजनीं नाचवीं ।।१।।
 खेळत खेळत संसारीं या ।। निजपदा नेईं ।।२।।
 नलगे मजला इहपरभोग ।। दत्तस्वरूप दावीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am having great fortune |
I obtained True Love (1) of Preceptor || Refrain ||
I have no worry of Temporal affairs |
How can there be feeling of duality || 1 ||
Preceptor cares for needs and welfare |
He is true Savior || 2 ||
Delivering Love (1) unfolds characteristics |
Of affectionate Datt (2) || 3 ||
(1) Experience that everything is the Super Soul Datt
(2) Super soul is Datt it's characteristics is to manifest this universe and take and spread experience of being everything

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मूढ दास मी तुझा दत्ता ।। प्रेम देईं मजला ।।धृ०।।
 नेणों युक्ती नेणों भक्ति ।। नेणों ज्ञानाला ।।१।।
 नेणों बंध नेणों मोक्ष ।। नेणों द्वैताला ।।२।
 सर्वांठायीं पाहूं तुजला ।। श्रीगुरु दत्ताला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! Only this demand forever |
Deliver enchantment of Prayer || Refrain ||
Giving devotion get performed ceremony |
Make me dance in Prayer (1)|| 1 ||
Playing playing in this temporal living |
Take me to my original place (2) || 2 ||
I do not need enjoyment of this life and beyond |
Show me form of Datt (3) || 3 ||
(1)Experiencing that worldly events are your prayer only
(2) Place of Super soul
(3) Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भजन करा गुरूचें ।। सार्थक हेंचि जन्माचें ।।धृ०।।
