 मिथ्या विषयां व्यर्थ भ्रमतां ।। निजसुख कैंचें ।।१।।
 सर्वानंद पुरवी सद्गुरु ।। चरण धरा त्याचे ।।२।।
 नित्यसुख श्रीदत्तचरणीं ।। भजनीं प्रेम सांचे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! I am ignorant servant of yours |
Give me experience of Love(1) || Refrain ||
I do not know imagination, I do not know devotion |
I do not know Knowledge of self || 1 ||
I do not know Bonding(2), I do not know Salvation |
I do not duality (3)|| 2 ||
We will You every where |
The Revered Preceptor Datt || 3 ||
(1) Experience of Super Soul in all things
(2) Imagination that due to past sins we fall in cycle of Death and Rebirth
(3) I am different from Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कल्पितासी देउनी रजा ।। पहा गुरुगृहींच्या मौजा ।।धृ०।।
 सहज स्फुरण हें दृश्य दिसलें ।। स्वरूपीं पडलें वजा ।।१।।
 जन्म मरण मुळीं नाहीं ।। दुःख कवण काजा ।।२।।
 गुह्याद्गुह्य दत्तप्रभु हा ।। अनुभवें समजा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Do perform prayer of Preceptor |
Doing this is fulfillment of Life || Refrain ||
You delude in futility in false Sensual objects |
How will there be permanent pleasure || 1 ||
Preceptor supplies pleasure of all kinds |
Hold feet of Him || 2 ||
Pleasure is forever at feet of reverred Datt |
In player true love accumulates || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बंध मुळीं नाहीं मुक्त म्हणविती ।। ऐकुनी येत हंसें ।।धृ०।।
 आपणा वांचुनी अन्य नाहीं ।। भ्रमती जन कैसे ।।१।।
 ज्ञानविलास प्रगट दिसतो ।। मायेचें पिसें ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरूसी नित्य भजतां ।। डुलती प्रेमरसें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Sending imaginary(1)on leave |
Observe fun of home of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Normal inspiration of Super Soul is seen as this universe |
Is substracted from form of Super Soul (2) || 1 ||
Birth and death do not exist at all |
What is reason for sorrow || 2 ||
This Lord Datt is secret of secret |
Understand with. Experience || 3 ||
(1) All universe, living entity, Bonding Salvation, Virtues, Sins, are imaginery. they are but Super Soul 
(2) All are forms of Super Soul and we see them in the visible universe, which does not exist.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आहे म्हणतां मीचि नाहीं ।। नाहीं म्हणतां सर्वांठायीं ।।धृ०।।
 माझी खूण मजला नकळे ।। भरलों सर्व दिशा दाही ।।१।।
 मजला मीचि कैसें पाहूं ।। विषय विषयी मुळीं नाहीं ।।२।।
 सहजी सहज भजनानंदें ।। रमतों नित्य दत्तपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
hey call themselves emancipated, when Bonding does not exist at all (1)|
Listening comes Laughter || Refrain ||
Nothing other than us exists |
How people get deluded || 1 ||
Maifestation of knowledge is seen openly(2) |
But illusion lead madness (3)|| 2 ||
Praying forever Preceptor Datt |
They swing in influence of Love (4) || 3 ||
(1) Bonding in cycle of death and rebirth is imagination which is illusory, and saying that I have come out of this bond is false too that makes one laugh.
(2) (3) While everything is manifestation of Preceptor considering them as real is madness of illusion 
(4) Experiencing omnipresent preceptor everywhere

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पाठीराखा सद्गुरु असतां ।। कां रे तूं भिसी ।।धृ०।।
 प्रेमळ माय पोषिते तुजला ।। बुडवी प्रेमरसीं ।।१।।
 बंधन मिथ्या मुक्ति मिथ्या ।। मुक्त तूं अससी ।।२।।
 करीं तूं भक्ति देईल शांति ।। दत्त अविनाशी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Calling I exist, I do not exist at all |
Saying I do not exist I exist in all places(1) || Refrain ||
I do not understand my own secret (2)|
I have fill all Ten Directions || 1 ||
How shall I see myself |
Sensual objects and one enjoying them do not exist at all || 2 ||
Effortlessly in pleasure of prayer |
I regale always at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) I am Super soul . The Rama Shiva is not me. I am their creator, inspiration. I have manifested them.
(2) That I am Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
उन्मनीची निद्रा आली ।। अहंस्फूर्ति मावळली ।।धृ०।।
 मृदु तूर्य तो बिछाना ।। निश्चिंती ही उशी घेतली ।।१।।
 ओसंगी निजशांति आली ।। जीवन्मुक्ति चरणीं ठेविली ।।२।।
 पुनरुत्थान नाहीं आतां ।। दत्तपदीं निजवृत्ति निमली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor being supporter. At Back |
Why do you feat || Refrain ||
Affectionate Mother nurtures You |
Submerges in Juice of Love (1) || 1 ||
Boring(2) is false,Salvation is false | 
You are already emancipated || 2 ||
Perform Devotion, He the indestructible Datt |
Will deliver peace || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing omnipresent Super Soul every where.
(2) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth caused by our sins.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जन्मोजन्मीं ऐसा सद्गुरु मिळे जरी मजला ।। अनेक योनी भोगीन सुखें स्वानंद सजला ।।धृ०।।
 कळुनी सद्गुरु छळितो मजला मौज ही ज्याला ।। खेळ गुरूचा स्वानंदाचा सहज प्रगटला ।।१।।
 खेळ करावा सद्गुरुनाथें टिकतो भक्त भला ।। पाय न सोडी कांहीं केल्या दत्तरूपीं रमला ।।२।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
got sleep in Unmani (1)|
Inspiration about Self exyinguished || Refrain ||
That soft bed of Turya (2)|
Took head rest of Care free state || 1 ||
Permanent peace came in lap |
Salvation while living was kept at feet (3). || 2 ||
No there will be no rebirth |
Notions calmed at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) State beyond (2) where mind is sublimated, does not act.
(2) State beyond deep sleep where awareness of all things except Super soul is lost
(3) In this sleep at Unmani no worries, fear exist, full peace is attained. Even state of emancipation ranks bellow this state. Hence it is kept at feet.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नेणत आम्ही खेळ खेळलों ।। तुम्हा सांगाती ।। आमुची गुरुपायीं प्रीति ।।धृ०।।
 झाला खेळ दृष्टीं न पडे ।। आमुची ही गति ।। भोगूं गुरुपायीं शांति ।।१।।
 मुळींच संग नाहीं तुमचा ।। ढोंगाची ही प्रीति ।। आमुची आम्हां अकळ स्थिति ।।२।। 
 तुमचे ठायीं तुम्ही रहा ।। आम्ही भोगूं शांति ।। दत्तपदीं आम्हां रति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
If I get such Preceptor in every birth |
I will take many births happily| 
A pleasure of Self is adorned || Refrain ||
Knowing that Preceptor Persecutes one who gets fun |
Play of Preceptor of pleasure of Self is unfolded effortlessly || 1 ||
Play should be done by Preceptor, and true Devotee will sustain it |
Come what may, He will not leave feet |
He is regaled in form of Datt || 2 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
येऊं नका तुम्ही मजसवें आतां ।। वीर्यकीटका व्यर्थचि भितां ।।धृ०।।
 जनसंगति जनप्रीति ।। सदा करा तुम्ही विषयचिंता ।।१।।
 देहातीत मी देहाधीन तुम्ही ।। कैसी संगत जुळेल आतां ।।२।।
 दत्तपदीं आम्ही अनन्य जाहलों ।। नाहीं तुमची स्वप्नींही वार्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Unknowngly we played act of living in your company |
We have enchantment at feet of Preceptor || Refrain ||
The play we played des not come to vision | This is our fate |
We will enjoy peace at feet of Preceptor || 1 ||
We did not at all have Your Company (1) |
This love is hypocrisy |
Our state is not understandable to us || 2 ||(2) 
You stay at your place |
We will enjoy peace |
We have enchantment at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1)(2) We know we are Super soul now we do not get going in company of mundane affairs which is temporary and delusive.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आतां तरी छळ पुरे करीं ।। श्रमलों मी भारी ।।धृ०।।
 सद्गुरुराजपुत्र होउनी ।। कैसा मी भिकारी ।।१।।
 काय तुझा खेळ न कळे मजला ।। उभा मूढ द्वारीं ।।२।।
 भक्ताभिमानी अवधूत दत्ता ।। काय लीला परी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Now you do not come with me |
Insects of semen ( engaged in sensual pleasures alone) you fear in vain|| Refrain ||
Company of prople. Affection of people|
You always ponder about sensual objects || 1 ||
I am beyond this body, You are dependant on body |
How now the company can crystalize || 2 ||
At feet of Datt we have become Ananya(1) |
We have no news of yours even in dream 
|| 3 ||
(1) Faith that Datt alone is ultimate Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
काय नवल हें जाहलें ।। सिंहा शशक कसें हंसलें ।।धृ०।।
 काळ ग्रासी गुरुपुत्रासी ।। चिंतेनें वेढिलें ।।१।। 
 निश्चिंत झालासी कैसा ।। स्थिति तुझी न कळे ।।२।।
 शांतिदाता सद्गुरु दत्त ।। भजनीं नित्य खेळे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Dear ! Now at least stop harassment |
I have tired much || Refrain ||
Being the prince of King Preceptor |
How am I a beggar || 1 ||
What is your game is not understood by me |
I stand at door being ignorant || 2 ||
O Datt ! Avadhut ! Champion of Devotees |
What this your game is || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मिथ्या अहंकृति सांडुनी ।। रमतों नित्य चिद्भुवनीं ।।धृ०।।
 सहजीसहज उठली स्फूर्ति ।। नाहीं स्वरूपा हानी ।।१।।
 स्फूरद्रूप ब्रह्म सतत ।। वदली वेदवाणी ।।२।।
 सर्वींसर्व परब्रह्म ।। लीन दत्तचरणीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What is this miracle that occurred |
Rabbits laughed at Lion(1) || Refrain ||
Children of Preceptor swallowing Death God |
Are surrounded by worries (2)|| 1 ||
How did you ( child of Preceptor) become worry free |
Your state is not understood || 2 ||
Preceptor Datt, deliverer of Peace |
Always prays in Prayer(3) || 3 ||
(1) Being devotee of Pant you are wortied, so non devotees laugh at you.
(2) Without surrendering How did you become worry free 
(3) All transactions of Universe are his prayer

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नाहीं शिष्य गुरु ना उपदेश ।। सहज ब्रम्हस्थिति ।।धृ०।।
बंधनमोक्ष ज्ञानाज्ञान ।। मावळली स्फूर्ति ।।१।।
विधि निषेध येणें जाणें ।। नाहीं कल्पांतीं ।।२।।
नित्य तृप्त हा दत्त भजनीं ।। भोगी निजशांति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Giving away false Self Pride |
Always I regale at Home of Soul (1)
|| Refrain ||
Inspiration arouse without any efforts |
With no loss in form of Super soul || 1 ||
Super soul is always in form of inspiration |
Thus spoke language of Vedas || 2 ||
Every where every thing is Super soul |
Pant surrenders at Feet || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing that we are Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अनन्यभावें गुरूसी भजतां ।। निश्चिंत होसी ।।धृ०।।
 योग क्षेम वाहतो तुझा ।। चिंता कां मानसीं ।।१।।
 तनु मन धन अर्पुनी चरणीं ।। मागें कां घेसी ।।२।।
 शरण्य सद्गुरु दत्तराज हा ।। प्रेमाची राशी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Neither Disciple,nor Preceptor,nor Teaching |
State of being Super Soul exists as it is || Refrain ||
Neither Bonding(1)-Salvation, nor self knowledge-ignorance |
Inspiration extinguished (2) || 1 ||
At the time of catastrophe (3) |
There are no doables- prohibited deeds, nor coming-going || 2 ||
This Datt is always satiated |
Enjoying Permanent peace in prayer of Datt (4) || 3 ||
(1) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth based on past sins
(2) Process of inspiring stops when you yourself are Super Soul
(3) Catastrophe is the state where nothing except Super exists
(4) All things taking place is prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शूर वीर हा सद्गुरुनाथ ।। काळासी भारी ।।धृ०।।
 हरिहरब्रम्हा न गणी किमपि ।। चित्सिंधुलहरी ।।१।।
 दृश्य द्रष्टा दर्शन तोचि ।। नाहीं व्दैतपरी ।।२।।
 मुक्तस्थिति जग हें दिसतें ।। दत्तभजनलहरी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Praying Preceptor with faith Ananya(1) |
You will become worry free || Refrain ||
Takes care of Your Needs and welfare |
Why have worries in mind || 1 ||
Surrendering Body, Mind, and Wealth at feet |
Why You withdraw || 2 ||
This Lord Preceptor Datt is proper to surrender to |
A Store of Love (2) || 3 ||
(1) Faith that preceptor alone and none else is Savior 
(2) Experiencing omnipresent Preceptor every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मुक्तचि विश्वकंद ।। आतां कासया बोध ।।धृ०।।
 शब्दजनित पापपुण्य ।। मोक्ष आणि बंध ।।१।।
 स्वानंदासी विषय म्हणुनी ।। भोगती ब्रम्हानंद ।।२।।
 सुखी न कोणी दुःखी न कोणी ।। दत्त प्रेमें धुंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Valiant Brave Lord Preceptor |
Is Powerful than Death God || Refrain ||
Does not at all reckon Brahma Vishnu Shiva |
Waves (1) of ocean of Super Soul || 1 ||
He himself is observed, observer and seeing |
No duality of any kind || 2 ||
This universe is seen in state of salvation (2) |
Waves of Prayer of Datt (3) || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is present everywhere and waves of it are Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva
(2) Every being is Super soul which has no birth or death nond, they all are emancipated
(3) All universe events are player of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दुःख नाहीं रे ।। दुःख नाहीं रे ।। सुखासी दुःख म्हणती रे ।।धृ०।।
 विषयस्वरूपें सुखचि भोगितां ।। दुःख म्हणणें भ्रांती रे ।।१।।
 कष्ट मानिती सद्गुरुभजनीं ।। श्रेष्ठ तेथेंचि रमती रे ।।२।।
 शब्दजनित सुख दुःख हीं ।। दत्तास्वरूपीं नसतीं रे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Sprout of Universe is already emancipated (1) |
What is now need for teaching || Refrain ||
Virtuous deeds and sins are born of words |
And so are Salvation and Bonding (2) || 1 ||
Calling pleasure of Self Realization as object |
They enjoy pleasure of being Super Soul 
|| 2 ||
No one is happy, No one is distressed |
Pant is engrossed in joy of Love (3) || 3 ||
(1) Every thing is Super soul nothing takes birth, nothing dies,. So no one is bonded all are free -emancipated
(2) Imagination of cycle of death and rebirth arising from sins 
(3) Experience that every thing every where is Super soul participating in play of Preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सदानंद सद्गरूसी भजतां ।। सेवितों ब्रह्मानंद ।।धृ०।।
 अंतरीं बाहेरी सद्गरु माझा ।। सत्यज्ञानानंद ।।१।।
 इह पर नाहीं मी तूं नाहीं ।। सर्व सुखाचा कंद ।।२।।
 आपणा विसरुनी दत्त नाचतो ।। लागला अवधूतछंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Dear! Sorrows exist not, Woes exist not |
Happiness is called a woes || Refrain ||
Dear! Enjoying Happiness in form of Sensual objects |
Calling Woes is delusion || 1 ||
Dear! They reckon troubles in Prayer of Preceptor |
Where Great ones do regale || 2 ||
Dear! Happiness and Sorrow are born of words |
They do not exist in form of Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भला सद्गुरु मजसी मिळला ।। द्वैतभाव समूळ निमाला ।।धृ०।।
 बोधमात्रें भ्रांति गेली ।। जीवभाव स्वप्नीं नुरला ।।१।।
 साधन शीण नाहीं आम्हां ।। ज्ञानाज्ञानभाव गेला ।।२।।
 चरणीं गुरूच्या अहंकृति गेली ।। दत्त प्रेमें गुरुभजनीं रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Praying Ever pleasant Preceptor |
I enjoy pleasure of being Supersoul || Refrain ||
My Preceptor is. Inside and outside |
He is Truth, Cognitor of Truth, Pleasure of cognition(1) || 1 ||
Neither I nor You, Neither this world nor beyond |
He is source of all Happiness || 2 ||
Datt dances forgetting self |
He acquired hobby of Avadhut || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कैसा गारुडी बालावधूत ।। दावुनी द्वैत शुद्धाद्वैत ।।धृ०।।
 कांहीं न होउनी सर्व जाहला ।। झाला म्हणतां पूर्ण निवांत ।।१।।
 आहे तें नाहीं नाहीं तें आहे ।। दावुनी प्रगट आपण गुप्त ।।२।।
 सर्वप्रीय सर्वविदूर ।। सर्वांठायीं सद्गुरु दत्त ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I got great Preceptor |
Feeling of duality is ceased from roots 
|| Refrain ||
Delusion departed just with his teachings |
Feeling of being living entity did not remain even in dreams || 1 ||
We have no trouble of means of penance |
Feeling of being realized person, ignorant extinguished || 2 ||
At feet of Preceptor Self Pride does vanish |
Pant regales in love in Prayer of Preceptor (1) || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing that all events of universe are the prayer of Preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
होउनी गुरुपुत्र चिंता करिसी ।। नष्टदैव तूं अससी ।।धृ०।।
 इह पर चिंता वागवी सद्गुरु ।। मूढत्वें संशय घेसी ।।१।।
 सत्यप्रतिज्ञ सद्गुरु माझा ।। बुडविल प्रेमरसीं ।।२।।
 अंतर्बाह्य दत्तचि अवघा ।। खेळतो समरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What Magician Balavadhut is |
Demonstrating duality is pure non dual 
|| Refrain ||
Without becoming anything He pervaded everything |
Saying pervaded he is calm unmoved (1)
|| 1 ||
Existing does not exist, Nonexistent exists |
Openly demonstrating he remains in hiding || 2 ||
Likes everything is detached from everything |
Preceptor Datt is every where || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is every where but is itself inactive calm

ma.Lyrics_Language:
किती हे मूढचि जन गमती ।। नेणुनी विषयामाजीं रमती ।।धृ०।।
 आलों कोठुनी जातों कोठें नाहीं विवेक चित्तीं ।। करितों काय गति माझी स्वप्नींही नेणती ।।१।।
 अहंममता कल्पुनि व्यर्थ भ्रांतिमाजीं पडती ।। नित्यानंदस्वरूप नेणुनी दुःखचि भोगिती ।।२।।
 जातां शरण सद्गुरुपाय मिळते निजशांती ।। नेणुनी व्यर्थ शास्त्रें धूंडिती दत्ता न भजती ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Becoming Child of Preceptor You indulge in worries |
You are with ruined fortune || Refrain ||
Your worries of this world and beyond are taken care of by Preceptor |
You raise doubts ignorantly || 1 ||
My Preceptor is true to his vow |
Will submerge me in juice of Love (1) || 2 ||
Datt alone is entirely inside and out |
Plays is unification of all || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing Super Soul every where.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नित्य सद्गुरूसी भजावें ।। वेदविहित तेंचि करावें ।।धृ०।।
 आत्मस्वरूपीं नित्य भरावें ।। सत्य तेंचि हृदयीं धरावें ।।१।।
 मायाकल्पित सर्व टाकावें ।। मायातीत सहज व्हावें ।।२।।
 शब्दजनितां न मानावें ।। नित्य दत्तपदीं रमावें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
How ignorant these people look like |
Not knowing regale in sensual objects 
|| Refrain ||
With no discernment in heart, about where I came from, where do I go |
Not knowing even in dreams, What I do, What is my fate || 1 ||
Imagining in futility self indulgence, fall in delusion |
Not knowing ever pleasant form of soul, suffer only sorrows || 2 ||
On surrendering at feet of Preceptor, True peace is attained |
Not knowing this search scriptures, but do not pray Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रेमा गुरूचा न वर्णवे मज ।। वाचा खुंटली ।।धृ०।।
 दर्शनमात्रें निजशांतीची ।। प्रभा फांकली ।।१।।
 अव्दयबोध पडतां श्रवणीं ।। भवभ्रांति गेली ।।२।।
 जीवन्मुक्ति भोगुनी वृत्ति ।। दत्तपदीं रमली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Shall always be praying Preceptor |
Shall be doing only things according to Vedas || Refrain ||
Shall always be filling in form office Soul |
Shall be holding only in heart what is Truth || 1 ||
Shall be giving up all imagined by illusion |
Shall effortlessly be reaching beyond illusion || 2 ||
Shall not be abiding by things born of words (1) |
Shall always be regaling at feet of Datt 
|| 3 ||
(1) Imaginary things like Religion, Sin, Virtue, Bonding, Salvation

ma.Lyrics_Language:
करितां सद्गुरूची भक्ति ।। भोगिली सहज जीवन्मुक्ति ।।धृ०।।
 अनादि मायाभ्रम जाउनी मिळली निजशांति ।। आत्मस्वरूप प्रगट नित्य नाहीं मना भीति ।।१।।
 होणें नाहीं जाणेंं नाहीं सहज ही स्थिति ।। आपींआप सहज विलसे नाहीं त्रिपुटीभ्रांति ।।२।।
 पाहतां पाहतां शांति मिळली काय गुरुभक्ति ।। दत्तचरण मी नित्य स्मरूनी भोगीं निजशांति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am not able to describe affection of Preceptor |
My speech is choked || Refrain ||
Just on sight glow of True Peace |
Is spread all over || 1 ||
On Nondual Teaching falling on ear |
Delusion of Bhava (1) is gone || 2 ||
Enjoying Salvation while living |
Notion regaled at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of death and rebirth

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्तप्रभो देईं भेटी ।। विनवितों तुला ।।धृ०।।
 अससी तूं कवण्या ठायीं ।। दर्शन मज कैसें होई ।। आस माझी तव पायीं ।। ध्यास लागला ।।१।।
 निर्गुण तूं सगुण होसी ।। अरूप असुनी रूप धरिसी ।। अक्रिय तूं क्रिया करिसी ।। गूढ हें मला ।।२।।
 भक्तकाजा एकदेशी ।। प्रेमभाव प्रगटिसी ।। दत्तभजनीं नित्य रमसी ।। सद्गुरु भला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Performing devotion of Preceptor | 
Effortlessly I enjoy salvation while living 
|| Refrain ||
Eternal delusion of illusion departed,
True peace is attained |
Form of self is always obvious, no fear in mind || 1 ||
Neither becoming nor exiting, This state is normal |
Unfolds automatically without efforts, No delusion of Triputi (1)|| 2 ||
Peace is attained in moment of vision, What of this devotion of Preceptor |
I always remember feet of Datt, and enjoy True Peace || 3 ||
(1) Three factions of performance- Performer, object, and performance

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वानंदसिंधुमग्न मी जाहलों ।। तूर्य उल्लंघिलों ।।धृ०।।
 जागृति स्वप्न सुषुप्ति नसती ।। स्वरूपीं जागलों ।।१।।
 उत्पत्तिस्थितिलय भ्रांति ।। सहज विसरलों ।।२।।
 नित्यमुक्त मी बंधन नाहीं ।। दत्तपदीं रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Lord Datt ! Give me meeting |
I request You earnestly || Refrain ||
In which place you exist |
How will I be able to meet You |
My yearning is at Your Feet |
I am obsessed of meeting || 1 ||
Being attributeless You take Human form |
Being formless You take Human Form |
Being non performer, perform all acts |
This a puzzle for me || 2 ||
For cause of Devotees unilaterally |
You bring to experience feeling of Love (1)|
Always regaling in Prayer of Datt (2) |
A great preceptor || 3 ||
(1) You manifest all things
(2) All events are your prayer only

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नाहीं ज्याला संतसंगति ।। व्यर्थ जिणें त्याचें या जगतीं ।।धृ०।।
 इहपर सुख न मिळे कदा ।। साधुजनाची हीची नीति ।।१।।
 संशय मनींचा जाई न कदा ।। न तुटे स्वप्नीं दृश्यभ्रांति ।।२।।
 कांहीं न केल्या शांति न मिळे ।। दूर त्यासी दत्तभक्ति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I became immersed in ocean of Pleasure of self |
Surpassing ahead of Turya (1) || Refrain ||
Awakening,Dream, Deep sleep aren't there |
I am staying in form of self (2) || 1 ||
I just forgot delusion of |
Birth State and Death || 2 ||
I am ever emancipated with no bonding(3) |
I regaled at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) State beyond deep sleep where every where super soul is experienced
(2) Experiencing The omnipresent Super Soul
(3) Imagination that our sins bind us in cycle of death and rebirth

ma.Lyrics_Language:
यमाची नाहीं त्या भीति ।। ज्याची गुरुपायीं प्रीति ।।धृ०।।
 स्थूल सूक्ष्म कारण ।। तूर्यातीत ज्याची स्थिति ।।१।।
 मायाकल्पित जीव शिव हे ।। नाणी कदा चित्तीं ।।२।।
 बागुलबावा बंध मोक्ष हे ।। नाहीं द्वैत चित्तीं ।।३।।
 नित्यमुक्त परब्रह्म दत्त हा ।। अंतरीं ज्या भक्ति ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
One who does not have company of saints |
His living in this World is wasted || Refrain ||
Will never get happiness in this world and beyond |
This is ruling of saintly people || 1 || 
Doubts of mind will never go |
Delusion of duality will not break even in dreams || 2 ||
Wharever he may strive peace is not attained |
Devotion of Datt is away from Him || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आपणा आपण हिताहितकर ।। आपणचि आपुला धनी रे ।।धृ०।।
 आपणचि कल्पुनी विधिनिषेध ।। रततो योगध्यानी रे ।।१।।
 बंध मुक्ति ही कल्पित सर्व ।। न पाहे निजज्ञानी रे ।।२।।
 आपणचि द्रष्टा दृश्य दर्शन ।। रमतो दत्तभजनीं रे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He does not have fear of Yama (1) |
Whose affection is at feet of Preceptor || Refrain ||
His state is beyond |
Macro, Micro, Reasoning, and Turya(2)|| 1 ||
He does never bring in Heart |
Imagination of illusion of Living entity and Shiva (God) || 2 ||
Bonding and Salvation are Bugaboos (3) |
Duality is not at Heart || 3 ||
He is the Supersoul Datt ever emancipated |
Who has Devotion inside || 4 ||
(1) Death God
(2) Stages of loosing self awareness Awakening, Dream, Deep sleep and Turya -state of witnessing Super Soul every where
(3) Imaginary fear that due to past sins we fall in trips of death and rebirth.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पायीं पडलों तुझ्या देवा ।। निश्र्चिंत मी झालों ।।धृ०।।
 वीर्यकीटक करिती काय ।। नाहीं त्यासी भ्यालों ।।१।।
 बंध मोक्ष बालक कथा ।। नाहीं त्यासी भुललों ।।२।।
 भक्ताभिमानी दत्तप्रभू तूं ।। जाणुनी मी भजलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Dear ! We are ourselves beneficial, non-benefitial to us l
We alone are our Masters ll Refrain ll
Dear! We ourselves contemplating Doable, Non-doable things l
Engage in Yoga and Meditation ll 1 ll
Dear! Bonding and Salvation (1) are all imaginary l
Self Realized one does not consider them 
ll 2 ll
Dear! We ourselves are observer, object and observation l
Regale in Prayer of Datt ll 3 ll
(1) Imagination of trap of Death and Rebirth in which we get caught due to past sins.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बाळ दुःखी तरी माता सुखी ।। कधीं न ऐकिलें ।।धृ०।।
 भक्त संकटीं पडतां दुर्घटीं ।। कैसें तुज न कळे ।।१।।
 न दिसे म्हणों तरी सूर्यचक्षु हा ।। कैसें न दिसलें ।।२।।
 बहिरा म्हणों तरी दिशा श्रोत्र ।। केवीं न ऐकिलें ।।३।।
 सर्वदेशी सर्वांतर्यामी ।। दत्ता जाणवलें ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O God ! I have fallen at your feet l
And I became free of worries ll Refrain ll
What insects of semen (1) will do l 
I did not fear them ll 1 ll
Bonding and Salvation(2) is child story l
I did not get deluded by it ll 2 ll
Knowing that you are Lord Datt l
Proud of Devotees, I prayed You ll 3 ll
(1) People always thinking of sex will never come out of it, why fear them
(2) Imaginary cycle of Death and Rebirth based on sins and virtues, and emancipation or relievement from it are like stories children imaginary

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शांति न भोगिसी ।। व्यर्थ निशिदिनीं झुरसी ।।धृ०।।
 एकला येऊनी एकला जाणें ।। संसार कां मांडसी ।।१।।
 जैसें करणें तैसें भरणें ।। देवा कां दूषिसी ।।२।।
 भजतां दत्ता नाहीं चिंता ।। अजुनी कां नेणसी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Child is Unhappy but Mother is Happy I
It is never Heard (1) II Refrain II
When devotees fall in Severe adversity I
How is it that you are not aware II 2 II 
If one has to say, You did not see, Then Sun is Your eye I
How You did not see (1) II 2 II
If we have to call You dumb, Then directions are Your ears I
How You did not listen II 2 II
You are all pervading, inner core of all I
Pant recognizes it II 4 II
(1) Nothing can happen unseen unheard by You

ma.Lyrics_Language:
करितां सद्गुरुभक्ति ।। सहज मिळे निजशांति ।।धृ०।।
 अनन्यभावें स्मरतां पाय ।। धावुनी ये मुक्ति ।।१।।
 योग ज्ञान खटपट न लगे ।। गुरुपदीं रति ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरूसी निशिदिनीं भजतां ।। आत्मप्रतीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
You do not enjoy peace |
In futility you languish in futility || Refrain ||
Coming alone,Going alone |
Why do you set forth into Domestic Affairs || 1 ||
As You sow, so you reap |
Why do you blame God || 2 ||
Praying Datt leaves no worries |
Why still You do not know || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
देव आपणचि भक्त आपणचि ।। भक्ति कोणाची करूं आतां ।।धृ०।।
 अंतरीं देव बाहेरी देव ।। देव न अन्य पाहूं जातां ।।१।।
 देव देऊळ परिवार एकचि ।। देवाविणें ठाव न रिता ।।२।।
 प्रेमास्तव भक्ति प्रगटे ।। दत्त भजन करितां ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Performing devotion of Preceptor |
True peace is attained effortlessly 
||Refrain ||
Remembering his feet with faith Ananya(1) |
Comes running Salvation || 1 ||
No efforts of Yoga and self knowledge are needed |
Regalement at feet of Preceptor || 2 ||
Praying Preceptor Datt Day and night |
Experience of self is gained || 3 ||
(1) Faith that only preceptor and none other is saviour

ma.Lyrics_Language:
व्यसन लागलें गुरूचें ।। आणिक कांहीं न रुचे ।।धृ०।।
 मिथ्या संसृति जाणुनी मनीं ।। पाय धरियले गुरूचे ।।१।।
 द्वैत कल्पना दुःखदायक ।। अद्वैतीं सुख साचें ।।२।।
 बालावधूत धन्य सद्गुरु ।। दत्तभजनीं नाचे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Myself I am God, Myself I am devotee |
Now whose devotion shall I do || Refrain ||
God is inside, God is outside |
Trying to see none else is God || 1 ||
God, Temple, Family are all one |
No place is Without God || 2 ||
Devotion comes to form for sake of love(1) |
When prayer of Datt is performed || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is alone . It creates devotion so that we devote it. It enjoys its own forms praying it. This is Love and Devotion comes for it.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अचल शांति दिधली मजला ।। काय वर्णूं गुरूसी ।।धृ०।।
 अहंकृति निमली पाहतां पाहतां ।। ब्रह्मसमरसीं ।।१।।
 आहे नाहीं विरहित स्थिति ।। सहज द्वैत ग्रासी ।।२।।
 जननीजनक बालावधूत ।। दत्तप्रेमरासी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am addicted of Preceptor |
Nothing else is liked || Refrain ||
Reckoning falsehood of Mundane life in mind |
I have held feet of Preceptor || 1 ||
Idea of duality(1) is woeful |
True happiness is in Non duality || 2 ||
Balavdhut is great preceptor |
Datt dances in his Prayer || 3 ||
(1)Thinking that I am different from Preceptor leads to sorrows of Me , My and Mine

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहातां गुरूसी तन्मय वृत्ति ।। होउनी शांत मी झालों किती ।। देहभान मज मुळींच नुरलें ।। असुनी नसे ही संसृति ।।धृ०।।
 मूर्ति गुरूची नयनीं माझ्या ।। बिंबुनी गेली नाढळे ती ।। अवधूताचा संग इच्छी मन ।। त्याविणें नाहीं आन प्रीति ।।१।।
 संसाराचा वीटचि आला ।। पाहिजे सज्जनसंगति ।। वेदशास्त्राची नाहीं आस ।। स्वानुभवसिद्ध स्थिति ।।२।।
 कल्पित शिष्य कल्पित गुरु ।। कल्पित बंध आणि मुक्ति ।। कल्पित भजन कल्पित दत्त ।। निर्विकल्पीं सहज रति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Unperturbed peace is delivered to Me |
What shall I describe Preceptor || Refrain ||
My self pride extinguished in a moment |
In the juice of unification with Super soul 
|| 1 ||
State of absence of existence and non existence |
Just swallowed duality || 2 ||
Balavadhut is Mother and Father |
The Datt, store of Love (1) || 3 ||
(1) Experiences of bring omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
उगीच कां फिरसी ।। कां फिरसी ।। देव आपणापाशीं ।।धृ०।।
 आपणा सोडुनी पाहूं जातां ।। व्यर्थची तूं फससी ।।१।।
 आपणचि देव वेद बोलतो ।। कां तूं नेणसी ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरूला शरण जासी तरी ।। ब्रह्मानंदीं बुडसी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Preceptor, Notions unified with Him |
How much composed I became |
My awareness of Body was totally lost |
Mundane things though existing became non existent (1) || Refrain ||
Icon of Preceptor is fixed in my eyes |
It does not get fizzled out |
Mind desires company of Avadhut |
There is no enchantment other than it || 1 ||
I have much ennuie of Living |
Company of virtuous ones is desired |
No desire of Vedas Shastra |
State proved by self experience is attained || 2 ||
Preceptor imaginary, Disciple imaginary |
Bonding salvation too imaginary (2) |
Prayer imaginary, Datt also imaginary |
In such pure state sans scruples I just regale || 3 ||
(1) Realization that mundane affairs are not permanent
(2) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth due to past sins

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहा हे व्यर्थचि नर भ्रमती ।। निषिद्ध कर्मेंचि करिती ।।धृ०।।
 शुद्ध ब्रह्मस्वरूप असती ।। मलीन जीवभाव धरिती ।। देह आपणचि म्हणती ।। व्यर्थ विषयांमाजीं रमती ।। नेणुनी पूर्वापर स्थिति ।। नित्य दुःखचि भोगिती ।।चा०।। नित्य मुक्तिसी नेणुनी चित्तीं ।। सत्य ही संसृति मानुनी ।। व्यर्थ गोते खाती ।।१।।
 जन्म नसतां कल्पुनी ।। मरणां भिती निशिदिनीं ।। पापपुण्य हें मानुनी ।। स्वर्ग नर्क चिंता मनीं ।। विधियुक्त कर्में करूनी ।। कीर्ति मिरविती जनीं ।।चा०।। कर्माकर्म भेद नेणुनी ।। अनुदिनीं झटती ।। रात्रंदिन खटपट ती ।।२।।
 अंतर्बाह्य देव असतां ।। श्रमती त्यासी धुंडितां ।। तीर्थक्षेत्र करूनी वृथा ।। नेणती स्वप्नीं कृतार्था ।। भजनें वाढविती द्वैता ।। विसरुनी शुद्ध अद्वैता ।।चा०।। अनन्यभावें भजतां दत्ता ।। सहज जीवन्मुक्ती ।। भोगिती अखंड निजशांती ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why do You wander unnecessarily I
Why do You wander I
God is with Us II Refrain II
Trying to search excluding Ourselves I
In vain You get derided II 1 II
Vedas speak, 'We ourselves are God' I
Why do You not Know II 2 II
If You surrender to Preceptor Datt I
You will submerge in pleasure of being Super soul II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आनंदमूर्ति सद्गुरु पहातां ।। अखंड सुख मजला ।। सखया ।।धृ०।।
 सत्यवचनी सत्यप्रतिज्ञ ।। राखितो मज भला ।।१।।
 शब्दबंधन तोडुनी सहज ।। मुक्त केलें मजला ।।२।।
 सत्यज्ञानानंद दत्तगुरु हा ।। नित्य भजनीं रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe! These Humans get deluded in Vain I
Perform prohibited deeds only II Refrain II
Being pure form of Super Soul themselves I
Hold muddy feeling of being Living Entity I
Say I am the Body only I Regale in vain in sensual objects I
Not knowing Age old state I Always suffer sorrows I
Not understanding ever salvation at heart I
Considering this Living as True I Unnecessarily fall in ditch II 1 II
Imagining Birth when it does not exist I Day and Night fear death I
Assuming Sin and Virtuous things I Worry in mind about Heaven and Hell I
Performing prescribed duties I Flaunt Honours amongst people I 
Not knowing distinction of Doable and Prohibited duties I 
Strive every day I Making efforts day and night II 2 II 
God being inside out I Toil is searching Him I Performing Pilgrimage in futility I 
Do not know fulfillment even in dreams I Increase duality through Prayer I 
Forgetting Pure Non duality I Praying Datt with faith Ananya(1) I
Salvation while Living is easy I Enjoy permanently True Peace II 3 II 
(1) Faith that Preceptor alone is Savior

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालावधूत गुरूनें ।। दिधलें मुक्तिसुख मजला ।।धृ०।।
 मानवजन्म सार्थ जाहला संशय मावळला ।। अंधपरंपरा रूढीचा तो भीतिभाव नुरला ।।१।।
 अंतर्बाह्य सद्गुरु नांदे ठाव न द्वैताला ।। प्रेमास्तव भक्त गुरू हे चिद्विलासलीला ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरुपदीं शांत मी झालों अभिमान जिरला ।। योगक्षेमाची वाहतो चिंता अनुभव हा ठरला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Icon of Joy Preceptor I Dear Friend II
have permanent happiness II Refrain II
True to his vow, True to his word I The Great one Protects me II 1 II 
Easily severing bond of words I Made me emancipated II 2 II 
The Preceptor Datt is the Truth, cognitor of truth, and pleasure of unity of both I 
Regales always in Prayer of Devotee II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भोगुनी झालों मी ब्रम्हचारी ।। विधिनिषेधासी नाहीं उरी ।।धृ०।।
 नाहीं देखियलें स्त्रीसुखातें ।। जन्मले पुत्र भारी ।।१।। 
 सदा एकला वस्ती स्वरूपीं ।। झालों मी संसारी ।।२।।
 जीवन्मुक्ति विदेहमुक्ति ।। दत्तभजनलहरी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor Balavadhut has I Given me permanent Happiness II Refrain II Human Birth has been fulfilled Doubt (1) has extinguished I The feeling of fear of Blind traditions and customs did not remain II 1 II Preceptors dwells inside out with no room for duality I These Preceptor and Devotee are for sake of Love a game of Chidvilas (2) II 2 II I have become composed at feet of Preceptor Datt, Self Pride has gone down I 
He takes care of Needs and welfare this experience is experienced II 3 II (1) Doubt that I am living entity (2) Every thing that takes place ( yes including corona) is done by Super Soul Chit.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्तमूर्ति मनीं ध्यावी ।। हृदयीं सदा सांठवावी ।।धृ०।। 
 सांगतों तुम्हां खचित आतां ।। हरील तो तुमची सर्व चिंता ।। धरूं नका संशयाची वार्ता ।। टाका प्रपंचाची ममता ।। सर्वांठायीं मूर्ति पहावी ।।१।। 
 जातां मनें त्यासी शरण ।। हरितो सहज जन्ममरण ।। शांत करी अंतःकरण ।। दुजा तो राखी तुज कवण ।। भरला गुरु दिशा दाही ।।२।।
 सत्य ही दत्तभक्तजननी ।। निजसुख देई निरंजनीं ।। आपींआप भक्त ठेवी ध्यानीं ।। देउनी ठाव निजचरणीं ।। नित्य भजन दत्तपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I became celibate indulging in enjoyment |
No place remained for Doable and prohibited duties || Refrain ||
I did not saw pleasure of women |
Still great sons are born || 1 ||
Always Single staying in own form (1) |
I became person of mundane affairs || 2 ||
Waves of Prayer of Datt are |
Salvation while living, Salvation with no awareness of body || 3 ||
(1) Form of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ऐकसी जरी तूं दत्तसिद्धांत ।। जाणुनी अखंड होसी शांत ।।धृ०।। 
 शब्दजनित सुखदुःख हें ।। बंधमुक्तीची मिथ्या मात ।।१।। 
 समाधि उत्थान शास्त्रस्थिति ।। निर्विकल्पीं जग हें डुलत ।।२।। 
 सहज समाधि जगस्वरूप ।। भजनीं रमतो नित्य दत्त ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Icon of Datt shall be contemplated in mind |
Shall be always stored in heart || Refrain ||
I will tell you now with certainty |
He will remove all your worries |
Do not hold news of doubt |
Give away affection of worldly affairs |
Shall see Icon in all places || 1 ||
On surrendering yo Him with Mind |
Easily does away with Birth and Death |
Makes heart composed |
Who else will protect You |
The preceptor is filled in ten directions|| 2 ||
This is true mother of devotees - Datt |
Delivers true happiness of Niranjan |
Automatically devotees in contemplation | 
Giving permanent seat at feet (1) |
Ever prayer at feet of Datt (1) || 3 ||
(1) Place of Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
विषयी जनां मी भीतिद दिसतों ।। गुरुपुत्रां मी शांति देतों ।।धृ०।।
 वेदशास्त्रांसी मागे सारुनी ।। अवधूतमथित मार्ग दावितों ।।१।। 
 अनुभवपथीं आणुनी सर्व ।। स्वानुभवस्वरूपीं मिळवितों ।।२।। 
 दत्तपदीं अभिमान त्यागुनी ।। स्वानंदें निशिदिनीं डुलतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
If you listen Doctrine of Datt (1) |
Realizing You will be permanently composed || Refrain ||
Happiness and sorrow are born of words(2) |
Talk of Bonding(3) and salvation are false || 1 ||
Samadhi and ascension (4) from it, is state of scriptures |
Universe swings is state of Nirvikalp(5) || 2 ||
Form of Universe is state of effortless Samadhi (4) |
Datt always regales in Prayer (6) || 3 ||
(1) 'You are Super soul'
(2) In state of Super Soul there in no sorrow, no happiness.These are just words
(3) Imaginary cycle of Death and rebirth resultant from past sins .
(4) State of no notions, no awareness
(5) Where no doubt thoughts do arise
(6) All transactions taking place is prayer of Datt

ma.Pad_Language: स्वानंदाचा अमल चढला ।। मजला विसरलों ।। गुरुपदीं ऐक्य मी जाहलों
ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वानंदाचा अमल चढला ।। मजला विसरलों ।। गुरुपदीं ऐक्य मी जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 पहातां संसृति मिथ्या झाली ।। अलिप्त उरलों ।। भोगुनी अभोक्ता जाहलों ।।१।।
 भोग्य भोग भोक्ता नाहीं ।। सहज बरळलों ।। समाधिमाजीं सहज डुललों ।।२।।
 स्वरूपलीला सहज जग हें ।। पाहुनी आनंदलों ।। दत्तभजनीं सहज रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
For people engaged in sensual objects I am frightful |
For children of Preceptor I deliver peace 
|| Refrain ||
Pushing behind, Vedas and scriptures |
I show path charted by Avadhut || 1 ||
Bringing all on path of experience |
Assimilate them in form of Self Realization || 2 ||
Sacrificing self pride at feet of Datt |
Day and night I swing in pleasure of self || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालावधूतचरणीं पडतां ।। चाखियली निजशांतिरुचि ।।धृ०।।
 शरण जातां आपुला म्हणविलें ।। काळभीति आतां कैंची ।।१।।
 कल्पित वेदशास्त्रभीति ।। मूढ मानव व्यर्थ रची ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरु हा भेटला मजला ।। अहर्निशीं प्रेम साची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Sway of pleasure of self increased | 
I forgot myself | 
I became unified at feet of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Observing Universe became fictitious |
I remained aloof |
Enjoying objects I became non enjoyer || 1 ||
No enjoyer,object to be enjoyed,enjoyment |
I raved without purpose |
Swang in Samadhi (1) without efforts || 2 ||
This Universe is game play of super soul |
Observing I was joyful |
Just regaled in prayer of Datt || 3 ||
(1) State of tranquility with calming down of notions

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भक्तासी गुरु विकला ।। पाहीं पाहीं ।।धृ०।। 
 भक्तास्तव हा सगुण होउनी ।। निजप्रेमें रमला ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मसहजस्थितीं जग विलसे ।। आपणचि नटला ।।२।।
 स्फुरणातीत स्फुरण सद्गुरु ।। दत्तप्रभु गमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Falling at feet of Balavadhut |
I tasted taste of True peace || Refrain ||
On srrendering He called 'Mine' |
Now what fear of Death God will be || 1 ||
Imaginery fear of Vedas and scriptures |
Ignorant Man piles up in vain || 2 ||
This Preceptor Datt has met me |
Day and night true Love (1) is experienced || 3 ||
(1) Experience that I am the omnipresent super hoil

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बोध गुरूनें केला मजला ।। माझें भान मजला नाहीं ।।धृ०।। 
 तूंचि ब्रह्म म्हणुनी वदतां ।। द्वैतवार्ता मुळीं नाहीं ।।१।। 
 जीव शिव बंध मोक्ष वार्ता ।। स्वरूपीं नसती पहातां तेही ।।२।। 
 दत्तगुरुपदीं अनन्य झालों ।। भजनानंदीं स्वस्थ राहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See ! Observe !
Preceptor is sold to Devotees || Refrain ||
He took human form for Devotees |
And regaled with True Love (1) || 1 ||
The Universe manifests in normal state of Super Soul |
Himself pranked as that (2) || 2 ||
Preceptor is inspiration beyond inspiration (3) |
Beseemed as Lord Datt || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing Super Soul every where 
(2) As universe
(3) Origin of inspiration

ma.Lyrics_Language:
चिंता कासया करिसी ।। गुरुपुत्र होउनी ।।धृ०।। 
 योगक्षेम वाहतो सद्गुरु ।। अभिमान कां धरिसी ।।१।। 
 सहजी सहज होणें जाणें ।। व्यर्थ कां भ्रमसी ।।२।। 
 दत्तगुरुपदीं अभिमान अर्पितां ।। बुडसी प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor preached me truth of Life |
I do not have my awareness || Refrain ||
On His Saying,' You are the Super soul' |
News of duality is not there at all || 1 ||
News of Living entity-Shiv, Bonding(1)-Salvaton, |
When observed are are not in form of Super Soul || 2 ||
I became Ananya(2) at feet of Preceptor Datt |
I remain quiet in pleasure of Prayer || 3 ||
(1) Presumption that we fall in cycle of death and rebirth due to our sins
(2) Faith that none other than Datt is Savior

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सत्यप्रतिज्ञ बालावधूत ।। शांति मज दिधली ।।धृ०।। 
 तत्वमसीचा बोध बाणला ।। द्वैतभीति हरिली ।।१।। 
 आपींआप द्वैताद्वैत ।। खूण ही दावियली ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरुपदीं प्रेमानंदे ।। वृत्ति ही रमली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why do you worry |
Becoming child of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Needs and welfare are provided by Preceptor |
Why do you take it's pride || 1 ||
Becoming departing take place naturally |
Why in vain you get deluded || 2 ||
Offering self pride at feet of Preceptor Datt |
You will submerge in juice of love (1) || 3 ||
(1) Experiencing that everything is manifested by Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मजला विउनी मी वांझ बाई ।। अभ्दुत नवल सांगूं काई ।।धृ०।।
 पुरुषाविण गरोदर झालें ।। पुरुषासी भिन्न मी नाहीं ।।१।।
 आनंदभरें प्रकृति पुरुष ।। द्वैत दाविलें पाहीं ।।२।।
 बालावधूत दत्त जाहला ।। खेळतो प्रेमडोहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Balavadhut is True of his Vow |
Delivered peace to me || Refrain ||
Imbibed teaching of TATVAMASI (1)| 
Removed fear of duality || 1 ||
We ourselves are Dual Nondual | 
This secret is demonstrated || 2 ||
This notion regaled with pleasure of love (2)|
At feet of Preceptor Datt || 3 ||
(1) You (living entity) are That ( Super Soul )
(2) Experiencing that we are the omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
हंसूं येतें मजला आतां ।। मुक्तासी मुक्तीची चिंता ।।धृ०।। 
 कर्माकर्म कल्पुनी व्यर्थ ।। श्रमती जीव आत्महिता ।।१।।
 मिथ्या बंध मोक्ष कल्पुनी ।। शिष्य गुरुपदीं वाढवी द्वैता ।।२।।
 अनुभवदृष्टीं ब्रम्हानंद ।। भासुनी निजशांति दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am sterile woman having given birth to me|
Unprecedented miracle what shall I tell 
|| Refrain ||
I became pregnant without a Male |
I am not different from a Male || 1 ||
Distinction of Female power and Male (1)|
Is demonstrated with pleasure || 2 ||
Balavadhut became me |
Plays in pool of Love(2) || 3 ||
(1) The Super soul gets divided into Female power Shakti and Male power Shiva generating all species movable immovable things
(2) Experience of being omnipresent super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कृपा करीं मज सद्गुरुराया ।। शरण मी तुझ्या पाया ।।धृ०।। 
 भुक्ति मुक्ति नलगे मजला ।। नलगे ही काया ।।१।। 
 सुखही नलगे दुःखही नलगे ।।स्मरतों तव पाया ।।२।। 
 जन्मोजन्मीं होईन दास ।। भजतों दत्तराया ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Emancipated has worry of emancipation(1) |
Now I am made to laugh || Refrain ||
Imagining in vain Doable and nondoable Deeds |
Living entities strive for well being of self (2) || 1 ||
Imagining false Bonding (3) and Salvation |
At seat of Preceptor(4), Disciples further duality || 2 ||
With Vision of experience, observing pleasure of being Super soul |
Datt has True peace || 3 ||
(1) All are Super soul which is unbound free, they worry for emancipation which makes me laugh
(2) Knowledge of self
(3) Imaginary false cycle of death and rebirth due to past sins
(4) Forget that we are one as Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य सद्गुरु बालमुकुंदकृपें ।। निश्चिंत मी जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 सेवा साधन कांहीं नाहीं ।। चरणीं मी लोळलों ।।१।। 
 दीन हीन मी मूढ दास मी ।। वचनीं विश्वासलों ।।२।। 
 मुक्ति नको परी भक्ति देईं मज ।। दत्तपदीं मिळलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Dear King Preceptor grace me |
I have surrendered at your feet || Refrain ||
I do not need Enjoyments nor Salvation | 
I do not need this body as well || 1 ||
I do need happiness, nor sorrow |
I remember. Your feet || 2 ||
I will become your servant for many births |
I pray Dear King Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वसंवेद्य आत्मा नित्य ।। स्वानुभवें पाहीं ।।धृ०।। 
 प्रत्ययमात्र जग हें विलसें ।। अन्य नसे कांहीं ।।१।। 
 मुरडुनी पहातां ब्रह्मचि जगत ।। द्वैत मुळीं नाहीं ।।२।।
 गर्जती वेदशास्त्रपुराणें ।। शांति दत्तपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
By grace of great preceptor Balmukund |
I became worry free || Refrain ||
No service, no means of penance |
I rolled at feet || 1 ||
I am lowly, humble. I am ignorant servant |
I trusted his sayings || 2 ||
I do not want Salvation, but give me Devotion |
I merged with feet of Datta || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
विवेकाचें सोपान चढुनी ।। गेलों सहज शांति चिद्भुवनीं ।।धृ०।।
 सहजीसहज स्फुरण उदेलें ।। जग शिवरूपें भासलें ।। नाहीं स्वरूपा किंचित हानि ।।१।।
 वेदशास्त्र बोधासाठीं ।। पहातां नाहीं पाठीपोटी ।। बालबुद्धिस्तव ही कहाणी ।।२।।
 नाहीं बंध मोक्ष कैंचा ।। शिष्यगुरुभाव केवीं साचा ।। प्रेमास्तव हे दत्तभजनीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Soul is Self cognisant Permanent |
Observe with self experience || Refrain ||
This universe manifests in form of experience|
Nothing else exists || 1 ||
Looking back Super soul is the Universe |
No duality at all || 2 ||
Vedas, Shastras Puranas Proclaim |
Peace is at feet of Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
विश्वंभर हा खेळ खेळुनी ।। भोगी समाधि ।।धृ०।।
 शब्दजाल हा अनंत पसरुनी ।। मौन न मोडे कधीं ।।१।।
 अगणित क्रिया नित्य करूनी ।। अक्रियत्व साधी ।।२।।
 उठणें बसणें सहज स्फुरणें ।। दत्तभजनानंदीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Climbing steps of discernment |
I just went to home of peace, home of Super soul || Refrain ||
Inspiration arose naturally |
Universe seemed to be form of Shiva |
No loss at all to form of Super soul || 1 ||
Vedas and shastras are for Teaching |
Observing there is no back no front (1)|
This story is for childlike thinking || 2 ||
No bonding, What is purpose for salvation |
How presumption of Disciples Preceptor is true |
All these form part of Prayer of Datt for sake of love (2) || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is supreme, it has no beginning, no front, no back. Vedas Shastra are it's creations
(2) Disciples and Preceptor are froms taken by Super soul for experiencing that every thing is super souls manifestation and all transactions are prayer of Datt .

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मौन पिउनी बोलतों ।। अक्रिय सदा क्रिया करितों ।।धृ०।।
 सर्वांठायीं असुनी नाहीं ।। कोठेंही वसतों ।।१।।
 कदा विषय विषयी नोहे ।। त्रिपुटीरूप धरितों ।।२।।
 बध्द नव्हे कीं मुक्तहि नोहे ।। दत्तभजनीं रमतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This omnipresent playing games (1) |
Enjoys Samadhi (2) || Refrain ||
He spreads unlimited net of words |
Never breaks silence (3) || 1 ||
Ever performing countless actions |
Attains inactiveness (4) || 2 ||
Sitting, Getting up, are inspired by Him |
In pleasure of prayer of Datt (5)|| 3 ||
(1) All transactions of world
(2) Trans like situation of engrossed mind
(3) Speaking is bable of words, Super is always silent 
(4) He causes all actions without himself doing anything 
(5) All transactions are prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मंदबुध्दि पडलों चरणीं ।। दयाळा ।। तारीं तारीं मजला ।।धृ०।।
 नेणों भक्ति नेणों युक्ति ।। नेणों योगाला ।।१।।
 नेणें मी ध्यान नेणें मी ज्ञान ।। तारक तूंचि मला ।।२।।
 निजप्रेमाचें दान देईं मज ।। दत्त नामीं रतला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Speaks swallowing Silence I 
The actionless always performs actions(1) II Refrain II
Existing in all places does not exist Resides anywhere II 1 II
Never becomes Sensual object nor enjoyer but I
Takes form of enjoyer, object and enjoyment II 2 II 
Neither Bound (2) nor emancipated Regales in prayer of Datta II 3 II 
(1)Super Soul is beyond words, it does not perform actions It acts speaks through 
(2) Bound is cycle of Death and Rebirth

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भक्ति वंदे साकु ।। मुक्तिगे भक्ति वंदे साकु ।।धृ०।।
 कर्म माडब्याडा ।। अकर्म हूड ब्याडा ।। कर्माकर्म मीरीद गुरुविन ।। मर्मव तिळिमूढा ।।१।।
 योगद संभ्रमा ।। मिथ्या दृश्यद हिरी भ्रमा ।। योगदोळगे शिवयोगवु पडिदरे ।। हरदितु निज कर्मा ।।२।।
 गरवु तळब्याडा ।। सुळ्ळ मरविली बीळब्याडा ।। अरूऊमरऊ मीरीद सद्गुरु ।। बाळन बेरि मूढा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am dimwit fallen at your feet I
O Kind hearted I Save Me Same Me II Refrain II
Neither I know devotion, Nor I know wisdom I
I also do not know Yoga II 1 II
I do not know contemplation, I do not know Self knowledge I
You are the savior for Me II 2 II
Gift me with True Love (1) I
Pant regaled in Name chanting II 3 II
(1) Experience of Super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरुबोधाचा अमल चढला ।। भानरहित झालों ।।धृ०।।
 कोण मी कैंचा आहें कोठें ।। सहज विसरलों ।।१।। 
 त्रिकुटशिखरीं सहस्रदळावरी ।। ब्रम्हरंध्रीं रिघलों ।।२।। 
 कलातीत रंगमहालीं ।। दत्तस्वरूपीं रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Devotion alone is enough I
For Salvation Devotion alone is enough II Refrain II
Do not perform rituals I
Do not indulge in prohibited duties I
Understand the secret of Balavadhut I
Who is beyond rituals and prohibited duties II 1 II
Delusion of Yoga I
Remove delusion of false visible world I
If ShivYoga(1) amongst Yogas is understood I
Routine duties are avoided II 2 II
Do not take to Pride I
Do not fall in false forgetfulness (2) I
O Ignorant ! Understand the Balavadhut I
who is beyond Experience and forgetfulness II 3 II
(1) Being one with Super Soul
(2) Forgetting our Self

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ताने ताने ।। गुरुताने तानु ।। नानु नीनेल्ला पुसियु ।। ताने तानु ।।धृ०।।
 पापविल्ला पुण्यविल्ला ।। ताप सुम्मने पडुवद्याके ।।१।।
 बंध बैलु मोक्ष बैलु ।। संदेह ताळोदु यातकिन्नु ।।२।।
 अरवु सुळ्ळु मरवु सुळ्ळु ।। इरवु श्री बालमुकुंदा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Influence of Teachings of Preceptor has mounted I(Inebriation)
I have been without awareness II Refrain II
Who am I, What am I, Where am I I
I just forgot II 1 II
On the hill of Trio(1) on the Lotus of thousand petals (2) I
I went in the Whole of Super Soul (3) II 2 II
In the penthouse beyond all arts I
I regaled in form of Datt II 3 II
(1)(2)(3) At the top of Spinal cord are three ends at that point 1000 nerves comes together.This is 1000 petal lotus.There is stored nectar which is joint of Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझे स्वरूपीं मीचि रमतों ।। नाहीं दुजी वार्ता ।।धृ०।। 
 स्फुरणचि नाहीं माया कैंची ।। सत्यज्ञानानंता ।।१।। 
 सहजीसहज विश्व स्वरूपें ।। ब्रह्मचि तत्त्वतां ।।२।। 
 पाहुनि ब्रम्हानंदीं नीज ।। सहज आली दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Himself Himself I 
He is Preceptor of Himself I
Myself Yourself is all false II Refrain II
Sin does not exist, Virtues do not exist I
Why in futility shall we take troubles II 1 II
Bonding is aside, Salvation is aside (1) I
Why now shall we have doubts II 2 II
Experience is false, Forgetfulness is false I
Alone existing is Balmukund II 3 II
(1) Imaginary cycle of Death and rebirth, and salvation is for Living Entity and Super Soul is aloof from it.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अनंतरूप असुनी दिसणें ।। हेंचि ब्रम्हस्थिति ।।धृ०।।
 हेतु न कांहीं सहजीसहज ।। चिद्विलासरीति ।।१।। 
 भिन्न भिन्न जरी कल्पित दिसे ।। नाहीं द्वैतभ्रांति ।।२।। 
 सहजानंदें सहज दत्त ।। सहज दावी भक्ति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I Regale in my own form (1)|
No other news || Refrain ||
In absence of inspiration How Illusion can be |
For Truth, Knowledge of Truth, and Eternal - Super Soul || 1 ||
Universe without efforts in its origin |
Is principally only Super Soul || 2 ||
Observing this Datt got effortless sleep |
In pleasure of being Super soul || 3 ||
(1) I got experience that I am Super Soul and regaled in that form only

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रगट असुनी गुप्त जनांसी ।। महिमा सद्गुरुची ।।धृ०।। 
 मुक्तजनांसी मुक्त करितो ।। नवल करणी साची ।।१।। 
 बोध करूनी ब्रह्मानंदा ।। देई आनंदरुचि ।।२।।
 दत्तावधूत आपण होउनी ।। भजनलीला रची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Being Infinite and being seen I
This is the State of Super Soul II Refrain II
Without any Purpose, Without any efforts I
The Process of Chidvilas(1) takes place II 1 II
Though imaginary things are seen as distinct I
No delusion of duality (2) II 2 II
Without efforts Datt in His natural state of pleasure I
Demonstrates in natural way Devotion(3) II 3 II
(1) Everything takes place as manifested by Super soul
(2) We appear as distinct but are singular Super Soul
(3) Single Super Soul becoming Devotee and God Shows Devotion

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नाहीं मुळीं कर्ता ।। केवीं कल्पिसी भोक्ता ।।धृ०।।
 चिद्विलासा मानुनी क्रिया ।। धरिशी अहंता ।।१।।
 कर्त्याचा अभाव पूर्ण कां ।। कर्माची चिंता ।।२।।
 अवधूत करवी दत्त कर्ता ।। भोगी प्रेमामृता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Being obvious,Greatness of Preceptor I
Is Secret to people II Refrain II
He emancipates already emancipated(1) I
Truly a miraculous feat II 1 II
Preaching pleasure of being Super Soul
Delivers taste of Pleasure II 2 II
Becoming Himself Datt and Avadhut I
Errects play of Prayer (2) II 3 II
(1) Everyone is Super soul, which is unbound.These people are again shown that they are free
(2) Super Soul creates Devotees, inspires them to pray and the play continues

ma.Lyrics_Language:
निदसुऱ्याची बोलणीं जाहलीं ।। सिद्धांताची सीमा नुरली ।।धृ०।।
 बोलूं जातां शब्द निमाला ।। ध्याऊं जातां स्फूर्ति निमली ।।१।।
 वर्णूं जातां शास्त्र भागलें ।। "नेति नेति" श्रुतिही वदली ।।२।।
 अवधूतभजनीं रमतो दत्त ।। ब्रह्मानंदडुलकी आली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
No creator exists at all |
How do imagine consumer || Refrain ||
Considering events in Chidvilas (1) as actions You take it's pride || 1 ||
With total absence of Creator |
Why worry for objects || 2 ||
Avadhut performs making Datt as Performer |
Enjoying nectar of love (2)|| 3 ||
(1) Every thing that takes place is done by super soul . Why do we take pride of doing those things
(2) Super soul is sole performer of every thing, knowing this is knowing love of Super Soul. This is the nectar we enjoy.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कासया जन खटपटती ।। माया साचची असती ।।धृ०।।
 रचिली अभावें माया स्वभावें ।। विवेका नाढळे ती ।।१।।
 विद्या अविद्या वंध्यासंतति ।। जीवशिवा तीचि गति ।।२।।
 परात्परेश बालावधूत ।। दत्ता शुध्द प्रचीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Speakings of sleeping ones (1) are over |
Limits of Doctrines did not remain (2) || Refrain ||
Trying to speak words ended (3) |
Trying to contemplate inspiration stopped 
|| 1 ||
Trying to describe the Shastras tired (4) |
Vedas too uttered 'It is not this', 'It is not this ' || 2 ||
Datt regales in prayer of Avadhut |
Experiencing snooze of pleasure of being Super soul (5) || 3 ||
(1) Vedas speak of experience. actual experience is different 
(2) Experience of 'Tatvamasi' and 'Sarvam khalvidam brahma' 
(3) Words are short in explaining Super soul
(4) Shastras to are unable to explain
(5) I am experiencing pleasure of being Super Soul, My awareness is lost

ma.Pad_English: dtt smraa re . abhimaan samul haraa re
ma.Pad_Language: दत्त स्मरा रे । अभिमान समूळ हरा रे
ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्त स्मरा रे ।। अभिमान समूळ हरा रे ।।धृ०।।
 आलों कोठुनि जातों कोठें ।। करा विवेक हा नेटें ।। चालुनी सद्गुरुमथित वाटें ।। भ्रांति हरा रे ।।१।।
 विधि निषेध सर्वही सोडा ।। निरंकुश वृति जोडा ।। व्दैत भ्रांति मनींहुनी दवडा ।। बोध खरा रे ।।२।।
 अंतःकरणीं सद्गुरुभक्ति ।। तरीच पाविजे निश्चिंति ।। दत्तगुरूसी भजनरति ।। भाव धरा रे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why people make efforts |
Considering Illusion as true state|| Refrain ||
Illusion is built naturally from non existence (1)|
Discernment does not find it || 1 ||
Self knowledge and Illusion are children of infertile lady(2) |
Same is case with Living entity and Shiva || 2 ||
Balavadhut is Lord superior to superior |
This is pure experience of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Not realizing Super soul is Illusion. Base of illusion is universe which does not exist
(2) For Super soul self knowledge is absent and illusion is also absent. They are creations of Super soul. Imaginary like children of infertile lady

ma.Lyrics_Language:
घडतां सद्गुरुसंग ।। मनीं भरला रंग ।।धृ०।।
 बालावधूतदर्शन होतां ।। झाला संसृतिभंग ।।१।।
 चिन्मयमूर्ति अंतरीं स्फुरली ।। पाहुनी वृत्ति ही दंग ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंदपदीं दत्त निमाला ।। वाजतो भजनमृदंग ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
ear all ! | Remember Datt |
Removing self pride from its root(1) || Refrain ||
Dear all ! Where I came from,Where I go(2) |
Do this discernment with determination |
Walking on road pioneered by Preceptor |
Remove delusion || 1 ||
Dear all ! 
Abandon all doable and prohibited things |
Adhere to unrestricted Notion |
Remove from mind delusion about duality |
This is true Teaching || 2 ||
Dear all !
Have devotion of Preceptor at core of heart 
Only then You will get worry free state |
Preceptor Datt has enchantment for Prayer 
Have this reckoning || 3 ||
(1) Considering oneself as true is root of self pride
(2) Before birth and after death I am Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्ता याहुनी मौज ती काय ।। दत्ता ।।धृ०।।
 नसतां जन्म मरण कल्पुनी ।। करिती जन हाय हाय ।।१।।
 मुक्त असुनी बद्ध मानिती ।। शोधिती मोक्षसोय ।।२।।
 आनंदरूपें आनंद वांछिती ।। नेणती दत्तपाय ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
On solemnisation of Association with Preceptor |
True Colour (1) is filled in Mind || Refrain ||
On observing Balavadhut |
The temporal affairs are broken(2) || 1 || 
The icon of Super Soul is inspired inside |
Observing this Notion is got absorbed || 2 ||
Datt is extinguished at feet of Balmukund |
Sound of Drum of Prayer is sounded(3)|| 3 ||
(1) Form of Super Soul
(2) Realization that temporal affairs are false is dawned 
(3) Datt is Balmukund, Everyone is Balmukund this sound of Drum in prayer is listened

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भजूं नित्य दत्ता ।। नाणूं मनीं भवचिंता ।।धृ०।।
 काळमर्दन बालावधूत ।। तोचि आमुचा शास्ता ।।१।।
 अंकित गुरूचे चिंता नाहीं ।। नाहीं दुःखवार्ता ।।२।।
 भजनीं भोगुनी जीवन्मुक्ति ।। नित्य स्मरूं दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! What fun other than this can be | 
O Datt! || Refrain ||
Birth being not existent | 
Imagining Death people do Lament (1)|| 1 ||
Being emancipated,presuming Bonding(1) |

Being form of pleasure,desire for pleasure |
Do not know feet of Datt(1) || 3 ||
(1) We are Super soul, not realizing this We fear death, seek emancipation, and desire pleasure - A FUN

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अत्रिनंदना ।। भक्तवंदना ।। तारीं तारीं मजला ।। दत्ता ।।धृ०।।
 या संसारीं श्रमलों भारी ।। आलों शरण तुला ।।१।।
 मिथ्यावाद शास्त्रवेद ।। भुलविती मजला ।।२।।
 व्यर्थ खटपट वाद घटपट ।। झांकिती बोधाला ।।३।।
 दंभभक्ति झकवी मुक्ति ।। नेणुनि युक्तिला ।।४।।
 बालावधूत सत्य दत्त ।। भोगी प्रेमाला ।।५।।

Let us always pray Datt |
Will not bring in mind worry of Bhava (1) || Refrain ||
Destroyer of Death God Balavadhut |
He is our Ruler || 1 ||
We are Devotees of Preceptor no worries |
No news of sorrow || 2 ||
Enjoying Salvation while living in Prayer(2) |
Always let us remember Datt || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of death and rebirth 
(2) This life is prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जय जय सदानंद भोगी ।। सद्गुरु बालमुकुंद योगी ।।धृ०।।
 पारखपुरधीश जंबुगिरीं वास ।। धुंद सदा निजरंगीं ।।१।।
 अंतर योगी बाहेर त्यागी ।। सदा हा बैरागी ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मविद् हा ब्रह्मचि होउनी ।। निजबोध सांगी ।।३।।
 असुनी जनीं हा अलिप्त सदा ।। अंतरीं
 निःसंगी ।।४।।
 अत्रिनंदन दत्तप्रभू हा ।। अवधूत जगीं ।।५।।

Son of Atri , Revered by Devotees, Datt ! |
Save me ! Save me ! || Refrain ||

I have come surrendered to You || 1 ||
Delusive debates, Shastras, Vedas |

Cover true teachings || 3 ||

Not knowing the successful path || 4 ||
Datt is truly Balavadhut |
Enjoyees experience of being omnipresent Super soul || 5 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जीवन्मुक्त तोचि म्हणावा ।। धरितो नित्य शांतिभावा ।।धृ०।।
 विषयसुखा नातळे वृत्ति ।। आत्मानंद सदा बरवा ।।१।।
 सहज समाधि अखंड भोगी ।। विसरेना कदा आत्मठावा ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मविद् न ब्रह्मचि झाला ।। स्मरतो अंतरीं दत्तपाया ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Hail! Hail! Balmukund Yogi I
Who always enjoys pleasure II Refrain II
Ruler of Parishwad, resides in Karadeguddi I
Always absorbed in colour of Super Soul (Self Experience) II 1 II
Internally unified with Super soul, externally detached I

Tells true teachings II 3 II
He being among people is always aloof 
Internally unattached ( pure not tainted) II 4 II
This Lord Datt son of Atri I
Is the Avdhut in this World II 5 II

गुरुपुत्र तोचि जाणा ।। नित्य भजे श्रीगुरुचरणा ।।धृ०।।
 वेदाधिक गुरुवाक्य मानुनी ।। वृत्ति वेधली नामस्मरणा ।।१।।
 अभयवचनें पूर्ण निवाला ।। नाठवे कदा साधनशीणा ।।२।।
 सहज शांति सहज भोगी ।। सहज होउनी दत्तपाहुणा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He alone be called Living and emancipated I
Who always holds stature of peace II Refrain II
Notion does not turn towards pleasure of sensual objects I
Pleasure of Self(1) is always better II 1 II
Always enjoys effortless Samadhi (2)I
Never forgets own form (of being Super soul) II 2 II
Not just knower of Super soul,He himself became Super soul I
Remembers internally feet of Datt II 3 II
(1) Pleasure of knowing that I am Super soul
(2) State of tranquillity free from notions

ma.Lyrics_Language:
तो नर पशु पाहीं ।। पशु पाहीं ।। आपुली ओळख नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 आहार निद्रा भय मैथुन ।। सदा चित्तीं वाही ।।१।।
 आत्मघातकी तोची जाणा ।। संतबोध नाहीं ।।२।।
 संसृतिदुःख भोगी सदा ।। विन्मुख दत्तपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He only be known as child of Preceptor I
Who always prays feet of revered Preceptor II Refrain II
Considering words of Preceptor as superior to Vedas I 
Whose notions are directed to chanting of Name II 1 II
Fully composed with vow of fearlessness I
Never ever remembers efforts for means of penance II 2 II
Enjoys Natural peace without efforts I
Becoming guest of Datt effortlessly (1) II 3 II
(1) Treated by Preceptor as guest

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आत्मस्वरूपीं जागा ।। जनहो सद्गुरु नित्य गा ।।धृ०।।
 भुक्तिमुक्तीची सांडुनी आस ।। निजभक्ति मागा ।।१।।
 ठेउनी लक्ष निजानंदीं ।। मिथ्य विषय त्यागा ।।२।।
 जीवन्मुक्ति भोगुनी सदा ।। दत्तरंगीं रंगा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See that man is Animal I Is Animal I
Who does not recognize Self (1) II Refrain II
Always worries in Heart for I
Food, Sleep, Fear and Sex (2) II 1 II
He Himself be known as self destructor I
As He has not got teachings of Saints II 2 II
Always suffers sorrows of Living I
Turning back from Feet of Datt(3) II 3 II
(1) He is Super Soul
(2) He always worries for these four needs not caring for Who am I what is purpose of life etc.
(3) Not trying to know Datt who will free him from cycle of death and rebirth

ma.Lyrics_Language:
भजतां नित्य दत्तगुरूसी ।। शांति मज मिळली ।।धृ०।।
 विषम संसृति नाठवे कदा ।। निश्चिंति दिधली ।।१।।
 नाहीं तें पुरवुनी आपण रक्षी ।। प्रेमळ गुरुमाउली ।।२।।
 स्वानुभव प्रमाण भजना ।। दत्ता प्रचीति आली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O People ! Be Awake at form of Self (1) I
Always sing Preceptor (Praise Preceptor) II Refrain II
Doing away desire for Enjoyment and Salvation I
Beg for true Devotion II 1 II
Keeping eye on permanent pleasure (2) I
Give away false sensual objects II 2 II
Always enjoying Salvation while living I
Get colored in color of Datt(3) II 3 II
(1) Form of Super soul
(2) Pleasure of experience that we are super soul
(3) Experience that we are Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरु बालावधूता ।। निजस्वरूप दावीं आतां ।।धृ०।।
 पदवनजा भक्त भुलले ।। भृंग होउनी तेथें रतलें ।। सुखामरंदें मत्त जाहले ।। निजभान सहज विसरले ।।चा०।। स्वप्नींही नाहीं संसृति ।। नुरली लेश कालभीति ।। स्वस्वरूप नित्य भोगितां ।।१।।
 कौपीन कांसे कसिला ।। काषाय शोभतो शेला ।। शिरीं जटाभार वाहीला ।। कंठीं त्या अक्षमाला ।।चा०।। भस्मांकित तनु ही पाहीं ।। हरिहर वंदिती पायीं ।। जगासी हाचि उद्धरिता ।।२।।
 पारखपुरीं अवतरी ।। प्रगट जंबूशिखरीं ।। जड मूढ जन उद्धरी ।। सिद्धांतबोध उजरी ।।चा०।। प्रेमास्तव सगुण झाला ।। अवधूतमार्ग स्थापिला ।। निजशांति दिधली दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Praying always Preceptor Datt I
I got Peace II Refrain II
Odd Mundane affairs are never remembered I
Freedom from worries is delivered II 1 II
Herself protects furnishing things wanting I
Mother Preceptor is Affectionate II 2 II
Self Experience is Proof of Prayer I
Pant has got experience II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
तोचि बैरागी बैरागी ।। अहंभाव जो त्यागी ।।धृ०।।
 गृह धन सुत दारा सोडी ।। अंतरीं सदा भोगी ।।१।।
 गृहा विटुनी जंगल वस्ती ।। करितां न निःसंगी ।।२।।
 दत्तपदीं अभिमान अर्पितां ।। नित्य रंगे रंगीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Preceptor Balavadhut ! I Now show Your Original Form II Refrain II
People are enchanted by Lotus feet I Regaled there only becoming Black Bees I
Became furious with honey of pleasure I Just forgot self awareness I
Mundane affairs are not even in Dreams I Fear of Death did not remain even a bit I
On ever enjoying Self Form (Experience that we are Super soul) II 1 II
Loin cloth is tied at waist I Graces Shawl Saffron I
Carrying burden of matted hair on head I In Neck those Garlands of Rudrakshas (1) I
this Body is covered with ash I Shiva and Vishnu pay homage at Feet I
He alone will emancipate the Universe II 2 II
Incarnates at Examination town ( Parshwawad) I Became Apparent in (Bear Hill) Karadeguddi I
Emancipates dimwit and ignorant people I Brightens Teachings of Doctrines (2)I
Took Human form for sake of Love I Established path of Avadhut I
Delivered True peace to Datt II 3 II
(1) Secret fruits those are revered as Eyes of Shiva
(2) Doctrines of TATVAMASI ( You are that), SARVAM KHALU IDAM BRAHM ( All this is Super soul)

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरु अवधूत भला ।। बोधमात्रें शिष्य ब्रह्मचि झाला ।।धृ०।।
 संसारयात्रा खुंटली ।। जन्ममरणाची मिथ्या भीति अटली ।। स्वरूपीं वृत्ति ही नटली ।। माया कल्पित भ्रांति सहज हटली ।।१।।
 जग ब्रह्म एक जाहलें ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूपार्णवीं जीवशिव नुरले ।। वेदशास्त्र भागले ।। "नेति नेति" वदुनी मौन धरिलें ।।२।।
 आत्माचि सर्वांठायीं ।। याविणें दुजें किमपि नाहीं ।। विश्र्व हें आनंदडोहीं ।। प्रेमोल्हासें विलसे दत्तपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He alone is Ascetic ! Ascetic! I
Who sacrifices Self Pride II Refrain II
Not who Abandons Home, Wealth, Children Wife I
Always thinks of enjoyment internally II 1 II
Not one With ennui of Home dwells in Forest I
But is not unattached II 2 II
On Sacrificing Self Pride at feet of Datt I
Always regales in color of Super soul II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मौनसुख सेवी ।। रतली वृत्ति गुरुपायीं ।।धृ०।।
 बोलूं जातां बोल न सरे ।। रूप न पडे ठायीं ।।१।।
 गुरुबोधाविणें शांति न मिळे ।। फिरतां दिशा दाही ।।२।।
 सर्व सांडुनी शांत मी झालों ।। दत्तगुरुपायीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor Avadhut is Better I
On his teachings disciple became Super Soul itself II Refrain II
Pilgrimage of life ceased I 
False fear of Birth and Death Dried up I
Notion pranked in in form of Self I
Illusion induced delusion just retreated II 1 II
Universe and Super soul became one I
In ocean of form of Super soul, Living entity and Siva didn't remain I
Vedas and Shastras tired I
Uttering 'It is not this','It is not this' took to silence II 2 II
Soul alone is in all places I
Except this nothing else at all exists I
This Universe in Lake Pleasure I
Resides at feet of Datt with exuberance of Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experiencing Super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
छंद गुरूचा लागला ।। अहंभाव समूळ गेला ।।धृ०।।
 नाठवे गेह नाठवे देह ।। नाठवे ममता मला ।।१।।
 नाठवे भक्त नाठवे देव ।। बंधमोक्षगोष्टीला ।।२।।
 आठवे अवधूत आठवे स्वरूप ।। भजतों दत्तगुरूला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I enjoy pleasure of silence I
Notions have regaled at feet of Preceptor (1)II Refrain II
Trying to speak, Speech does not end I
Form is not seen in its place II 1 II
Without Teachings of Preceptor, Peace is not gained I 
Even Wandering in ten Directions II 2 II
Leaving every thing I have become composed I
At feet of Preceptor Datt II 3 II 
(1) Speech is incapable to describe Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अजड सद्गुरु जडमती मी ।। घेईं मज पदरीं ।।धृ०।।
 चंडतेज तव दंडधारी ।। खंडिसी भववैरी ।।१।।
 कष्ट दूर करीं भ्रष्ट मी जहालों ।। श्रेष्ठ नरहरी ।।२।।
 सत्यप्रतिज्ञा नित्यानंदा ।। दत्तासी तारी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have acquired hobby of Preceptor |
Self pride has disappeared with roots 
|| Refrain ||
I do not remember Home, I do not remember Body |
I do not remember affection || 1 ||
I do not remember Devotee, I do not remember God |
I do not remember story of Bonding(1) and salvation || 2 ||
I remember Avadhut,I remember Self form |
I pray preceptor Datt || 3 ||
(1) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth, due to past sins.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सांप्रदाय सद्गुरूचा ।। बहु परंपरेचा ।।धृ०।।
 सिंहासनारूढ जरी जाहला ।। मान राखी मातेचा ।।१।।
 पूर्ण बोधोपरी कृतघ्न नोहे ।। अंकित सद्गुरूचा ।।२।।
 जीवन्मुक्त होउनी भजन ।। सहजानंद प्रेमाचा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Preceptor ! Form of inspiration, I am dimwit | 
Take me in Lap || Refrain ||
O Stick holder having enormous Aura |
You destroy enemy of Bhava (1) || 1 ||
Remove hardships, I have become corrupt |
O Great Narahari(2) ! || 2 ||
O Ever pleasure ! True to vow |
Uplift Datt || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of death and rebirth 
(2) Super soul Narasinha Saraswati

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बाळासी प्रभुत्व आलें ।। मातेसी न धिःकारिलें ।।धृ०।।
 अगम्य गौरव गुरूचें ।। शिष्यभावा कधीं नाकळे ।।१।।
 कर्णधारा परतीरीं वधिले ।। असें लौकिकीं नायिकिलें ।।२।।
 स्वयंब्रह्म होउनी नित्य ।। दत्तगुरुभजनीं रमले ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Path of Preceptor |
Has very old Tradition || Refrain ||
Even if coronated on Throne |
Keeps respect of Mother || 1 ||
Fully enlightened but not ungrateful |
Servant of Preceptor || 2 ||
Prayer with experience of salvation while living |
Pleasure of Love (1) without efforts || 3 ||
(1) Experience of Super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मूळ स्वभाव सद्गुरुभक्ति ।। कांहीं केल्या सुटेना ।।धृ०।।
 जीवन्मुक्त जरी मी झालों ।। प्रेमोदधि आटेना ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मानंद भोगितों सदा ।। भजना वृत्ति विटेना ।।२।।
 दत्तचरण सोडुनी वृत्ति ।। अन्य ठायीं नटेना ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Child rose to Controlling position I
It did not damn the Mother II Refrain II
Unknown Laurels of Preceptor I
Are never known with position as Disciple II 1 II
Captain is killed on the other Bank I
Such news is not heard in Public II 2 II
Always becoming Super soul Himself I
Regaled in Prayer of Preceptor Datt II 3 II

ma.Lyrics_Language:
परेसी मिठी पडली ।। स्वानुभव मात सरली ।।धृ०।।
 द्वैताद्वैत चिद्विलास ।। देखुनी वृत्ति ही निमली ।।१।।
 धन्य दैवाचा सार्थक जहालें ।। प्रसन्न गुरुमाउली ।।२।।
 आमरणांत भजन गुरूचें ।। दत्ता खूण ठसली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Original nature Devotion of Preceptor I
Does not leave Whatever is done II Refrain II
Even if I became emancipated while Living I
Ocean of Love (1) is not drying up II 1 II
Always I enjoy pleasure of being Super soul I
Notion does not get ennui of Prayer II 2 II
The Notion, leaving feet of Datta I
Does not regale at other places II 3 II
(1) Experience of being Omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
विसरूं नको तो दत्त ।। भक्ताभिमानी अवधूत ।।धृ०।।
 भजन पूजन करीं नित्य तयाचें ।। होसी सहज निश्र्चिंत ।।१।।
 अनन्यभावें भजतां ।। त्यासी होसी जीवन्मुक्त ।।२।।
 स्वानुभव खूण दत्त सांगतो ।। होउनी पूर्ण शांत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Para Speech(1) was embraced I
Talk of Self experience ended (2) II Refrain II
Observing Chidvilas (3) of Duality, Non duality I
This My Notion is calmed down II 1 II
Had been a great fortune, I am fulfilled I
The Mother Preceptor graced II 2 II
Prayer of Preceptor till end of life I
This mark is imbibed to Datta ( Pant) II 3 II
(1) Origin of speech 
(2) I am experiencing that I am Super Soul, I have lost self awareness and have merged in Super Soul. I have not remained separate to experience self.
(3) Duality and Non duality are creations of Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आतां सद्गुरुभजनीं लागलों ।। देहासवें व्यर्थ भागलों ।।धृ०।।
 असम्यग् दृष्टी न निवळे ।। बोध करितां बहुत श्रमलों ।।१।।
 सुख न देई अज्ञस्थिति ।। सम्यज्ञानभागी झालों ।।२।।
 असुनी नसे संसृतिमाजीं ।। दत्तस्वरूपीं सहज रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Do not forget that Datt I
The Avadhut proud of Devotees II Refrain II
Perform regularly His worship and Prayer I
Without efforts You will become worry free II 1 II
Praying Him with faith Ananya(1) I
You will be emancipated while living II 2 II
Pant tells secret of His own experience I
Becoming fully composed II 3 II
(1) Faith that Datt alone and none else is savior

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सिद्धांत हे निदसुऱ्याचे ।। ब्रह्मविदा केवीं रुचे ।।धृ०।।
 अध्यारोप अपवाद मार्गीं ।। वदूं नये वदलों साचे ।।१।।
 "सर्वं खलु इदं ब्रह्म" ।। श्रुति बोले द्वैत कैंचें ।।२।।
 भजनव्यवहार चाले नित्य ।। दत्ता व्यसन निजप्रेमाचें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I suffered in vain with body |
Now I have taken up to Prayer of Preceptor || Refrain ||
The unequal vision does not get diluted |
I tired much in preaching the Truth || 1 ||
State of ignorance does not give happiness|
I became bestowed with True Knowledge || 2 ||
I am in universe but am not involved |
I regaled in form of Datta without efforts || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बोलूं जातां बोलचि सरला ।। परेसी अनुभव जिरला ।।धृ०।।
 पाहूं जातां दृश्य द्रष्टा ।। मिथ्याभेद सहज निमला ।।१।।
 एकीं अनेक अनेकीं एक ।। चिद्विलास सहज स्फुरला ।।२।।
 दत्तबालावधूतस्वरूपीं ।। रंगातीत रंग उदेला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
These Doctrines are of sleeping persons (1) |
How will relish Cognitor of Super soul 
|| Refrain ||
I should not have spoken, but I spoke |
Through path of ascription and exception (2) || 1 ||
Veda says , " All this is but Super soul"|
How will there be duality || 2 ||
Practice of Prayer (3) is always running |
Pant has addiction of true love (4) || 3 ||
(1) Vedas are past their experience is like experience of sleeping person 
(2) Ascribing everything as Super soul and excluding every thing to find that finally only Super soul is in core.
(3) All transactions are but prayer of preceptor

ma.Lyrics_Language:
करितां भजन सद्गुरुचें ।। सुख भोगिलें साचें ।।धृ०।।
 ग्रंथिभेद संशयछेद ।। धांवे पुरले वृत्तीचे ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मस्वरूपीं कांहीं न जाहलें ।।ध्यान नसे मुक्तीचें ।।२।।
 नाहीं सुखदुःख सहजानंद ।। प्राप्त प्रेम दत्ताचें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Trying to speak, Speech itself ended |
Experience was taken down at Para Speech || Refrain ||
Trying to see observer and the scene |
False distinction just ended || 1 ||
Many in One, One in many |
Chidvilas (1) was inspired with no efforts || 2 ||
In the form of Balavadhut Datt |
Colour beyond colours(2) has dawned || 3 ||
(1) Every thing that happens is creation of Super soul - CHIT
(2) Origin of colors Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शिवस्वरूप दत्तगुरु हा ।। कां रे भजा ना ।।धृ०।।
 "नेह नानास्तिकिंचन" ।। श्रुति ही ऐका ना ।।१।।
 "विभाति यस्य भासा सर्वं" ही ।। अनुभव हा नेणा ।।२।।
 "सर्वं खलु इदं ब्रह्म" ।। मौन दत्तराणा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
On performing prayer of Preceptor |
True happiness is enjoyed || Refrain ||
Knot is united (1) Doubt is cut (2) |
Yearnings of notions are fulfilled || 1 ||
In the form of Super soul nothing has happened (3) |
Salvation is not even in contemplation(4) || 2 ||
No happiness, no sorrow, just effortless pleasure |
Love of Datt is bestowed (5) || 3 ||
(1) Conviction that I am living entity is loosened with experience that I am Super soul 
(2) Doubt of duality of Me and Super soul ended.
(3) All things that happen, do not affect Super soul
(4) I am not living entity, I have no Birth|Death. Thus I am emancipated. Since I am emancipated I cannot contemplate about emancipation.
(5) Experience that I am omnipresent Super soul is experienced.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अवधूतमूर्ति पहातां नयनीं ।। वृत्ति तटस्थ जहाली ।।धृ०।।
 पायीं पादुका कौपिन कांसे ।। वामकक्षीं झोळी ।।१।।
 स्फटिक रुद्राक्षहार शोभती ।। बोधयष्टि धरिली ।।२।।
 जटा मुगुट मस्तकीं शोभे ।। भस्में तनु शोभली ।।३।।
 सदा वरदहस्त भक्तानंद ।। दत्तगुरुमाउली ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Preceptor is the Form of Shiva (1)|
Why shall you not Pray || Refrain ||
"Nothing here is different even a bit "(2)|
Listen this Saying of Veda || 1 ||
Understand the experience |
"Whose impressions appear in all things" (3) || 2 || 
" All this is but Super soul " (4) |
King Datt is Silent || 3 ||
(1) Preceptor is Super soul, the pure, blemishless form of Auspicious Shiva
(2) NEH NANASTI KINCHAN- VEDAS
(3) VIBHATI YASYA BHASA SARV- Vedas
(4) SARVAM KHALU IDAM BRAHMA

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रेमळ गुरु बालावधूत ।। दर्शनें शांत झाला भक्त ।।धृ०।।
 भ्रांती तुटली आहेनाहींची ।। त्रिपुटी गिळुनी स्वरूपीं रत ।।१।।
 कांहीं न झालें कांहीं न केलें ।। सहजीसहज स्वरूप प्राप्त ।।२।।
 अहंवृत्ति ग्रासुनी बोधें ।। तूष्णीभूत सहज दत्त ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Icon of Avadhut by eyes |
Notions became neutral || Refrain ||
Wooden footrests in feet, loin cloth on waist |
Big cotton bag on left shoulder || 1 ||
Garlands of quartz and Rudraksh (1) are beseeming |
Holds stick of teachings || 2 ||
Crown of matted hair befits on head |
Body is adorned with Ash || 3 ||
His hand always in blessing mode |
The Mother Preceptor Datt is pleasure of Devotees || 4 ||
(1) A dried forest fruit having surface like eyes.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वाचातीता स्तवूं जातां ।। परा निवाली ।। चेतोपर ध्यान करितां ।। वृत्ति मावळली ।।धृ०।।
 अरूपाचें दर्शन घेतां ।। दृष्टि परतली ।। अगम्य स्थितीं जातां सहज ।। क्रिया निमाली ।।१।।
 त्रिपुटीरहिता भजूं जातां ।। शाक्तिही निमली ।। अद्वैताची पूजा करितां ।। स्फूर्ति ही नुठली ।।२।।
 दृश्य द्रष्टा दत्त साचा ।। भक्ताची माउली ।। ब्रह्मानंद सर्वांठायीं ।। प्रेमसुगी जाहली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Balavadhut is Affectionate Preceptor |
Meeting Devotee became composed || Refrain ||
Delusion of Existence Nonexistence was cut |
Swallowing Triputi (1) regaled in form of self || 1 ||
Nothing did happen, Nothing was done |
Form of Self (2) was attained without efforts || 2 ||
Swallowing Notion of I with his teaching |
Datt just became silent || 3 ||
(1) Three parts of all actions, Actor, Object of Action, and actual action 
(2) Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अवधूतभजना फार सोकलों ।। माझा मीपणा सहज विसरलों ।।धृ०।।
 गुरुविणें अन्य जगतीं नाहीं ।। पाहुनी स्वरूपीं नित्य भुललों ।।१।।
 गुरु माय पिता गुरु बंधु त्राता ।। गुरूसी मी शरण गुरूसी मी विकलों ।।२।।
 नाहीं कांहीं आस गुरुपदीं वास ।। दत्त प्रेमामृतीं पूर्ण न्हालों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Trying to praise Him beyond speech (1), Para speech calmed down |
Contemplating Him beyond consciousness (1), Notion extinguished || Refrain ||
Observing the Formless, Vision returned |
Reaching normally unapproachable state(1), Activity ceased || 1 ||
Trying to pray Him beyond Triputi(1), 
Energy extinguished |
Worshiping Him Nondual (1), Inspiration did not arise || 2 ||
Observer and Observed are really Datt, Mother of Devotees |
Everywhere is pleasure of being Super soul (1), Harvest of Love (2) is reaped || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is beyond speech, beyond contemplation, Formless, Unapproachable, 
Beyond three sections of performance- performer- object- performance
(2) Experience that I am the omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
नमन करितां सद्गुरूसी ।। अहंवृत्ति गळली ।।धृ०।।
 तनु मन धन अर्पण करितां ।। निश्र्चिंति जाहली ।।१।।
 गुरुबोधामृत प्राशन करितां ।। ब्रह्मपुष्टि जाहली ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरुपदीं नित्य लोळतां ।। प्रेमलहरी उठली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am much addicted to Prayer of Avadhut |
I just forgot my self pride || Refrain ||
Except Preceptor nothing exists in World. |
Observing I am always enchanted by form of Super soul || 1 ||
Preceptor is Mother Father, Preceptor is Brother Savior |
I am surrendered to Preceptor, I am sold to Preceptor || 2 ||
No other desire, Dwelling at feet of Preceptor |
I am fully bathed in Nectar of Love(1) of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Experience of omnipresent Super Soul Preceptor everywhere.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सद्गुरुमूर्ति पाहुनी ।। जाहली तटस्थ वृत्ति ।।धृ०।।
 निज भक्तांची ही माता ।। निर्गुण सगुण झाली ।। दिव्य बोध प्रेरुनी जगतीं ।। केवळ मुक्ति प्रगटिली ।। स्वानंदीं मग्न सदा ।। मुमुक्षु जनां माउली ।। चाल० ।। पदीं पडतां अभिमान धरिला ।। अनादि बोध बोधिला ।। निजशांतिमार्ग दाविला ।। खंडिला भव दिली शांति ।।१।।
 कौपीन कांसे दंड हातीं ।। काषायवस्त्र तनुवरी ।। भस्मांकित सुतनु शोभे ।। सुरधेनु सदा सहचरी ।। चहूं वेद श्वान होउनी ।। लोळती सद्गुरुद्वारीं ।। चा०।। अगम्य ध्यान तुझें देवा ।। खुंटला हरिहरहेवा ।। मनवाणीसी न ठावा ।। आठवितां निमली स्फूर्ति ।।२।।
 पारखपुरीं जन्मुनी ।। प्रगट जंबूशिखरीं ।। जनीं वेड पांघरूनियां ।। जडमूढ जनां उद्धरी ।। अलिप्त सदा असुनी ।। अवधूतमार्ग पसरी ।। चा०।। प्रगटला वेणूनगरीं ।। सिद्धांत बोध उजरी ।। कैवल्य नांदतें घरीं दत्तासी भजनप्रीति ।।३।।

भक्ति मज देईं मज देईं ।। मागणें आणिक नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 ताजी भाकर अथवा शिळी ।। देईं भुकेच्या वेळीं ।।१।।
 नवें जुनें वस्त्र आंगावरी ।। वस्ती घरीं विवरीं ।।२।।
 सज्जन दुर्जन संग असुंदे ।। सुखवीं ब्रह्मानंदें ।।३।।
 तुझिये पायां परती दत्ता ।। मुक्ति न लगे आतां ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observing Icon of Preceptor | Notion became Neutral || Refrain ||
This Mother of unswerving Devotees | Being formless took Human form |
Inspiring divine teachings in the world |Unfolded pure Salvation |
Always engrossed in pleasure of self |Became mother for Salvation seekers |
On falling at feet took over our pride |Eternal teaching is thought |
Path of true peace is shown |Destroying Bhava{(1), delivered Peace || 1 ||
Loin cloth at waist, stick in hand |Saffron drape on the body |
Body beseems nice ash covered |Cow of God's always as companion |
Four Vedas becoming dogs |Roll at door of Preceptor |
Your contemplation is beyond reach |Envy of Vishnu, Brahma and Shiva is ceased |
Is not known to mind and speech |On remembering inspiration extinguished || 2 ||
Taking birth at Parishvad |Became known at Karadeguddi |
Taking cover of being a madman in people |Uplifts ordinary and ignorant people |
Always being aloof |Spreads path of Avadhut |
Became evident at Belgaum |Preached teaching of Doctrines(1) |
Salvation dwells in Home |Datt has enchantment in Prayer || 3 ||
(1) , TATVAMASI, SARVAM KHALU IDAM BRAHMA etc.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पारखपुरधीश अवधूतदर्शनें ।। सार्थक हें जाहलें ।।धृ०।।
 जंबूशिखरीं आनंदमूर्ति ।। पाहुनी मन निमलें ।।१।।
 षण्मुद्रांकित अखंड तनु ।। वेद मौनावले ।।२।।
 कैवल्य हा बालमुकुंद ।। दत्तभजनीं कळलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Give me Devotion, Devotion |
I have no other asking || Refrain |
Bread fresh or stale |
Give me at the time of Hunger || 1 ||
New or old attire on Body |
Stay at Home or Cave || 2 |f
Let company of virtuous people or Scoundrels be there |
Delight me with pleasure of being Super soul || 3 ||
Other than your feet, O Datt ! |
Now Salvation is not needed || 4 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मुक्त तोची मुक्त तोची ।। द्वैतकल्पना निमली ज्याची ।।धृ०।।
 येतां जातां अन्य नाहीं ।। देह निमतां कैवल्य साचि ।।१।।
 जेथें तेथें भरलें ब्रह्म ।। चैतन्यासी हानि कैंची ।।२।।
 ज्ञानाज्ञानस्थिति गिळुनी ।। सहज स्थिति दत्तगुरूची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
With meeting of Ruler of Parshwawad Avadhut |
This fulfillment has occurred || Refrain ||
Seeing the icon of pleasure on hill of Karadeguddi |
Mind has been composed || 1 ||
