Body fully covered with six insignias (1)|
Even Vedas became silent || 2 ||
This Balmukund is experience of salvation |
Was understood in Prayer of Datt(2) || 3 ||
(1) Marks on body
(2) All transactions in universe are Prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहा हें वैभव ज्ञान्याचें ।। सोहाळे निजानंदाचे ।।धृ०।।
 भक्त न देव बंध न मुक्ति ।। नांव न द्वैताचें ।।१।।
 वेद न शास्त्र योग न ध्यान ।। महत्त्व न बोधाचें ।।२।।
 कल्पित कैवल्य कल्पित शांति ।। दृश्य हें कल्पिताचें ।।३।।
 सत्य हा दत्त सत्य बालावधूत ।। नित्य भजनीं नाचे ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He alone is emancipated, He alone is emancipated |
Whose idea of duality is extinguished 
|| Refrain ||
None other exists while coming going(1) |
On extinction of Body remains form of Super soul only || 1 ||
Everywhere is filled Super soul|
How can there be loss to Vitality (2) || 2 ||
Swallowing state of Self Realization, Ignorance |
Is normal state of Preceptor Datt (3)|| 3 ||
(1) Before birth there is Super soul, After we die what remains is same Super soul. None other is there
(2) Super soul is Vitality in body. It does not extinguish
(3) Original state is Super soul. Self realized as well as ignorant both are primarily Super soul only.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गारुड पहा गुरुपुत्राचें ।। ब्रह्मनंदें सदा नाचे ।।धृ०।।
 भोग भोगुनी ब्रह्मचारी ।। धर्माधर्म त्यासी कैंचे ।।१।।
 नित्यमुक्तासी मुक्त करितो ।। बोधाबोध देतो साचे ।।२।।
 अमृतासी अमृत पाजुनी ।। सदा गुरुभजनीं दत्त नाचे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe this splendour of Self Realized Person I
Celebrations of True Pleasure(1) II Refrain II
Neither Devotee nor God, Neither Bonding(2) nor Salvation I
Not even mention of Duality II 1 II
Neither The Vedas nor Shastras. Neither Yoga nor Meditation I
No Importance of Teachings(3) II 2 II
Samadhi(4) is imaginary. Peace is imaginary I
All visible world is of Imagination II 3 II
This Datt is True, Balavadhut is True I
Always dances in Prayer (5) II 4 II
(1) Pleasure that I am the omnipresent Supersoul
(2) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth which we succumb as per our Karmas
(3) When I myself realize that I am Super soul Teachings are not needed
(4) State of absence of notions, volitions merged in experience of being Super soul
(5) All transaction are Prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
देशिकपदनीरजालि होईं मानवा ।। कल्पित भ्रम निरसुनियां तरसी या भवा ।।धृ०।।
 अत्यंताभाव सृष्टी सत्य मानिसी ।। मिथ्य जन्म मरण कल्पुनी दुःख भोगिसी ।। स्वयंब्रह्म सिद्ध असतां जीव म्हणविसी ।। नित्यानंद स्वरूप तुझें देव बरवा ।।१।।
 अज्ञजनबोधहेतु शास्त्रप्रक्रिया ।। योगोपासन धर्म कर्म साधनक्रिया ।। अध्यारोप अपवाद कल्पित माया ।। सम्यज्ञानदृष्टीं पहातां ।। खेळ आघवा ।।२।।
 सत्यज्ञानानंत सद्गुरुस्थिति ।। पाप पुण्य बंध मोक्ष व्यर्थ कल्पिती ।। त्रिपुटी ग्रासुनी विश्व पहातां मुक्ति भोगिती ।। प्रेमभरें भजनीं नित्य दत्त आठवा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See miracle of child of Preceptor |
Always dances with pleasure of being Super soul || Refrain ||
Enjoys sensual objects but Celibate |
How will he have religiousness or otherwise || 1 ||
He emancipates ever emancipated |
Gives him real Teachings and non Teachings (1) || 2 ||
Makes Nectar drink Nectar |
Datt always dances in Preceptors Prayer (1)|| 3 ||
(1) Pant is child of Preceptor, is Super soul. He knows all are his manifestations. This he teaches to these manifested persons. Then he revels in the world which is Prayer of Preceptor.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रपंच हा परमार्थ जाहला ।। व्यवहार हा शांतीनें भरला ।।धृ०।।
 पाप पुण्य बंध मोक्ष संशय नुदेला ।। जीवशिव भेद नाहीं स्वप्नीं ब्रह्मचि भरला ।।१।।
 येणें नाहीं जाणें नाहीं गुरुमार्ग भला ।। प्रासंगिक नीति साची संशय नुरला ।।२।।
 प्रेमास्तव गुरुशिष्याचा खेळ प्रगटला ।। दत्तावधूत ब्रह्मानंदीं सहज डुलला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Man ! Become Bumblebee in lotus of feet of Preceptor |
Then imaginary delusion (1) is done away and you will cross this Bhava (2)
|| Refrain ||
This totally non existent Universe, You presume to be true |
Imagining false Birth and Death, suffer sorrows |
Being proven that you are Super soul, you call yourself as living entity |
Your form is better of ever pleasant God 
|| 1 ||
Process of shastras is for teaching ignorant people |
The actions of Yoga, Upasana, Religion, Karma and means of penance |
Super imposition, Exception is imaginary illusion |
Observing with equated vision all is His game || 2 ||
State of Preceptor is truth, knowledge of truth, and eternity |
Sin, Virtues, Bonding, Salvation, are imagined in futility |
Enjoy Salvation Observing Universe doing away Triputi (3) |
Always remember Datt with love (4) in Prayer || 3 ||
(1) I am living entity
(2) Cycle of birth and death
(3) Three parts of action performer, object, performance
(4) Experiencing that You are Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दुःख नाहीं दुःख नाहीं ।। सुखासी दुःख म्हणती पाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 स्वाभाविक सुखेच्छा ही ।। दुःख न मागती कांहीं ।।१।।
 सुख वांछुनी दुःख मागती ।। ऐसें न घडे कांहीं ।।२।।
 सुख दुःख हा शब्दमहिमा ।। नसती दत्तगृहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Mundane affairs became path of self Realization |
These routine transactions are filled with peace || Refrain ||
Sin, virtue, Bonding(1), Salvation doubts did not dawn |
Distinction of living entity, Shiva, is not even in dream, Super soul only pervaded|| 1 ||
No coming, no going, path of Preceptor is better |
Ethics become circumstantial, doubt (2) did not remain || 2 ||
The play of Preceptor and disciple unfolded for love |
Avadhut Datt effortlessly swings in pleasure of being Super soul || 3 ||
(1) Imaginary cycle of death and rebirth,due to our karmas
(2) Doubt that I am living entity suffering sin, virtue, bonding, Salvation.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शांति सखी सवें घेउनी ।। सहज निद्रा केली ।।धृ०।।
 वेदशास्त्रांचा वारुनी गलबला ।। उन्मनीच्या महालीं ।।१।।
 जीवशिवदूत दवडुनी परती ।। स्वरूपीं वस्ती केली ।।२।।
 जागृति निद्रा परती करूनी ।। दत्तभक्ति वरिली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
No woes, No woes |
See happiness is called as woes || Refrain ||
Desire for happiness is natural |
Woes are not desired, any where || 1 ||
Desiring happiness request for woes |
Thus never occurs || 2 ||
Happiness Sorrows are matter of words |
Do not exist in Home of Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जीवन्मुक्ति सारूनी मागें !! दत्तभजन करितों !! धृ० !!
 विषयीं ब्रह्मानंद भोगी ।। सहज विचरतों ।।१।।
 त्याग ग्रहण नाहीं मुळीं ।। आहे तसा राहतों ।।२।।
 प्रेमास्तव गुरुदत्तभजनीं ।। सहजानंदें रमतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Taking Friend Peace with me I
I just took to sleep II Refrain II
In Palace of Unmani (1) I
Doing away Hubbub of Vedas and Shastras II 1 II
Sending back emissaries Living entity and Shiva I
I took halt at My own Form II 2 II
Going beyond state of Awakening and Sleep I
I opted for Devotion of Datt II 3 II
(1) State beyond Awakening,Dream, Deep Sleep, Turya. Here awareness of mind is lost. Mind is composed and experience that I am Super soul is experienced

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अजन्म हा जन्मा आला ।। गुरुरूपें दिसला ।।धृ०।।
 मार्ग वेदाचा प्रगट कराया ।। भूवरी अवतरला ।।१।।
 भक्तजनासी गौरव देउनी ।। सिद्धची उदेला ।।२।।
 सत्य मार्ग हा दत्तप्रभूचा ।। निजानंदें भरला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Pushing back Jeevanmukti (1) I
I perform Prayer of Datt II Refrain II
Enjoying in sensual objects, pleasure of being Super soul I
I wander purposeless II 1 II
Neither Sacrifice nor adoption exist at all I
I remain as I am II 2 II
In Prayer of Preceptor Datt, for sake of Love (2) I
I regale in pleasure naturally II 3 II
(1) Living normally experiencing salvation
(2) For experiencing the pleasure of being omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्तावधूत भक्ताभिमानी ।। नको मनीं शंका ।।धृ०।।
 सत्यप्रतिज्ञ सत्यवचनी ।। त्रिभुवनीं डंका ।।१।। भाविकाची प्रेमळ जननी ।। पोषिते बाळका ।।२।।
 अंतर्बाह्य व्याप्ति जयाची ।। दत्तगुरू नीका ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This unborn has come to be born I
Is seen in form of Preceptor II Refrain II
To unfold path of Vedas I
Has Incarnated on the Earth II 1 II
Giving Honours to Devotees folk I
Proven Ascetic has dawned II 2 II
This True path of Lord Datt I
Is filled with True Pleasure (1) II 3 II
(1) Ever cognisance that I am the Omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
निजशांति दिधली ।। सद्गुरुनें ।।धृ०।।
 ग्रथिं भेदुनी संशय छेदुनी ।। निजखूण दाविली ।।१।।
 कल्पित बंध मोक्ष हरूनी ।। निश्चिंति केली ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदें दत्तस्वरूपीं ।। स्फूर्ति बुडविली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Avadhut Datt is Proud of Devotees I
Do not have doubt in Mind II Refrain II
True to his Vow, True to His Sayings I
His Drumbits (1) sound in three worlds(2) II 1 II
Affectionate Mother of venerating devotees I
Nurtures the Children (3) II 2 II
Who is pervaded inside and out I
Genuine Preceptor Datt II 3 II
(1) Fame
(2) Heaven, Hell and Earth
(3) Devotees

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वं खलु इदं ब्रह्म सद्गुरुप्रचीति ।। "नेह नानास्ति किंचन" गर्जते श्रुति ।।धृ०।।
 ब्रह्मसागरीं विश्ववीचि द्वैत मुळीं नाहीं ।। जन्मलें निमलें कल्पना व्यर्थ आहे तैसे पाहीं ।। पाहूं जातां अन्य नाहीं ब्रह्म सहजस्थिती ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मचि विश्व विश्वचि ब्रह्म नाहीं भेद जाणा ।। बंधचि मोक्ष मोक्षचि बंध देती शास्त्रखूणा ।। शिष्य गुरूची मिथ्य भावना नाहीं आदि अंतीं ।।२।।
 दुःखची नाहीं सुख कैंचें कासया खंती ।। नाहीं समाधि उत्थानाची व्यर्थची भीति ।। पाहुनी दत्त प्रेमें धरी गुरुभजनीं प्रीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor has given True Peace II Refrain II
Untying the knot(1), Cutting Doubt (2) I
Demonstrated True Mark (3) II 1 II
Snatching imaginary Bonding (4) and Salvation I
Worryfreeness is created II 2 II
In pleasure of being Super soul I
Inspiration is merged in Form of Datt II 3 II
(1)(2) I am Living entity distinct from Super Soul
(3) I am the Super soul
(4) Imaginary cycle of Birth and death resulting from our Karmas

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अमल चढला आनंदाचा ।। द्वैतभान नाहीं ।।धृ०।।
 अंतर्बाह्य नाठवे मुळीं ।। भेद नुरला कांहीं ।।१।।
 देवचि भक्त भक्तचि देव ।। ब्रम्हानंदडोहीं ।।२।।
 सहजी सहज समाधि प्राप्त ।। दत्तभजनीं पाहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
All this is but Super soul' is experience of Preceptor I
' Nothing distinct exists a bit' Uproars Veda II Refrain II
In the ocean of Super soul, Universe is wave, No distinction at all I
Born, Died, are futile ideas All ia as it is I
Observing there is nothing distinct. It is Natural state of Super soul II 1 II
Super soul is Universe, Universe is Super soul, Understand there is no difference I
Bonding is Salvation, Salvation is Bonding Shastras reveal this secret (1) I
The false feeling of Preceptor and Disciple is not at all at Beginning or end II 2 II
Sorrowness is not there at all, How can Happiness be ? Why have distress I
Samadhi is not there, Unnecessary fear of ascension I
Datt Observing this, holds with love enchantment in Prayer of Preceptor (2)II 3 II
(1) Everything is Super soul, which has no birth, no death. Bonding is cycle of
Birth and Death. It is our imagination that we are bound in this cycle. 
All are emancipated. With no bonding emancipation too is an idea. This knowledge
is given by Shastras
(2) All transactions in world is Prayer of Super soul.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अद्भुत नवल सद्गुरूचें ।। आपली चवी अमृत चाखे ।।धृ०।।
 नित्यमुक्तासी मुक्त करूनी ।। निर्मळासी ज्ञानें पोखें ।।१।।
 सद्गुरुशिष्य आपण होउनी ।। बोधसुदिन नित्य फांके ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदें डुलतां दत्त ।। विश्वचि ब्रह्म होउनी ठाके ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Influence of Pleasure arose |
Awareness of duality is not there 
|| Refrain ||
Internal External is not remembered at all |
Any distinction did it remain || 1 ||
God is Devotee, Devotee is God,|
In the lake of Pleasure oof being Super soul || 2 ||
Look! Samadhi (1) is attained without efforts |
In Prayer(2) of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Absence of awareness of surrounding situation experiencing unity with Super soul.
(2) All transactions of world is Prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आलों नाहीं जाऊं कोठें ।। नाहीं मज चिंता ।।धृ०।।
 जन्मचि मिथ्या मृत्यु कैंचा ।। नाहीं कर्ता भोक्ता ।।१।।
 धर्माधर्म बागुलबावा ।। कल्पित नर्क स्वर्ग कैंचा ।।२।।
 सहजसमाधि सहज दत्ता ।। स्वानुभव अवधूताचा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Unprecedented miracle of Preceptor |
Nectar tastes it's own taste(1) || Refrain ||
Emancipating ever emancipated |
Nurtures pure blemish less with Self Realization || 1 ||
Becoming Himself Preceptor Disciple |
Always dawns auspicious day of Realization || 2 ||
On Datt swinging in pleasure of being Super soul |
Universe stands becoming Super soul 
|| 3 || 
(1) Knowledge is Realization that everything is Super soul, Which is immortal. This taste of being immortal Super soul is tasted by already immortal Super soul -Devotee

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गंधर्वनगरींच्या बोला ।। वंध्यापुत्र मृत जाहला ।।धृ०।।
 ताप चंद्रासी बहु तळमळे ।। अंधारीं सूर्य अवघडला ।।१।।
 अंजनीसुता भीष्मकन्या ।। लग्नाचा बहु नित्य सोहळा ।।२।।
 बांधमोक्षाची ऐकुनी कहाणी ।। दत्त सद्गुरुभजनीं रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have not come, where shall I go |
I have no worry || Refrain ||
Birth itself is false, How can death be |
No performer,No enjoyer || 1 ||
Religion Irreligion is Bugaboo |
How imaginary Hell and Heaven can be true || 2 ||
Datt has Samadhi without efforts(1) |
This is Self experience of Avadhut || 3 ||
(1) Absence of notions awareness state of tranquillity, while performing routine things

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सुख प्रेमाचें सांगूं मी कायीं ।। वृत्ति जडली सद्गुरुपायीं ।।धृ०।।
 जीवकल्पित बंधन पाहीं ।। बहु यत्नाचा मोक्ष तोही ।।१।।
 जग मुक्त हें ठायींच्याठायीं ।। सद्गुरुशिष्य भावचि नाहीं ।।२।।
 विश्व डुलतें प्रेमडोहीं ।। दत्तभजनीं स्वस्थ राहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Talk of Daemon city (1) |
Son of infertile woman (2) died || Refrain ||
Moon has fever agitated much |
Sun is feeling awkward in dark || 1 ||
Daughter of Bhishma (3) and son of Anjani (4)|
Ever celebration of the marriage || 2 ||
Listening story of Bonding and Salvation |
Datt regales in Prayer of Preceptor || 3 ||
(1),(2),(3),(4) We are all Super souls playing rolls in city of Daemons(world) like Daemons. Our existence is imaginary like son of infertile woman, fever of Moon, Sun in darkness. Forgetting all this realizing that we are Super soul we realize that this world is imaginary. In this world all transactions is Prayer. Knowing this Pant regales in Prayer.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गृहस्थ मज केलें ।। सद्गुरुनें गृहस्थ मज केलें ।।धृ०।।
 शांति गृहिणी देउनी मजला ।। तुर्यापर नेलें ।।१।।
 संसारभजन लाउनी पाठीं ।। निजसुख दिधलें ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदें डुलतो दत्त ।। सहजावधूत खेळे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Pleasure of Love (1), What shall I explain |
Notion is set at feet of Preceptor
|| Refrain ||
Bonding(2) is imagination of living entity |
Solution too involves many efforts(3) || 1 ||
Universe is emancipated at its existing place |
Feeling of Preceptor and Disciple does not exist at all || 2 ||
Universe swings in lake of Love (1) |
Remain still in Prayer of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Experience of being omnipresent Super soul 
(2) Imaginary cycle of birth and death resulting from past sins
(3) For a living entity to get Salvation needs to follow Karmas, Upasana, Means of penance

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वेड लागलें गुरुचें मजला ।। स्वरूप विसरलें ।।धृ०।।
 नाहीं पत्नी नाहीं बंधु ।। इष्ट मित्र उगलें ।।१।।
 शिष्य न गुरु बंध न मोक्ष ।। परब्रह्म उगलें ।।२।।
 सहज संसृति सहज करितां ।। सहज दत्त डुले ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Made me Householder |
Preceptor made me Householder || Refrain ||
Giving me Peace as housewife |
Took me beyond Turya(1) || 1 ||
Attaching Prayer of living (2) behind me |
Delivered true happiness || 2 ||
Pant swings in pleasure of being Super soul |
In normal way in Play of Avadhut (3) || 3 ||
(1) State of absence of awareness of self where Preceptor is seen every where 
(2) (3) Transactions we perform is play of Avadhut which is Prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मौन शब्दातें व्यालें ।। अक्रिय क्रिया करूं लागलें ।।धृ०।।
 शुद्ध ब्रह्म जीव जाहलें ।। बोधासाठीं तळमळलें ।।१।।
 सूर्या गडद हो पडलें ।। म्हणुनी शास्त्रदिवे लाविले ।।२।।
 दत्ता नवल हें जाहलें ।। ब्रह्मानंदस्फुरण उठलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have acquired craze of Preceptor |
I forgot my own form || Refrain ||
No wife, No brothers |
Friends Relatives distanced || 1 ||
No Disciple, No Preceptor, No Bonding, 
No Salvation |
Super soul is distinct || 2 ||
Performing normal mundane things in normal ways |
Datt swings enjoying them normally || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रेमभूक मज लागली दत्ता ।। दावीं चरण बालावधूता ।।धृ०।।
 ब्रह्मानंद नलगे मजला ।। अंतःकरणीं सद्गुरुचिंता ।।१।।
 नलगे मजला जीवन्मुक्ति ।। सद्गुरुचरणकमलरता ।।२।।
 भजनप्रेम नित्य देईं ।। ब्रह्मानंद हाचि दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Silence delivered children words I
Inactive started doing activities II Refrain II
Pure Super soul became Living entity I
Became restless for teachings II 1 II
See Sun is covered with darkness I
Hence lamps of Shastras(Scriptures) are ignited II 2 II
Pant witnesses this Miracle I
Inspiration of pleasure of being Super soul has arisen II 3 II
Gist: It is a miracle that the Super soul is manifested as everything in Universe. The Entities realizing this enjoy pleasure of being Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ढेंकर दिधली गिळुनी काळा ।। शांति भोगिली ।।धृ०।।
 हरिहरब्रह्म दूर करूनी ।। स्वरूपीं बुडी दिधली ।।१।।
 बंधमोक्ष बागुलबावा ।। नाहीं मज भूली ।।२।।
 दत्तावधूत सद्गुरु भला ।। नवल मात केली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt ! Appetite of Love has caught me I
O Balavadhut ! show Me your Feet(1) II Refrain II
I do not need pleasure of being Super soul I
I have worry in heart of Preceptor II 1 II
I do not need Salvation while Living I
I am regaled in Lotus of Feet of Preceptor(1) II 2 II
Always give me enchantment for Prayer I
This alone is Pleasure of being Super soul II 3 II
(1) Pure blemishless form of Super Soul - Shiv

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझी स्थिती मजला नकळे ।। काय सांगूं तुजला ।।धृ०।। 
 माझ्या ठायीं मीचि नाहीं ।। ठाव न विश्वाला ।।१।। 
 मजवांचुनी अन्य नाहीं ।। कवण दुजा आला ।।२।।
 शिष्य गुरु मी होऊनी सदा ।। प्रेम भोगीं भला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Released Belch swallowing Death God |
Enjoyed Peace || Refrain ||
Pushing away Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva |
I submerged in form of self || 1 ||
Bugaboos of Bonding(1) and Salvation |
Have no delusion for me || 2 ||
Great Preceptor Avadhut Datt |
Has done a miraculous feat || 3 ||
(1) Imaginary cycle of birth and death resulting from our Karmas

ma.Pad_Language: धन्य हा बालमुकुंद भक्ता देई ब्रह्मानंद
ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य हा बालमुकुंद ।। भक्ता देईं ब्रह्मानंद ।।धृ०।।
 जीव शिव माया व्यर्थ कल्पना ।। लागला सद्गुरुछंद ।।१।।
 पाहूं जातां ब्रह्मचि सर्व ।। विश्वीं आनंदकंद ।।२।।
 दत्तावधूत सहज समाधि ।। भोगुनी नित्य धुंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
My state is not known to me |
What shall I tell you || Refrain ||
I myself am not in my place |
Universe also has no existence || 1 ||
Nothing exists excluding me |
Who else has come || 2 ||
I myself becoming Preceptor and Disciple forever |
In goodness am enjoying Love (1) || 3 ||
(1) Experience that I am omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
एकादश इंद्रियें जिंकुनी ।। केली एकादशी ।। झालों सहज तुर्यवासी ।।धृ०।।
 विषयचि नाहीं विषयी कैंचा ।। भेद न भोगरसीं ।। त्रिपुटी सहज चिद्विलासीं ।।१।।
 पाप न पुण्य बंध न मोक्ष ।। मिथ्या स्वर्गनर्कराशी ।। पाहुनी गुरुपुत्र हासी ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदें सहज छंदें ।। डुलतो प्रेमरसीं ।। दत्त सदा अविनाशी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Balmukund is great |
He delivers Devotees pleasure of being Super soul || Refrain ||
Living entity, Shiv, Illusion are false imaginations |
I have taken up enchantment of Preceptor || 1 ||
Observing everything is Super soul only |
The source of Pleasure in the Universe 
|| 2 ||
Avadhut Datt enjoying effortless Samadhi (1) |
Is always enchanted in it || 3 ||
(1) State of absence of awareness of surrounding fully absorbed in experience of being Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालावधूतप्रेमा वर्णितां ।। मिठी परेसी ।।धृ०।। 
 कर्मोपासना सारुनी भ्रांति ।। प्रगटला बोधशशि ।।१।।
 धर्माधर्म बंधमोक्ष ।। सूर्यागृहीं निशी ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मविलास विश्व हें सत्य ।। दत्तआनंदराशी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Conquering Eleven organs (1)|
Performed Ekadashi (2) |
I easily became resident of Turya (3)
|| Refrain ||
No sensual objects at all, How enjoyer can be |
No distinction in enjoyment |
Enjoyer, object, and enjoyment are normal in Chidvilas (4) || 1 ||
No Sin, No Auspicious acts, No Bonding, No Salvation |
Stores of Heaven, Hell are false |
Observing Child of Preceptor laughs || 2 ||
In pleasure of being Super soul, in normal enchantment |
I swing in juice of Love (5)|
Datt is always indestructible (6)|| 3 ||
(1) Mouth, Skin, Eyes, Ears, Nose, Hands, Feet, Tongue, Reproduction organ, Anus and Mind 
(2) Eleventh day of Indian month 
(3) State beyond deep sleep of absence of self awareness.
(4) All things that happen take place at behest of Super soul.
(5) Experience of Super soul every where
(6) Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मारुनी माझें मरण गुरूनें ।। अमर मज केलें ।।धृ०।।
 ठाव पुसिला बूड पुसिलें ।। निजसुखी केलें ।। ओस पाडुनी देहभावा ।। तूर्यपद दिधलें ।।१।। 
 कल्पित पूर होता आला ।। आपणची गेला ।। प्रगट होतां बोधाग्नी हा ।। द्वैत समूळ जळलें ।।२।।
 अनादीचें ठेवणें हातीं ।। सद्गुरूनें दिधलें ।। अंतर्बाह्य शून्य होतां ।। दत्तस्वरूप दिसलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Describing affection of Balavadhut |
Embracement with Para speech (1)
|| Refrain ||
Pushing aside delusion of Karma and Upasana |
Moon of Teachings has unfolded || 1 ||
Religion Irreligion, Bonding Salvation |
Are like Night in home of Sun(2) || 2 ||
Super soul manifests Universe, is Truth |
Datt is store of Pleasure (3) || 3 ||
(1) Affection of Balavadhut is indescribable. The origin of speech Para also is not able to describe it.
(2) Human imaginations
(3) Pleasure that whole universe and me are one

ma.Lyrics_Language:
प्रपंचपरमार्थीं सद्गुरुलाभ लाभला ।।धृ०।। पंचक्लेश नसती प्रपंचीं ।। जीवभाव हरिला ।।१।।
 द्वैताद्वैत मिथ्या कल्पना ।। अनुभव हा ठसला ।।२।। 
 मुक्ति शांति भोगुनी नित्य ।। दत्तभजनीं निमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor killing(removing) my death |
Made me immortal || Refrain ||
Asked status, Asked base |
Made me happy |
Feeling 'I am body' was turned barren (removed)|
Gave me state of Turya (1) || 1 ||
Imaginary flood had been arrived |
Retracted back by itself |
On unfoldment of this fire of teachings |
Duality was totally burnt || 2 ||
This treasure of origin |
Was delivered in hand by Preceptor |
One inside and outside becoming None (2)|
Form of Datt is witnessed|| 3 ||
(1) State of diminishing awareness at peak, where only Super soul is experienced every where.
(2) Visible things were realized to be Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ब्रह्मानंद हा भुकेला ।। म्हणुनी गुरुभजनीं रमला ।।धृ०।। 
 मुक्ति परदेशी जाहली ।। सद्गुरुपायींच नांदली ।।१।। 
 कैवल्य हा निराधारी ।। नित्य सेवक गुरुघरीं ।।२।। 
 धन्य धन्य दास दत्त ।। भजे नित्य बालावधूत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Attainment of Preceptor has befallen in Mundane Affairs and path of Self Realization || Refrain ||
Now five afflictions (1), do not exist in life |
Feeling of, 'I am Living Entity' is removed 
|| 1 ||
Duality and Non duality are false imaginations |
This experience is imbibed || 2 ||
Always enjoying Salvation and Peace |
Pant is lost in Prayer || 3 ||
(1) Avidya- I am living entity, Asmita- Self pride, Raag- Temptations, Dvesh- Aversion,
Abhinivesh- Assiduity about something

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वकाळ मज दत्त राखितो ।। नाहीं मज चिंता ।।धृ०।। 
 योगक्षेम तोचि चालवी ।। तोचि मातापिता ।।१।। 
 बंधमोक्षभ्रांति हरुनी ।। स्वानंद दाता ।।२।। 
 बालावधूत वचनामृत धन्य करी दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This pleasure of being Super Soul is hungry |
Hence regales in Prayer of Preceptor (1)
|| Refrain ||
Salvation became orphan |
Dwelled only at feet of Preceptor|| 1 ||
This Kaivalya (2) is support less |
Always serves in Preceptor's Home || 2 ||
Devotee Datt is fortunate, fortunate |
Always worships Balavadhut || 3 ||
(1) Pleasure of Prayer of Preceptor is superior to Pleasure of being Super soul
(2) State of being emancipated

ma.Lyrics_Language:
पहा दत्त भक्तासी रक्षितो ।।धृ०।। 
 भक्तचि ज्याला जीवप्राण ।। भक्तांस्तव श्रमतो ।।१।। 
 भक्तास्तव हा सगुण जाहला ।। प्रेम सदा वांच्छितो ।।२।। 
 जाणुनी खूण शांति दत्त ।। नित्य भजनीं भोगितो ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Datt always protects me |
I have no worry || Refrain ||
My needs and welfare is run by Him alone |
He alone is my Mother Father || 1 ||
Doing away delusion of Bonding Salvation |
Delivers me pleasure of form of self (1)
|| 2 ||
The Nectar of sayings of Balavadhut |
Makes Datt fulfilled (2)|| 3 ||
(1) Super soul
(2) Fulfillment

ma.Lyrics_Language:
त्रास भवाचा कासया मनीं ।। सद्गुरु अभिमानी ।।धृ०।। 
 येणें जाणें मुळींच नाहीं ।। लीला निरंजनीं ।।१।। 
 सर्वीं सर्व तुझा तूंचि ।। भोगीं उन्मनी ।।२।। 
 भोग्य भोक्ता मुळींच नाहीं ।। शरण दत्तचरणीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe ! Datt protects Devotees || Refrain ||
Whom Devotees alone are life and soul |
He exerts for sake of Devotees || 1 ||
He took human form for sake of Devotees |
Always desires Love (1) || 2 ||
Datt realizing secret |
Always always enjoys peace in Prayer (2) 
|| 3 ||
(1) Experiencing oneness between Datt and Devotees 
(2) All transactions of world are his Prayer

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ब्रह्मानंदें मस्त होउनी ।। सहज बरळतों ।। अवधूतचरणीं लोळतों ।।धृ०।। 
 तृणवत् विश्व देखुनी नयनीं ।। सहज स्वरूपीं खेळतों ।। जन्म मरण न लेखितों ।।१।। 
 द्वैतचि नाहीं भीति कैंची ।। समाधि भोगितों ।। भोगुनी अलिप्त राहतों ।।२।। 
 परमार्थी न प्रपंची मी दत्तभजनीं रमतों ।। भक्तिमाजीं सदा डुलतों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why have trouble of Bhava(1) in mind |
Preceptor cares for it || Refrain ||
Coming and going do not exist at all |
All is game in Niranjan (2) || 1 ||
You yourselves are everything everywhere |
Enjoying Unmani (3) || 2 ||
Enjoyable enjoyer do not exist at all |
I surrender to feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of life, death, rebirth
(2) Place Super Soul free from all blemish
(3) State of sublimation of mind and Union with Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
चरणीं पडलों तुझ्या दत्ता ।। निजठाव देईं ।।धृ०।। 
 योग न जाणें ज्ञान न जाणें ।। निजभक्ति देईं ।।१।। 
 बंध न जाणें मोक्ष न जाणें ।। जनन मरण कायी ।।२।। 
 चरणापरतें नाहीं दत्ता ।। दिससी दिशा दाही ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Becoming mad with pleasure of being Super soul | I just rave |
I roll at feet of Avadhut(1) || Refrain ||
Observing world as worth of grass |
I play in form of self |
Do not reckon birth and death || 1 ||
No duality at all, what fear can be |
I enjoy Samadhi (2) |
Enjoying it, I remain aloof || 2 ||
I am not in Self Realization, nor am I in Mundane living |
I regale in Prayer of Datt |
Always swinging in Devotion || 3 ||
(1) Super soul
(2) Absence of awareness of surrounding. Sublimation.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कासया आपणा खंती ।। जन सहजसुखें वर्तती ।।धृ०।। 
 धर्माधर्म पापपुण्य ।। देशकालाची रीति ।।१।। 
 माया विद्या बंधमोक्ष ।। अज्ञ जनां प्रतीति ।।२।। 
 ब्रह्मविद न ब्रह्मचि सर्व ।। दत्तावधूतभक्ति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt! I have fallen at your feet (1) I
Give me permanent place II Refrain II
I do not know Yoga, Nor know Self knowledge I
Give me true Devotion II 1 II
I do not know Bonding, Nor do I know Salvation I
What is birth and death II 2 II
O Datt!, nothing is beyond Your feet I
You are found in all ten directions II 3 II
(1) Blemishless form of Shiva

ma.Lyrics_Language:
रंगली गुरुपदीं माझी वृत्ति ।। संसाराची नाहीं खंती ।।धृ०।। 
 माय बाप तो इष्ट बंधु तो ।। प्रीतीची बहिण सहज ती ।।१।। 
 मिथ्या प्रपंच तोची माझा ।। कल्पित परमार्थ त्याची स्थिति ।।२।।
 पारखपुरधीश बालमुकुंद ।। निशिदिनीं दत्तहृदयीं प्रीति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why shall we have distress |
People normally dwell happily || Refrain ||
Religion, Irreligion, Sin Virtue |
Are customs of Country and time || 1 ||
Illusion, Realization, Bonding, Salvation |
Is experienced by Ignorant || 2 ||
All are not cognitors of Super soul, but Super souls themselves |
Datt has devotion of Avadhut || 3 ||
Gist; People do not go for Self Realization and remain happy with Religion, Irreligion, din, virtue, bonding, salvation. Datt knows that all are Super souls and Devotes Avadhut

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वेडा मी जाहलों ।। गुरुपदीं नित्य लोळलों ।।धृ०।। 
 स्थूल सूक्ष्म कारण फाडुनी ।। महाकारणीं रिघलों ।।१।। 
 आपपर नाठवे सदा बेशुद्ध ।। गुरुनाम बडबडलों ।।२।। 
 द्वैत जाळुनी राख लाविली ।। दत्तभजनीं नाचलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
My notion is enchanted at feet of Preceptor |
No distress about Mundane Life 
|| Refrain ||
He is Mother, Father, Brother, Near one |
She is natural fondly sister || 1 ||
He alone is all my false mundane living |
Imaginery Self Realization also is his state only || 2 ||
Balmukund is lord of Parshwad |
For him in Datt's heart is day and night affection || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वेदीं प्रतिपादिलें ।। पिंडीं दर्शन मज दिधलें ।।धृ०।।
 नामरूपाची आवडी मनीं ।। कैसें तें लोपलें ।।१।।
 सत्य टाकुनी आभासा भुलणें ।। कैसें हें घडलें ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंद दत्तप्रभु हा ।। निजप्रेमें डुले ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have become frenzied |
Always I rolled at feet of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Tearing Macro, Micro, Reasoning (1) |
Entered into Mahakaran (2) || 1 ||
Always unconscious, I do not remember mine- alien |
Prattled name of Preceptor || 2 ||
Burning duality, applied ash |
Danced in prayer of Datt (3)|| 3 ||
(1) Doing away Awaken state, Dream, Deep sleep 
(2) State beyond (1), where Preceptor is seen in all places
(3) All transactions is prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालमुकुंद भक्तोद्धारक ।। नमितों मी तुजला ।।धृ०।।
 सत्यवचन तूं सत्यप्रतिज्ञ ।। परमहंस भला ।।१।।
 दूर म्हणों तरी जवळी अससी ।। हृदयीं प्रेमा भरला ।।२।। 
 आशिर्वाद धन्य तुझा हा ।। दत्तस्वरूपीं रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Vedas stated |
That vision, was given to me in Body 
|| Refrain ||
Mind had fondness of Name and Form |
How did it vanish || 1 ||
Giving away Truth, to be deluded by Illusion(1) |
How did this happen || 2 ||
This Balmukund is Lord Datt |
Swings in eternal Love (2)|| 3 ||
(1) Truth- We are Super soul, Illusion-We are living entities
(2) Experience of Super soul of reciprocation of experience of being Super soul by the creations-living entities.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य हा जन्म झाला ।। बाळ अवतरला ।।धृ०।। 
 सत्यावरती अखंड प्रीति ।। स्वानंदीं रमला ।।१।।
 होउनी वंद्य त्रैलोकीं हा ।। भक्तासी विकला ।।२।।
 परमहंस गुरुबालमुकुंद ।। दत्तहृदयीं भरला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Balmukund! Emancipator of Devotees |
I salute to You || Refrain ||
True to words! You are true to your vows |
Great Superior Hans (1) || 1 ||
We say you are away, but you are near |
Love filled In heart || 2 ||
Your this blessing is great |
Datt is regaled in Own Form(Super soul)
|| 3 ||
(1) Swan - A student of self realisation who has realised that he is Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
कृष्णापंचगंगासंगमीं सद्गुरु वसे ।। भक्तजनां भेटि देईं रूप प्रगटसे ।।धृ०।।
 अत्रिअनुसूया उदरीं दत्त अवतरे ।। अज्ञ जनां बोध देउनी सुख देईं बरें ।। मिथ्या माया दूर करुनी भ्रांति संहरे ।। आत्मबोध दासां देउनी स्वरूपीं समरसे ।।१।।
 श्रीपाद श्रीवल्लभ त्रिभुवनीं महा ।। तस्करासी शिक्षा करुनी विप्र रक्षी हा ।। धरुनी यतीवेष महीं गुप्तस्वरूप हा ।। भिल्लवडी औदुंबरीं नित्य हा वसे ।।२।।
 कारंजपुरीं चिद्विलास प्रगटे नरहरी ।। कृष्णापंचगंगा संगमीं वस्ती हा करी ।। गाणगपुरीं प्रगट प्रभु मूढा उद्धरी ।। सत्य वचन देउनी दत्ता लाविलें कासें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This birth has been fulfilled |
Balmukund has Incarnated (1)
|| Refrain ||
Ever fond of Truth (2) |
Regaled in pleasure of self || 1 ||
He became revered in three worlds (3)|
Is sold to Devotees || 2 ||
Preceptor Balmukund, Superior Swan (5)|
Is filled in heart of Datt (Pant) || 3 ||
(1)Balmukund took birth and blessed me.
(2) Super soul 
(3) Earth, Heaven, Hell
(4) He is always available to devotees
(5) A soul who has realised that he is Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
फळलें ज्यांचें पूर्व सुकृत ।। सद्गुरु त्यासी सहज प्राप्त ।।धृ०।। 
 बोधमात्रें संचित जाळुनी ।। आगामीची नुरे मात ।।१।।
 प्रारब्ध सारुनी सद्गुरुभजनीं ।। स्वरूपीं रमतो जीवन्मुक्त ।।२।।
 ब्रम्हविद् हा ब्रह्मचि होउनी ।। अखंड भजतो दत्तावधूत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor resides at Confluence of Krishna at Panchganga I
Gives meet to Devotees groups in form apparent II Refrain II
Datt incarnates in womb of Atri and Anusuya I
Makes ignorant ones happy giving Self knowledge I
Sending away false illusion, destroys delusion I
Giving Self Realization to Devotees merges them in own form II 1 II
Shripad Shrivallabh The great in three worlds(1) I
He protected Brahmin punishing thieves I
He holding drape of Sanyasin, is in secret form I
He always stays in Audumbar Bhilawadi II 2 II
Narasinh Saraswati unfolds Chidvilas(2) in Karanja Town I
He dwells at Confluence of Krishna and Panchganga I
The Lord came to Gangapur emancipated Ignorants I
Giving True Promise to Datt took him to His Udder(3) II 3 II
(1) Earth Heaven and Hell
(2) Every thing is done by Super Soul Chit
(3) Gave milk of Love- experience that super soul is every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
चिंता वाहतो योगक्षेमाची ।। सद्गुरु।। आतां भीति कैंची ।।धृ०।।
 मातापिता तो इष्टबंधु तो ।। प्रीतीचा जिवलग हा तोची ।।१।। 
 स्थूल सूक्ष्म कारणीं भरला ।। तूर्या उन्मनी सहज तोची ।।२।। 
 बालावधूत दत्तप्रभु हा ।। द्वैतवार्ता आतां कैंची ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
He whose Sanchits (1) have fructified |
Preceptor is easily obtainable to Him 
|| Refrain ||
With His teachings Sanchits(1) are burnt |
No thoughts remain of future Karmas(1) 
|| 1 ||
Ending Prarabdhas(1) in Prayer of Preceptor |
Emancipated while living, regales in Own Form || 2 ||
This knowledgeable of Super soul, becoming Super soul itself |
Ever prays Avadhut Datt || 3 ||
(1) Things we transact are karmas. Karmas done in earlier births are Prarabdhas. Fruits of Past Virtuous Karmas are Sanchits.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वाचामनातीत अनुभव माझा काय बोलुनी दावूं ।। मौनमुद्रा धारण करुनी सद्गुरुगुण गाऊं ।।धृ०।। 
 सद्गुरुचरणा मस्तक स्पर्श होतां भव गेला ।। जन्ममरणभ्रांति तुटली निश्चिंत राहूं ।।१।। 
 कल्पित जीव शिव माया भ्रांति नाहींशि रे झाली ।। बोधादित्य हृदयीं उदेला प्रेमसागरीं न्हाऊं ।।२।।
 बालावधूतदर्शनमात्रें परब्रह्म जाहलों ।। दत्तभजनीं सत्यज्ञानानंदरूप पाहूं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor takes care of needs and welfare |
How now can fear be || Refrain ||
He is Mother, Father, brother, most near |
He is the dearest loved mate too || 1 ||
Filled in Macro,Micro, Reasoning(1) |
He alone is effortless Turya and Unmani (2) || 2 ||
Lord Datt himself is this Balavadhut |
Now how can there be talk of duality || 3 ||
(1) State of Awakening, Dream and Deep Sleep
(2) States of absence of awareness and absence of volitions of mind, beyond (1)

ma.Lyrics_Language:
लोळलोळुनी अवधूतचरणीं ।। अंग धुळीनें भरलें ।।धृ०।। 
 खेळ खेळुनी सद्गुरुद्वारीं ।। अहंपण नुरलें ।।१।। 
 निजबोधाग्नि होतां प्रदिप्त ।। द्वैत समूळ जळलें ।।२।। 
 स्थूल सूक्ष्म कारण तूर्या ।। उन्मनीसी बिंदुलें ।।३।। 
 चिद्विलास सहज भासे ।। दत्त भजनीं डुले ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
What shall speak out of my experience beyond Speech and Mind I
Holding posture of Silence shall sing Feats of Preceptor 
II Refrain II
On my Head touching Feet of Preceptor, The Bhava(1) vanished I
Delusion of Birth and Death was cut, We shall stay worry free II 1 II
Delusion if imaginary Living entity, Shiv, Illusion became non existent I
Sun of teachings dawned in Heart, Let us bathe in ocean of Love(2) II 2 II
On just sight of Balavadhut, I became Super Soul I
In the Prayer of Datt(3), Let us See the form of Truth,Cognitor of Truth and Pleasure of Both (4)
(1) Cycle of Death and Rebirth
(2) Experience of omnipresent Super soul every where
(3) All events in life is only Prayer of Datt
(4) Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अमली मी जाहलों ।। गुरुप्रेम अमली मी जाहलों ।।धृ०।। 
 इहपरभोग नाठवे मजला ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूपीं रमलों ।।१।।
 नाठवे प्रवृत्ति नाठवे निवृत्ति ।। गुरुशिष्य मी जाहलों ।।२।। 
 धुंद सदा मी प्रेमपानें ।। दत्तभजना सोकलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Rolling repeatedly at feet of Avadhut |
Body is filled with dust || Refrain ||
Playing games at door of Preceptor |
Self pride did not remain || 1 ||
On the illumination of fire of True Teachings |
Duality was totally burnt || 2 ||
Sthul Sukshm Karan Turya |
And State of Unmani(1) was experienced 
|| 3 ||
Chidvilas (2) does appear just as it is |
Datt Swings in Prayer (3)|| 3 ||
(1) State of sublimation mind beyond states of Awakening, Dream, Deep Sleep and Turya ( Loss of self awareness )
(2) All acts events are creation of Super Soul Chit.
(3) The acts mentioned in (2) is itself prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सहज गुरुगृहीं निद्रा करितां ।। सहजस्वप्न देखिलें ।।धृ०।।
 मायाकल्पित हरिहरब्रह्म ।। नामशेष जाहलें ।।१।। 
 बंध मुक्ति गुरुशिष्यभावना ।। अद्वैतीं बुडलें ।।२।।
 दत्तस्वरूपीं जागा जाहलों ।। भानचि उडालें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I have become intoxicated |
I have been intoxicated with Preceptor's Love (1)|| Refrain ||
Pleasures of this world or beyond are not remembered by me |
I regaled in form of Super Soul || 1 ||
I do not remember inclination, nor I remember withdrawal |
I have become Preceptor and Disciple 
|| 2 ||
I am always in sway of drink of Love(1) |
Addicted to prayer (2) of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Experience of Super soul in all things
(2) All transactions of world are prayer of Datt.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ब्रह्मस्वरूपीं वस्ती करुनी ।। व्यर्थ कां तळमळीसी ।।धृ०।।
 पाप न पुण्य बंध न मोक्ष ।। सहज अद्वैतरासी ।।१।।
 स्वप्नींचा शिष्य स्वप्नींचा गुरु ।। स्वप्नीं बुडसी तरसी ।।२।।
 अंतरीं मुक्त बाहेरी मुक्त ।। दत्त डुलतो प्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Sleeping in home of Preceptor(1) without efforts|
Observed natural dream || Refrain ||
Vishnu, Shiv, Brahma imagined by Illusion |
Became non existent || 1 ||
Contemplation of Bonding(2), salvation, Preceptor, Disciple |
Were sunk in non duality || 2 ||
I awoke in form of Datt |
Awareness disappeared || 3 ||
(1) In the experience of Preceptor- Super soul
(2) Imagination that we are bound in cycle of birth and death due to sins committed by us.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अवधूतभूत मज झोंबलें ।। माझा मीपणा गिळुनी नाचलें ।।धृ०।।
 धर्माधर्म गिळुनी सर्व ।। त्रिपुटीसी पदतळीं तुडविंले ।।१।।
 हरिहरब्रह्मा सारुनी मागें ।। तूर्य उन्मनीसीहि मिरलें ।।२।।
 धुंद सदा हा दत्तावधूत ।। ब्रम्हानंदीं सहज डुले ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Residing in form of Super soul |
Why do You get agitated in vain || Refrain ||
No Sin, No Virtue, No Bonding, No Salvation|
Just stack of Non Duality || 1 ||
Preceptor of Dream, Disciple of Dream(1) |
In dream you sink and are saved || 2 ||
Internal is Emancipated, Outer world is Emancipated |
Pant swings in experience of Love (2)|| 3 ||
(1) This world is dream of Super soul, manifested by Super soul, all characters, events are false. Only Super soul is true.
(2) Experience that I am the omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य हा बालमुकुंद ।। सहज दिधला ब्रह्मानंद ।।धृ०।।
 आपपर भेद खंडुनी सर्व ।। लागला ऐक्यछंद ।।१।।
 ज्ञानाज्ञान मिथ्या ठरतां ।। नुरला मोक्षबंध ।।२।।
 सहज समाधि सहज भोगितो ।। दत्त आनंदकंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Ghost Avadhut has possessed me |
Swallowing my Self ego it Danced 
|| Refrain ||
Swallowing all Religion Irreligion |
Crushed Triputi(1) under bottom of feet 
|| 1 ||
Pushing behind Vishnu,Brahma and Shiva |
Also covered Turya and Unmani (2) || 2 ||
This Datt (Pant) Avadhut is always absorbed |
Swings naturally in pleasure of being Super soul || 3 ||
(1)Three parts of action Performer, object of performance and performance.
(2) Turya-State beyond Deep sleep of loss of awareness experiencing Super Soul every where. Unmani- State beyond Turya where mind looses it's characteristics.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सत्यवचन हा सत्यप्रतिज्ञ सद्गुरु बालमुकुंद ।। भक्तजनासी सत्य राखितो नित्य परमानंद ।।धृ०।।
 पारखपुरीं अवतरुनी प्रगट जंबुगिरीं ।। मूढ जनासी तारकबोध देउनी उद्धरी ।। भक्तिप्रीय हा शक्तिदायक सत्यज्ञानानंद ।।१।।
 शरण जातां मरण नाहीं करुणानिधि पाहीं ।। चरणकमल जगीं तारक साची नौका भवडोहीं ।। साधुसंतजन नित्य भजती जाणुनी आनंदकंद ।।२।।
 अंतर्बाह्य सद्गुरु नांदे नाहीं ठाव रिता ।। सर्वींसर्व ब्रह्म विलसे ठाव न गुरुभक्ता ।। अवधूतपदीं भोगुनी मुक्ति दत्त सदा हा धुंद ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Balmukund is great |
Easily delivered pleasure of being Super soul || Refrain ||
Demolishing all distinctions of dear and farther |
I have taken up to hobby of union || 1 ||
On knowledge and ignorance being proved false |
Bonding (1)Salvation did not remain || 2 || 
Effortlessly enjoys natural Samadhi (2)|
The source of pleasure - Datt || 3 || 
(1) Imagination of cycle of birth and death due to accumulated sins
(2) State of absence of volition, awareness with Realization of forming self

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धैर्य गुरूनें दिधलें चित्तीं ।। संसृतिमाजीं सहज निश्चिंति ।।धृ०।।
 वासनात्रयभीति अंतरीं ।। तोवरी न मिळे जीवन्मुक्ति ।।१।।
 गुरुविणें शांति न मिळे कदा ।। साधनभार व्यर्थ भ्रांति ।।२।।
 अवधूतबोधें धन्य जाहलों ।। दत्तभजनीं अखंड रति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Preceptor Balmukund is True of his dictum, True of his Vow |
He, the ever superior pleasure truly protects Devotees || Refrain ||
Incarnating in Parshwad, became known in Karadeguddi |
Emancipates ignorant people giving them teaching that delivers (1)|
This Truth, cognitor of truth and pleasure of cognition is fond of devotion, and gives us power || 1 ||
See He is store of mercy, Death will never be once You Surrender |
His lotus feet are saviour in world, truly a ship in Lake of Bhava (2)|
Sages, Ascetics always worship knowing he is source of Pleasure || 2 ||
Preceptor resides inside and out, no place is empty |
Super soul pervades every where, no room for Preceptor Devotees |
Enjoying salvation at feet of Avadhut, Pant is ever absorbed in experience || 3 ||
(1) Teaching which emancipates
(2) Cycle of birth and death

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अलक्ष्य स्वरूप आमुचें पाहीं ।। खूण नेदूं जनां कांहीं ।।धृ०।।
 जैसा भाव तैसे दिसों ।। मानिती जन तैसे असों ।।१।।
 भवी जनांसी विषयीं दिसतों ।। ब्रह्मविदासीब्रह्मचि होतों ।।२।।
 भेददृष्टीनें द्वैतचि जाहलों ।। अभेदरूप आत्मा संचलों ।।३।।
 शिष्यभावें सद्गुरु मीचि ।। ऐक्यदृष्टीनें दत्त साचि ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor has given courage in heart |
Worry free ness in Living without efforts 
|| Refrain ||
As long as fear of three desires (1) resides inside |
Till then Salvation while living is not attained || 1 ||
Without Preceptor peace is never achieved|
Burden of means of penance is futile delusion || 2 ||
I have been fulfilled with teachings of Avadhut |
Always enchantment in prayer of Datt 
|| 3 ||
(1) Desires of body, fame, Vedas

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जरी व्हावी तुज शांति ।। ठेवीं सद्गुरुचरणीं भक्ति ।।धृ०।।
 सद्गुरुवचनामृत पिउनी ।। भोगी सहज जीवन्मुक्ति ।।१।।
 सद्गुरुविणें दैवत नाहीं ।। व्यर्थ कासया अंतरीं खंती ।।२।।
 धन्य दैवाचा अवधूतदास ।। दत्तप्रेम अखंड चित्तीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe! Our form is untargettable |
Will not reveal any secret to people || Refrain ||
We appear as per contemplation |
We are as people conceive us to be || 1 ||
For people in life we look obcessed by sensual objects |
For cognitor of Super soul we become Super soul itself || 2 ||
With distinctive vision we have become dual |
Are filled with Non dual Super soul || 3 ||
With presumption as disciple, I am the Preceptor |
With vision of unity I am truly the Datt(1) || 4 ||
(1) The base of all visible things

ma.Lyrics_Language:
चिंता जाहली दूर ।। गुरुकृपें लोटला आनंदपूर ।।धृ०।।
 प्रवृत्ति निवृत्ति मिथ्या जाहली ।। कर्म बुुडालें ठार ।।१।।
 स्वप्नींची वार्ता बंध मोक्ष ।। ब्रह्मचि चराचर ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मविद् न ब्रह्मचि जाहला ।। दत्तावधूत उदार ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
If you desire to have peace |
Keep devotion at feet of Preceptor 
|| Refrain ||
Drinking nectar of sayings of Preceptor |
Enjoy effortlessly salvation while living 
|| 1 ||
No deity other than Preceptor exists |
Why in futility have distress inside || 2 ||
Devotee of Avadhut has great fortune |
With affection of Datt ever at heart || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शुद्ध चैतन्य विलसे ।। विश्वरूपें तेंचि दिसे ।।धृ०।।
 आदि न मध्य अंत्य न कांहीं ।। परब्रह्मचि असे ।।१।।
 बंध न मोक्ष शिष्य न गुरु ।। नाही अनारिसें ।।२।।
 दत्तावधूत सहजानंदें ।। डुलतो प्रेमरसें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Worry has gone away |
By grace of Preceptor flood of pleasure has befallen || Refrain ||
Pravrutti (2) Nivrutti (2) are proved false |
Duties are sunk forever || 1 ||
Bonding(3) Salvation (4) is news from dreams |
Super soul is all fixed and movable world 
|| 2 ||
Not cognitor of Super soul, he became Super soul itself |
Avadhut Datt is magnanimous || 3 ||
(1) Inclination of action
(2) Withdrawal from inclination
(3) Imaginery cycle of birth and death as result of past sins
(4) Release from (3) by self realization

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जाहलों मी सद्गुरुदास ।। नाहीं संसृतीची किंचित आस ।।धृ०।।
 योगक्षेमाची नाहीं चिंता ।। सहज मी निरास ।।१।।
 प्रज्वलित ज्ञानाग्नि सदा ।। मायामोहनिरास ।।२।। 
 अवधूतपदीं ऐक्य जाहलों ।। दत्तपदीं नित्य वास ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Pure Consciousness manifests |
Same is seen in form of universe
|| Refrain ||
No start, No middle, No end either |
Only Super soul is there || 1 ||
Neither bonding, nor Salvation. neither Disciple nor Preceptor|
Nothing distinct || 2 ||
Datt Avadhut in natural pleasure|
Swings in juice of Love (1) || 3 ||
(1) Experience of Super soul every where

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वासनात्रय खंडुनी मजला ।। शांति निज दिधली ।।धृ०।। 
 अंतरखूण अंतरीं ठसली ।। धन्य गुरु माउली ।।१।। 
 सहजसमाधि भोगितों सदा ।। संसृति नुरली ।।२।।
 अलक्ष्य मी अगम्य मी ।। दत्तप्रेमभुली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I became devotee of Preceptor|
No desire even little of Living || Refrain ||
No worry of needs and welfare |
I have just been desireless || 1 ||
Fire of knowledge ever ignited |
Removal of temptation of illusion || 2 ||
I became United with feet of Avadhut (1)|
Always I dwell at feet of Datt (1) || 3 ||
(1) Pure untainted Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
होउनी राजकांता ।। करिसी कासया चिंता ।।धृ०।। 
 भोग मनाजोगे प्राप्त तुजला ।। भिक्षेची कां वार्ता ।।१।।
 पुत्र गुरूचा होउनी सत्य ।। भिसी कां भवगर्ता ।।२।।
 मुक्त सदा तूं श्रुति बोलते ।। जाउनी पुसे दत्ता ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Destroying Three desires (1)|
I was delivered permanent peace 
|| Refrain ||
Internal mark was imbibed inside |
Mother Preceptor is great || 1 ||
Always I enjoy natural Samadhi (2) |
Mundane affairs did not remain || 2 ||
I can not be targeted, I can not be understood |
Pant has delusion of Love (3) || 3 ||
(1) Desires about body, sensual desires, Scriptures
(2) State of absence of awareness, experiencing that I am Super soul
(3) Experience that I am Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बुडी म्यां दिधली आजी ।। ब्रह्मानंदसागरामाजीं ।।धृ०।। 
 जागृति स्वप्न सुषुप्ति नुरली ।। तुर्या उन्मनी ताजी ।।१।।
 कल्पित समाधि मुक्ति केवल ।। निजामृता पुढें कांजी ।।२।।
 सहज आनंदें सहज दत्त ।। डुलतां विश्व राजी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Becoming wife of King |
Why are you worrying || Refrain ||
Enjoyments as per mind are available to You |
Why is news of begging || 1 ||
Becoming true son of Preceptor |
Why do you fear from Ditch of Bhava(1)
|| 2 ||
Vedas say you are always Emancipated |
Go and ask Datt (Pant) || 3 ||
(1) Cycle of life and death

ma.Lyrics_Language:
शांति भोगितों ।। सद्गुरुपदीं शांति भोगितों ।।धृ०।। 
 नित्यानंद ब्रह्म जाणुनी ।। स्वरूपीं रमतों ।।१।।
 चिद्विलास दृष्टी देखुनी ।। सहज मी डुलतों ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंद सद्गुरु धन्य ।। दत्त सदा भजतो ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Today I have dived into |
Ocean of pleasure of being Super soul 
|| Refrain ||
Awakening, Dream, Deep sleep, did not remain |
Fresh experience of Turya and Unmani dawns (1)|| 1 ||
Samadhi(2) and Kevalmukti (3) are imaginery |
Like rice soop before true nectar(4) || 2 ||
On Datt swinging in natural pleasure normally |
Universe is in pleasure mode(5) || 3 ||
(1) State beyond Deep sleep where super soul is seen every where- Turya. State beyond Turya where experience that I myself am the super soul is gained- Unmani
(2) State of trance where awareness of self is lost with knowledge that I am Super soul.
(3) State of salvation.
(4) (2) and (3) are ordinary compared to the pleasure of experience of being Super soul
(5) Pleasure of universe is in swinging of Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
निजसुख मज दिधलें सद्गुरूनें ।।धृ०।।
 मिथ्या माया भ्रांति खंडुनी समूळ ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूप दाविलें ।।१।।
 अंतरीं बाहेरीं सद्गुरु नांदे ।। नाहीं स्थळ खुलें ।।२।।
 दत्तावधूत सद्गुरु साचा ।। प्रेम उद्भवलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
enjoy peace |
At feet of Preceptor I enjoy peace 
|| Refrain ||
Knowing Super soul is ever in pleasure |
I regale in my own form (Super soul)|| 1 ||
Observing by vision Chidvilas (1)|
I swing without efforts || 2 ||
Great Preceptor Balmukund |
Datt always prays || 3 ||
(1) All transactions of world are manifestations of Chit - Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरुपदा शरण मी गेलों ।। तैंचि मुक्त मी जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 तत्वमसि बोध प्रेरितां श्रवणीं ।। तूर्य उल्लंघिलों ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मात्मैक्य सहज जाणुनी ।। परब्रह्म जाहलों ।।२।।
 स्वानंदामृत पिउनी नित्य ।। दत्तभजनीं रमलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor gave me permanent peace 
|| Refrain ||
Destroying false delusion of illusion from roots |
Showed me form of Super soul || 1 ||
Preceptor dwells inside out |
No place is vacant || 2 ||
Avadhut Datt is true Preceptor |
Love sprung up (1) || 3 ||
(1) Super soul manifested in universe demonstrated that they are Super soul and they got pleasure that is love.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
बालमुकुंद गुरु भेटला ।। स्वानंदसिंधु उचंबळला ।।धृ०।।
 जीवभाव आपणचि गेला ।। ब्रह्मभाव सहज स्थिरावला ।।१।।
 हरिहरब्रह्मा थारा नुरला ।। काळ गुरुगृहीं आपण निमला ।।२।।
 दत्तचि बालमुकुंद झाला ।। नित्य प्रेमें भजनीं रमला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I surrendered to feet of Preceptor|
Then only I became emancipated
|| Refrain ||
On inspiration of teaching of Tatvamasi (1)|
I crossed over Turya (2) || 1 ||
Realizing unity with Super soul effortlessly |
I became Super Soul || 2 ||
Drinking nectar of pleasure of own form (3)|
Always I regaled in Prayer of Datt || 3 ||
(1) You are the super soul
(2) Stages of release of awareness Jagruti-Awakening, Swapna- Dream, Sushupti-Deep sleep, Turya-Witnessing Preceptor every where, Unmani-Absence of mind becoming Super Soul itself.
(3) Form of super soul.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दिव्य नयन मज दिधले ।। सर्व विश्व परब्रह्मरुपें भासलें ।।धृ०।।
 वेदशास्त्रांचा गलबला ।। सांडुनी सहज जाहलों मोकळा ।। जीवशिवभाव नुरला ।। बंध मोक्ष मिथ्या शब्द मुळींचि नुरला ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूप प्रगटलें ।।१।।
 चिच्छक्ति चिद्विलास ।। सहज उदेला हा विश्वाभास ।। धरूनी सद्गुरूची कास ।। केला आत्मस्वरूपीं नित्य वास ।। ज्ञानतेज प्रगटलें ।।२।।
 बालावधूत साचा ।। बोधमात्रें द्वैतभावचि कैंचा ।। वर्णूं न शके वाचा ।। निःशब्दानुभव गुरुपुत्राचा ।।
 दत्तप्रेम उदेलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Met Preceptor Balmukund|
Sea of pleasure of self rose up || Refrain ||
Feeling of 'I am living entity' self exited |
Feeling of 'I am Super soul' just stabilised || 1 ||
No place remained for Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva |
Death ceased itself at home of Preceptor
|| 2 ||
Datt himself became Balmukund|
Forever regaled with love in Prayer || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
लहरी उठली ब्रह्मसुखाची ।। मिथ्या संसृति आतां कैंची ।।धृ०।।
 अंतरीं बाहेरी अधउर्ध्व ।। परिपूर्ण माझा मीचि ।।१।।
 शिष्यसद्गुरु प्रेमास्तव ।। चिद्विलासीं झालों मीचि ।।२।।
 डुलतों सदा ब्रह्मानंदें ।। दत्तभजनीं अखंड रुचि ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Divine vision is given to me|
Whole universe appeared in form of Super soul || Refrain ||
Leaving Hubbub of Vedas and Shastras |
I just became free |
Feeling of living entity, Shiv did not remain |
False bonding- salvation(1), word did not remain at all |
Form of Super soul unfolded || 1 ||
With Manifestation of power of Super soul Chit(2)|
Just dawned this semblance of universe |
Holding udder of Preceptor|
Did permanent stay in form of self - Super soul|
Radiance of knowledge unfolded || 2 ||
Balavadhut is genuine |
On teaching how can feeling of duality itself be there |
Speech could not describe|
Speechless experience of child of Preceptor|
Love of Datt (3) dawned || 3 ||
(1) Imaginery cycle of birth and death resultant from past sins
(2) Inner soul
(3) Datt manifests as devotee, devotee realises that he is Datt which is love.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरूनें अद्भुत करणी केली ।।धृ०।।
 जीवभाव हा खंडुनी समूळ ।। स्वस्वरूप खूण दिधली ।।१।।
 द्वैतभावना नासुनी सर्व ।। पवित्र स्थिति दिधली ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंद देउनी सहज ।। दत्तासी भजनभुली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Wave of pleasure of being Super soul has arisen |
Now how can there be false universe 
|| Refrain ||
Inside outside.beneath above|
Completely am, I myself || 1 ||
In Chidvilas (1) for sake of Love(2) |
I myself became. Disciple Preceptor || 2 ||
Ever I swing in pleasure of being Super soul|
Forever I have savor in Prayer of Datt(3) || 3 ||
(1) Everything that takes place is manifested by Super soul
(2) Pleasure of giving devotees experience of being Super soul and enjoying their reaction of being Super soul
(3) All events in universe is prayer of Datt

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गोकुलाष्टमी आजी केली ।। स्वस्वरूपीं वृत्ति ही निमली ।।धृ०।।
 अष्टधा प्रकृति सारुनी मागें ।। तुर्यस्थिति साधिली ।।१।। 
 शब्दखंडण करूनी सहज ।। उन्मनी भोगिली ।।२।।
 सोडिलें पारणें दत्तभजनीं ।। मुक्तिसती वरिली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor did unprecedented feat 
|| Refrain ||
Removing feeling of Living entity (1)from roots |
Delivered mark of own form || 1 ||
Spoiling all feeling of Duality (2)|
Delivered holy state(3)|| 2 ||
Delivering effortlessly pleasure of being Super soul |
Pant has enchantment of Prayer (4)|| 3 ||
(1) Feeling that I am Living entity
(2) I am different from God
(3) Sate of Super soul
(4) All transactions of world is prayer

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अष्टधा प्रकृति खंडुनी आजी गोकुलाष्टमी केली ।। सद्गुरुकृष्ण नयनीं देखुनी स्वरूपीं बुडी दिधली ।।धृ०।। 
 सहा अठरांची भीड टाकुनी चौघांसी भुली ।। वाचामनासी मागें सारुनी बुद्धिही गिळिली ।।१।।
 एकादशासी उपवास घडला अहंकृति निमली ।। सद्गुरुकृपें तूर्य भोगितां उन्मनी प्रगटली ।।२।।
 विश्वगोकुळ आत्माकृष्ण व्यवहारपूजा केली ।। नष्टचि झाले शब्दराक्षस पूतना भ्रांति आपणचि मेली ।।३।।
 अवधूतपदीं पारणें फेडुनी धन्यता वरिली ।। ब्रह्मविद् न ब्रह्मचि सहज दत्तकमलअलि ।।४।।

रागद्वेषा रजा दिधली ।। सद्गुरुपदीं शांति भोगिली ।।धृ०।। 
 वीट संसृतीचा आला मजला ।। सद्गुरूची कास धरिली ।।१।।
 उबगलों मी या शब्दासी ।। नि:शब्दाची गोडी लागली ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंदपदधुळीं लोळतां ।। दत्तस्वरूपीं उन्मनी वरिली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Destroying Eightfold prakriti (1) Gokulashtami(2) is performed today |
Observing Preceptor Krishna in eyes submerged in form of Super soul 
|| Refrain ||
Abandoning fear of Six, eighteen and delusion about four (3)|
Pushing back Speech and Mind intellect also is swallowed (4)|| 1 ||
Eleven(5) had to undergo fast self pride ceased|
Enjoying Turya(6) by grace of Preceptor Unmani (6) was unfolded|| 2 ||
In temple of Universe Soul of Krishna worship of transactions is performed|
Demons of words were ruined, Delusion Putana(7) died herself || 3 ||
Ending fast at feet of Avadhut acquired greatness |
Not cognitor of Super Soul but himself Super Soul, the black bee in lotus of Datt
||4||
(1) Five powers- Earth,Water,Fire,Air and sky plus Three attributes Virtuosness, Desires,and Anger
(2) Eightth day of second half of Month of Shravan when Krishna is born
(3) Six Shastras, Eighteen Puranas, Four Vedas
(4) Reached beyond intellect the Super soul
(5) Five organs of knowledge, Five organs of action and Mind
(6) Turya- State beyond Deep sleep where preceptor is evident Unmani-State beyond Turya where mind looses it's properties and we experience that we are Super soul
(7) Delusion of word is the demon Putana who had come in garb of lady to kill child Krishna

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मागणें तुज एक दत्ता ।। शुद्ध वेडा करीं आतां ।।धृ०।। 
 वंदन मज न लगे मुळीं ।। निंदा करो जन सतता ।।१।। 
 माझें स्मरण मजला न लगे ।। आठव नुरो जनचित्ता ।।२।।
 आहे नाहीं सर्व ही बुडो ।। ऐक्य स्वरूपीं भजूं दत्ता ।।३।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Gave leave to Anger and Hatred |
Enjoyed peace at feet of Preceptor
|| Refrain ||
I got ennui of mundane world|
I am holding udder of Preceptor || 1 ||
I developed tedium of these words |
Got enchantment of wordless(1) || 2 ||
Rolling in dust of feet of Balmukund |
I married Unmani(2) in form of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Super soul
(2)State of absence of mind beyond Awakening, Dream, Deep sleep and Turya

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जन्मलों मेलों अवधूतचरणीं ।। अघटित पहा दत्तकरणी ।।धृ०।।
 जन्मलों म्हणतां नाहीं जन्मलों ।। मेलों म्हणतां नाहीं निमालों ।। मूढासी सत्य वाटते वाणी ।।१।। 
 बंध मोक्ष बालक्रीडा पाहीं ।। पाप पुण्य मुळीं नसती कांहीं ।। विश्व डुलतें निरंजनीं ।।२।।
 धन्य धन्य गुरु बालमुकुंद ।। सहज दिधला ब्रह्मानंद ।। दत्ता निजप्रेमशिराणी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
O Datt! one request to You |
Now make me pure insane || Refrain ||
I do not need salutation at all |
Let people always asperse || 1 ||
My remembrance, I do not need |
Let no remembrance be in heart of people || 2 ||
Let all existing and non existing submerge |
Let us pray Datt in form of Unity(1) || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
जन्मा येउनी सार्थक करीं कांहीं ।। व्यर्थ पशुवत मरसी कां रे ।।धृ०।।
 आहार निद्रा भय मैथुन हे ।। पशुदेहीं ते असती सारे ।।१।।
 कैंचा मी कोण देव हा कोठें ।। मूढा न विचारिशी कां रे ।।२।।
 सद्गुरुचरणां शरण जाईं ।। निजानंद दत्त देई तुज रे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am born and died at feet of Avadhut |
See feat of Datt is unprecedented 
|| Refrain ||
Saying born I did not born |
Saying died I did not die(1) |
Ignorant feels the saying true || 1 ||
See Bonding (2) Salvation is child play |
Sin and virtue never do exist |
Universe swings in Niranjan(3) || 2 ||
Great Great is Preceptor Balmukund |
Gave without efforts Pleasure of being Super soul |
Datt(Pant) has climax of True Love (4)
|| 3 ||
(1) Super soul does not take birth and die.
(2)Imaginery cycle of birth and death as a result of past sins
(3) Blemish less pure form of Shiv
(4) Experience of being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सहजानंद दिधला गुरूनें ।। धन्य मज केलें ।।धृ०।।
 शब्दभीति मज मुळींच नाहीं ।। निश्चिंत मन झालें ।।१।।
 पापपुण्य बंधमोक्ष ।। स्वप्नींहि नाठवलें ।।२।।
 बालावधूत सत्य सद्गुरु ।। दत्तप्रेम उदेलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Coming to birth do some fulfillment |
Why in futility you die like animal
|| Refrain ||
These Feeding, Sleep, fear, sex |
All those exist in body of animals || 1 ||
Who am I, How am I, Where is this God |
O Ignorant ! Why you do not ask || 2 ||
Surrender to feet of Preceptor |
Datt will give you permanent pleasure|| 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्फूर्ति नव्हे ही सद्गुरुभक्ति ।। व्यवहार हा सद्गुरु भजन ।।धृ०।। 
 सहज क्रिया समाधि जाहली ।। स्फूर्ति निमतां बहार उडाली ।।१।। 
 अंतर्बाह्य सद्गुरु नांदे ।। जग हें डुलतें ब्रह्मानंदें ।।२।। 
 बंध मुक्ति मूढकथा ।। गुरुपुत्रासी नाहीं वार्ता ।। ३।।
 सहजानंदें सहज डुलूं ।। दत्तभजनीं सहज खेळूं ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Preceptor gave me effortless pleasure |
Made me gratified || Refrain ||
I have no fear of words at all |
Mind became worry free || 1 ||
Sin, Virtue, Bonding, Salvation |
Was not remembered even in dreams|| 2 ||
Balavadhut is true Preceptor |
Love of Datt (1) has dawned || 3 ||
(1) Datt creates all of us, gives us devotion, we devote, this gives pleasure to Datt. This pleasure is Love

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मूळ मनातें पाहीं ।। पहातां बुडसी ब्रह्मडोहीं ।।धृ०।।
 मिथ्या संकल्प सर्व टाकुनी ।। आत्मस्वरूपीं नित्य राहीं ।।१।। 
 आपपर भेद नाहीं जगीं ।। विश्ववीचि ब्रह्मडोहीं ।।२।। 
 सहजानंद सहज भोगितां ।। दत्तचरणीं ठेवी डोई ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This is not inspiration, Devotion of Preceptor |
These mundane affairs is Prayer of Preceptor || Refrain ||
Normal actions have become Samadhi (1)|
On ceasing of inspiration great satisfaction is achieved|| 1 ||
Preceptor dwells inside out |
World swings in pleasure of being Super soul || 2 ||
Bonding (2) Salvation is story of ignorant |
Child of Preceptor has its no news || 3 ||
Will sway without efforts in natural pleasure |
Will play normally in prayer of Preceptor 
|| 4 ||
(1) Trance like experience of awareness free State 
(2) Imaginery cycle of birth and death due to accumulated sins
This Pada displays experience of being in Avadhut state of pleasure of being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सर्वींसर्व ब्रह्म विलसे ।। नुरली उपाधि ।।धृ०।। 
 नाहीं उत्थान जगीं कदा ।। भोगितों समाधि ।।१।। 
 चैतन्यासी येणें न जाणें ।। विकार न कधीं ।।२।।
 सत्यज्ञानानंत ब्रह्म ।। द्वैता न अवधि ।।३।।
 बालमुकुंदपदीं दत्त रमला ।। भरला प्रेमोदधि ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Observe the original mind (1)|
Observing You will submerge in lake of Super soul || Refrain ||
Abandoning all Imaginery Resolutions |
Always stay at form of Self || 1 ||
Distinction of our- alien is not in world |
Universe is wave in lake of Super soul 
|| 2 ||
Enjoying effortlessly natural pleasure |
Keep head at feet of Datt (2)|| 3 ||
(1) Mind is the process of thinking.
(2) Feet of Datt is the blemish less Super soul Shiv

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अहंममता धरुनी मनीं व्यर्थचि तळमळती ।। शब्दें गुर्वांकित म्हणती ।।धृ०।।
 संसृति मिथ्या म्हणती तोंडें दुःख भोगिती ।। एकला येणें एकला जाणें स्थितिही नेणती ।।१।।
 माझे बंधु माझी बहीण व्यर्थचि चिंतिती ।। कोण कुणाचा जीव सुखाचा परमार्थ नेणती ।।२।। 
 माझें नाहीं मी न कोणाचा खूण ही नेणती ।। दत्तपदासी शरण जाउनी शांति न भोगिती ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Super soul manifests in all things every where|
No titles remained || Refrain ||
I enjoy Samadhi |
Never to rise in this world(1)|| 1 ||
Super soul has no coming no going |
No change of form any time || 2 ||
Super soul is the Truth, Knowledge of truth and is endless |
No time for duality || 3 ||
Datt regales at feet of Balmukund |
Ocean of Love(2) is filled || 4 ||
(1) Samadhi is experiencing that I am Super soul to rise from this experience is experiencing that we are in this world
(2) Experience that I and the whole world is Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
अवधूतदर्शन जाहलें ।। मिथ्या जन्ममरण फिटलें ।।धृ०।।
 शब्दांची लिही पुसिली ।। मायाकल्पित नाहीं द्वैतभुली ।। मुक्तचि जग दिसलें ।।१।।
 ब्रह्मचि सर्व विलसे ।। गुरुखूण नेणतां झालें पिसें ।। मनेंचि जन बांधिले ।।२।।
 विश्वचि आनंदकंद ।। सहज विलसतो सद्गुरुबालमुकुंद ।। दत्तपदीं मन रतलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Holding self affection in mind become restless in vain |
By words say, ' we are devotees of Preceptor' || Refrain ||
By mouth say ' Living is false ' and suffer sorrows |
Do not know the fact of ' Coming alone going alone '|| 1 ||
Worry in futility, ' My brothers my sister '|
Do not know saying, ' Who is of whom, soul is for pleasure ' || 2 ||
Do not know the mark, ' None is mine I am of none ' |
Do not enjoy peace surrendering to feet of Datt || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
उगीच कां न रहावें ।। आत्मस्वरूपीं रमावें ।।धृ०।।
 वाचाचहूंसी पडली मिठी ।। त्रिपुटी कां भजावें ।।१।।
 नाहीं मनासी रीघचि तेथें ।। इंद्रियां कां कोंडावें ।।२।।
 ज्ञानविज्ञान पादुका लेउनी ।। दत्तभजनीं नाचावें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Meeting of Avadhut occurred |
False birth and death ended || Refrain ||
Writting of words (1) was wiped out|
No delusion of duality imagined by illusion|
World was seen as emancipated (2)|| 1 ||
Super soul alone manifests all |
Not knowing mark of Preceptor became mad|
People are tied by mind alone || 2 ||
Universe alone is source of pleasure |
Manifests naturally Balmukund Preceptor |
Mind regaled at feet of Datt || 3 ||
(1) Fate written on forehead by God
(2) World is Super soul only which is emancipated

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ब्रह्मसागरीं लवणमीन मी ।। असुनी नाहीं जाहलों ।।धृ०।।
 प्रपंची मी परमार्थी मी ।। जनदृष्टीं दिसलों ।।१।।
 पाहूं जातां अगम्य मी ।। भक्तिसी विकलों ।।२।।
 आत्मस्वरूपीं रमलों सदा ।। दत्तभजनीं नटलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Why not stay purpose less |
Shall regale in form of self || Refrain ||
Four speeches (1) embraced each other |
Why pray in Triputi (2) || 1 ||
There, Mind has no entry at all (3)|
Why besiege organs || 2 ||
Wearing footrests of Knowledge and Science (4) |
Shall dance in Prayer of Datt (5)|| 3 ||
Note : This is narration of experience of being Super soul
(1) In this state the four stages of speech Para-Padhyanti-Madhyama-Vaikhari cease and could not express
(2) The object of prayer, person praying and the prayer have become Super Soul
(3) In this state mind stops functioning
(4) Knowledge self imbibed is science.
( 5)The transactions of world is Prayer of Datt

ma.Pad_English: aahe mhno tri kaay mi daavun
ma.Pad_Language: आहे म्हणो तरी काय मी दावूं
ma.Lyrics_Language:
आहे म्हणों तरी काय मी दावूं ।। नाहीं म्हणों तरी सर्वही आहे ।।धृ०।।
 जड म्हणों तरी चैतन्यचि ।। स्वरूपीं भेद न राहे ।।१।।
 एक म्हणों जातां अनेक तेंचि ।। द्वैत त्यासी बिहे ।।२।।
 दत्ताविणें आणिक न दिसे ।। ब्रह्मस्वरूपीं पाहे ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
In ocean of Super soul I am fish of salt |
Existing I became non existing || Refrain ||
I was seen in Mundane affairs, in Self Realization |
In eyes of people || 1 ||
Observing I am not understandable |
Am sold to Devotion || 2 ||
Always I regaled in form of Self |
Pranked in Prayer of Datt || 3 ||
Gist : I have realised that I am Super Soul. Now I am in mundane affairs for sake of people. Otherwise I have merged in Super Soul.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
आकाशीं अवधूतरूपाचा ।। झेंडा रोविला ।।धृ०।।
 त्रिपुटीचा घातचि करूनियां ।। खेळ मांडिला ।।१।।
 शास्त्रांची भीड तोडुनियां ।। पंथ धरियेला ।।२।।
 विषयासी सारुनियां दुरी ।। आनंद भोगीला ।।३।।
 दत्तासी हृदयीं सांठवितां ।। प्रेमा उदेला ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
If I say I exist, what shall I show|
If I say I do not exist, every thing is there 
|| Refrain ||
If I say Immovable, still it is energy only|
No distinction remains in Form of Super soul || 1 ||
Saying one, same is many |
Duality fears it(1) || 2 ||
Observe! Excluding Datt nothing else is seen|
In the form of Super Soul || 3 ||
(1) Super soul is everything hence the different forms of living entities melt before it. So it is said that duality fears the omnipresent. Other examples also are similar

ma.Lyrics_Language:
ब्रह्मानंदलहरी उठती वरी वरी ।। चुकली ही लहरी संसाराची ।।१।।
 जीवशिवभ्रांति समूळ मावळली ।। बंधमोक्षा झाली गति तीचि ।।२।।
 पाप पुण्य स्वर्ग नर्क तेही खोटे ।। शुद्ध ब्रह्म नेटें विलसे सदा ।।३।।
 परमपुरुष जगीं एकलाची नांदे ।। दत्त स्वात्मानंदें भजन करी ।।४।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
In the sky Flag is imbeded |
In form of Avadhut ||Refrain ||
Performing destruction of Triputi(1) |
Play is organised (1) || 1 ||
Breaking awe of Shastras |
Path is adhered (2)|| 2 ||
Pushing away sensual objects |
Pleasure is enjoyed || 3 ||
Holding in heart Datt |
Love has dawned (3) || 4 ||
(1) Removing distinction of Preceptor, Devotee and devotion the Devotion is organised
(2) Path of Avadhut
(3) On contemplation of Datt in Heart experience of being Super soul has dawned.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य तूं ज्ञानी काय मौज करिसी ।। असुनी व्यवहारीं अलिप्त रहासी ।।धृ०।।
 जैसी उपाधि तैसें रूप ।। धरूनी अकलंक सदा अससी ।।१।।
 धर्माधर्मीं होउनी सम ।। पापपुण्या नाकळसी ।।२।।
 सद्गुरुशिष्य होउनी तुचि ।। दत्त डुलतो निजप्रेमरसीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Waves of pleasure of being Super soul arise often |
Fondness of mundane affairs is missed
||Refrain ||
Delusion of Living entity and Shiva is vanished from buds |
Same was fate of Bonding and Salvation || 1 ||
Sin, Virtue, Heaven, Hell also are false|
Always is manifested firmly, pure Super soul || 2 ||
In the world, Super Soul dwells alone |
Pant performs prayer in pleasure of self (1)|| 3 ||
(1) Being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
स्वांतराम गुरुभक्त पाहीं ।। नित्य रमतो सद्गुरुपायीं ।।धृ०।।
 शब्दरूप दूर करूनी ।। खेळे सदा त्या आनंदडोहीं ।।१।।
 नाहीं त्या बंध मोक्ष कैंचा ।। विधिनिषेध नुरलें कांहीं ।।२।।
 धन्य सद्गुरु बालावधूत ।। दत्तभजनीं नित्य प्रेम पाहीं ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
You are great, enlightened, what feats You perform |
Being in transactions remain unattached from them || Refrain ||
Holding form as per the roll |
You always remain blotfree || 1 ||
Becoming equable in Religious and irreligious things |
Does not get known of Sin and Virtue( 1 ) 
|| 2 ||
Yourself becoming Preceptor Disciple |
Datt (Pant) Swings in juice of Love (2)|| 3 ||
(1) Sin Virtue do not atrach to your deeds
(2) Pleasure of experience that I myself am Super Soul and am praying myself (Super Soul).

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गूढ सद्गुरु केवीं वर्णूं ।। परा लाजली ।।धृ०।।
 कवण्या रूपें पाहूं कोठें ।। दृष्टी मावळली ।।१।।
 अंतरीं ध्यान तुझें करितां ।। बुद्धि निमाली ।।२।।
 द्वैताद्वैत परता अवधूत ।। दत्ताची माउली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See Devotee of Preceptor rests in Self(1)|
Always regales at feet of Preceptor 
|| Refrain ||
Pushing away form of words |
Always plays in that lake of pleasure (2)
|| 1 ||
He does not have bonding(3), how salvation can be |
Did not remain any doable and prohibited things (4)|| 2 ||
Preceptor Balavadhut is great |
Pant sees true love (5) in Prayer || 3 ||
(1) Gets Rest in own form of being Super soul
(2) Beyond the form described by words is the experience of love that everything is Super soul which gives ever pleasure
(3) Imaginary cycle of birth and death resulting from past sins
(4) Super soul manifested all beings. Beings formulate doable and prohibited things, for attainment of Super Soul, which are not applicable to Super soul.
(5) Experience that everything every where is Super soul.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
माझें कांहीं घेसी ना तूं ।। तुझें कांहीं मज न देसी ।।धृ०।।
 अनादि भ्रम तोडुनी सहज ।। कैंचा नेणूं सद्गुरु होसी ।।१।।
 नाहीं प्रपंच परमार्थ कैंचा ।। शिष्यगुरूची लीला दाविशी ।।२।।
 स्फूर्तिसाक्षी बालावधूत ।। प्रेमसागरीं दत्ता बुडविशी ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Misterious Preceptor How shall I describe |
Para speech shied away || Refrain ||
Where shall I see in what form |
Vision subsided || 1 ||
Contemplating upon You inside |
Intellect ceased || 2 ||
Avadhut is beyond duality and non duality |
Mother of Pant || 3 ||

ma.Lyrics_Language:
टाकुनी परा मागें आली ।। भजन गुरूचें केलें ।।धृ०।।
 वाचमनासी चोरी करूनी ।। निजसुख देखिलें ।।१।।
 साक्षीभाव कळुनी परता ।। प्रेमखेंव दिधलें ।।२।।
 मौन धरितां बालमुकुंदपदीं ।। दत्तप्रेम उदेलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
You do not take anything of mine |
Do not give me anything yours || Refrain ||
Severing effortlessly original delusion (1)|
How You are Preceptor I do not know || 1 ||
No Mundane affairs, How can Self Realization be (2)|
You demonstrate feat of Disciple Preceptor || 2 ||
Balavadhut is witness to inspiration(3)|
You submerge Datt in ocean of love (4)
|| 3 ||
(1) Delusion that I am Living entity different from Super Soul
(2) Mundane affairs and Self Realization do not exist in Super soul
(3) Balavadhut is different from inspiration, He is reason of inspiration
(4) Experience that I am the omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
हंसूं येतें मज हंसूं येतें ।।धृ०।।
 पुत्र गुरूचे होउनी जन ।। त्रिविधताप भोगितें ।।१।।
 तत्वमसिबोध ऐकुनी गुरुमुखें ।। बध्द आपणां मानितें ।।२।।
 दत्तगुरूसी जाउनी शरण ।। साधनीं श्रमतें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Giving away, Para speech came back (1)|
Prayer of Preceptor is performed(2)|| Refrain ||
Stealing from speech and mind (3)|
Witnessed true happiness || 1 ||
Realizing Role of witness(4) |
Gave embrace of Love to Super soul (5)|| 2 ||
Holding silence at feet of Balmukund |
Love (5) of Datt dawned || 3 ||
(1) When I became Super soul my speech stopped function and came back.
(2) All transactions became prayer
(3) In the state of Super soul speech and mind stopped.
(4) Realization that I am the Super soul witnessing all things inside out
(5) Experience of being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
सत्यचि पाहीं गुरुपुत्र मी झालों ।।धृ०।।
 पुत्र पिता भेद व्यर्थचि पाहीं ।। स्वस्वरूपीं रमलों ।।१।।
 तेव्हां नाहीं त्रिपुटी ।। सहज विलसलों ।।२।।
 सत्यज्ञानानंत ब्रह्मचि होउनी ।। दत्तभजनीं रतलों ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Made to laugh, I am made to laugh II Refrain II
People becoming children of Preceptor I
Suffer troubles of Bhava (1) II 1 II
Listening from Preceptor's Mouth teaching of TATVAMASI (2) I
Consider themselves Bound(3) II 2 II
Surrendering to Preceptor Datt I
Labor in means of penance (4) II 3 II
(1) Cycle of birth and deatj
(2) You are that (Super soul) TAT+TVAM+ASI 
(3) Bond of death and rebirth due to past and present sins
(4) Karmas, Worship, Yog Mudra Tapasyaa

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य हा बालावधूत ।। योगक्षेमाची चिंता वाहतो सतत।।धृ०।। 
 तनु मन धन अर्पितां चरणीं ।। तूर्यपिठावरी नेत ।।१।।
 भाव साक्षीचा गिळुनी आपण ।। केवल रूपें रहात ।।२।।
 निःसंशय ब्रह्मचि आहे ।। दत्त प्रेमें डुलत ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
See! I have really become child of Preceptor II Refrain II
See! Distinction of Son, Father is nugatory I
I regaled in own form (1) II 1 II
Then there was no Triputi (2) I
I manifested without efforts II 2 II
Becoming Truth, Knowledge and eternal Super Soul itself I
I entangled in prayer of Datt II 3 II
(1) Form of Super Soul
(2) The three sections of regaling Regaler, The Form regaled, and regalement.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
मुळींच मी नाहीं मी नाहीं ।। अन्य स्मरूं मी कायी ।। शिव शिव ।।धृ०।। 
 जिकडे तिकडे सद्गुरु नांदे ।। भरला दिशा दाही ।।१।।
 कैवल्यापरी विषयसेवा ।। ब्रह्मानंदडोहीं ।।२।।
 दत्तप्रभु हा सद्गुरु माझा ।। नित्य हृदयीं राही ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This Balavadhut is great l
Always takes care of needs and welfare 
ll Refrain ll
On surrendering body, mind, wealth at feet l
Takes to state of Turya (1) ll 1 ll
Swallowing feeling of witness, Himself l
Stays in original form (2) ll 2 ll
Undoubtedly He is Super Soul only l
Datt swings in Love(3) ll 3 ll
(1) State beyond Deep sleep Where Preceptor is seen everywhere
(2) Form of Super Soul
(3) Experience of being Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरुविणें मजला कांही न दिसे ।। अखंड मज लागलें पिसें ।।धृ०।। 
 अंतरीं पाहतां सद्गुरु नांदे ।। बाहेरी पाहतां तोचि दिसे ।।१।।
 नाहीं तयाविणें विश्वीं कांहीं ।। विश्वरूपें तोचि विलसे ।।२।।
 बालावधूत सद्गुरु साचा ।। डुलतो दत्त प्रेमरसें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
I am not there, I am not there at all l
What other shall I Remember (1) l Shiv Shiv ll Refrain ll
Where we see there Preceptor dwells l
Has filled in ten directions ll 1 ll
In lake of pleasure of being Super Soul l
Service of sensual objects is like Kaivalya (2) ll 2 ll
This lord Datt is my Preceptor l
Always stays in Heart ll 3 ll
(1) I have Surrendered to Super soul, there is nothing other than it. Whom shall I Remember
(2) Salvation Kaivalya and sensual objects are both lower than being Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
गुरुमय जाहली ही वृत्ति ।। सहज बुडली संसृति ।।धृ०।। 
 त्रिपुटीसी नाहीं थारा ।। कोण पुसे संसारा ।। सर्वांठायीं निश्चिंति ।।१।।
 अहंकृति निमाली ।। गुरुपदीं रमली ।। अखंड स्वरूपप्रीति ।।२।। 
 असुनी मी नाहीं झालों ।। गुरुस्वरूपीं मिळलों ।। अवधूत भजनीं रति ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Nothing other than Preceptor appears to Me I
Forever I have taken up frenzy II Refrain II
Observing internally Preceptor dwells I
Observing externally He only appears II 1 II
Nothing excluding Him is In the world I
In the form of Universe He only Manifests II 2 II
Balavadhut is True Preceptor I
Datt Swings in Experience of Love (1) II 3 II
(1) Experience that I am the omnipresent Super Soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
धन्य हा जन्म माझा ।। धन्य धन्यत्व वरिलें ।। अवधूत भेटला हो ।। स्वानंद चाखियले ।।धृ०।। 
 सहज मी संसारी ।। गुरुभजनीं दिसलों ।। गुरुकृपा काय सांगूं ।। वाचें बोलतां नये ।। अहंभाव टाकूनी दृढतर रमलों ।।१।। 
 गुरूसी शरण जातां ।। मन हें उन्मन जाहलें ।। नाहीं भवाची वार्ता ।। चिंताही मावळली ।। तटस्थ मी जाहलों ।।२।।
 स्वानंदसागरीं ।। प्रेमें दिधली बुडी ।। अवधूतकृपा मोठी ।। नये बोलतां बोली ।। बालमुकुंदसंगें ।। सहज क्रीडा ही केली ।। कर्तृत्व मावळलें ।। दत्त भक्तमाउली ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Notion is filled with Preceptor l
Living is sunk without efforts ll Refrain ll
No place exists for Triputi (1) l
Who enquires about Mundane affairs l
Worry free State in all places ll 1 ll
Self pride is ceased l
Regaled at Preceptor's feet l
Permanent affection of form of self ll 2 ll
Existing I became non existent l
Merged in form of Preceptor l
Enchantment in prayer of Avadhut ll 3 ll
(1) Performer, Performance, and Object

ma.Lyrics_Language:
घेउनी मस्तकीं शब्दभारा ।। केवीं जासी नि:शद्वघरा ।।धृ०।। 
 निर्विकल्प स्वरूप असतां ।। भुलसी व्यर्थ मनबाजारा।।१।। 
 ध्येय ध्यान ध्याता नाहीं ।। व्यर्थ दाविसी तर्कपसारा ।।२।।
 वाचामनासी देउनी रजा ।। दत्तचरणीं नित्य करी थारा ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
This my birth is Great! I
I have reached great Greatness I
I Have met Avadhut I
I have tasted pleasure of own self (1) II Refrain II
I am seen in Prayer of Preceptor while in Mundane affairs I
What grace of Preceptor shall I tell I
Can not be spoken by Tongue I
Shunning away Self Pride I
I regaled much deeply II 1 II
On surrendering to Preceptor I
This Mind became Sublime (2) I
No news of Bhava (3) I
Worries too ceased I
I became Aloof II 2 II
In Ocean of pleasure of Own Self I
I gave dive in Love (4) I
grace of Avadhut is great I
Can not be spoken in words I
In company of Balmukund I
This act is effortlessly done I
Pride of action has vanished I
Datt is mother of Devotees II 3 II
(1) Super Soul
(2) Reached state of Unmani beyond Turya where mind lost its properties.
(3) Cycle of Birth and Death
(4) Experience of being the omnipresent Super soul

ma.Lyrics_Language:
त्या नरा गुरु चुकला ।। निजशांतीसी मुकला ।।धृ०।।
 देहाभिमान दृढ धरूनी ।। विषया जो विकला ।।१।।
 श्रुत्यागम पढुनी शहाणा ।। स्वरूपीं दुरावला ।।२।।
 अनन्य भजतां दत्तचरण ।। ब्रह्मानंदी भरला ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
Holding on head burden of words l
How will You go to Home of Wordless (1)
ll Refrain ll
Form of Super soul being free of doubts, scruples l
In vain you get bewitched by transactions of mind ll 1 ll
No object to contemplate, no contemplater, no contemplation l
In futility you demonstrate clutter of reasonings ll 2 ll
Giving leave to speech and mind l
Make permanent stay at feet of Datt(2)ll 3 ll
(1) Super soul is not explainable in words, it has to be experienced
(2) Surrendering to feet of Datt You will experience the Super Soul beyond speech mind and reasoning.

ma.Lyrics_Language:
दत्तावधूतचरण धरियले ।। स्वानंदी मन तैंचि रमलें ।।धृ०।।
 नाठवे निदसुरे बंधमोक्ष ।। सहज शांतीचें सुख वरिलें ।।१।।
 नाहीं करणें नाहीं मिळविणें ।। कर्तृत्वासी बिंदुलें पडलें ।।२।।
 सहजानंद सहज भोगितां ।। दत्तावधूतप्रेम उदेलें ।।३।।
ma.Lyrics_English:
That man missed Preceptor l
Lost true peace(1) ll Refrain ll 
Who firmly holding pride of body l
Is sold to sensual objects ll 1 ll
Wise man reading Vedas Upanishads l
Estranged from own form ll 2 ll
On praying feet of Datt with ananya(2)faith l
Is filled with pleasure of being Super soul
ll 3 ll
(1) Peace achieved with Experience that I am the omnipresent Super Soul with absence of worries and fear
(2) Faith that Datt is the only saviour

ma.Lyrics_Language:
वाहे योगक्षेमचिंता ।। सद्गुरुबालावधूत ।।धृ०।।
 नाही घोर संसृतीचा ।। झालों मी निश्चिंत ।।१।।
 वचन गुरूचे नढळे कधीं ।। झालीया सृष्टिअंत ।।२।।
 अंतर्बाह्य तोची नांदे ।। नुरली द्वैतमात ।।३।।
 ब्रह्मानंदें खेळवी दत्ता ।। भजनी डुलतो सतत ।।४।।

अखंड चिति लागली पाठी ।। सोडुनी राहीना ।।धृ०।।
 जनी विजनीं अंतरी बाहेरी ।। घालिते आवरणा ।।१।।
 उठतां बसतां सवें तीचि ।। झोंबली अंतःकरणा ।।२।।
 बालावधूत चिच्छाक्ति ही ।। दत्त सदा ध्याना ।।३।।

दत्त ध्यावा निजध्यानीं ।।धृ०।।
 वाचामनातीत स्थिति ।। वेद म्हणती "नेति नेति" ।। बोधलय हा निरंजनीं ।।१।।
 बंध मोक्ष व्यर्थ कल्पिती ।। गुरुशिष्यमार्ग वाढविती ।। नसती चाळे चिभ्दुवनीं ।।२।।
 ब्रह्म विश्वरूपें विलसे ।। पाहतां द्वैत कांहीं नसे ।। दत्त स्वानंदजननी ।।३।।

सर्वींसर्व सद्गुरुवास ।। द्वैत किमपि नसे ।।धृ०।। 
 आदि अंत तो मध्यही तो ।। जगद्रुपें दिसे ।।१।। 
 जीव शिव तो ज्ञानाज्ञान तो ।। परब्रह्मरसी ।।२।। 
 कांहीं नोहुनी अंतर्बाह्य ।। दत्तगुरु विलसे ।।३।।

माझा मीचि सर्वांठायीं ।। मजवांचुनी आणिक नाहीं ।।धृ०।। 
 भोग्य भोक्ता भोग मीचि ।। आनंद तो दुजा नाहीं ।।१।।
 दृश्य द्रष्टा दर्शन मीचि ।। त्रिपुटीप्रकाशक पाहीं ।।२।।
 गुरु शिष्य बोध मीचि ।। दत्तविलास प्रेमडोहीं ।।३।।

शब्दाचा बाजार ।। सर्व शब्दाचा बाजार ।।धृ०।। 
 शब्दचि जन्म शब्दचि मरण ।। शब्दचि येरझार ।।१।।
 धर्माधर्म बंधमोक्ष ।। शब्दाचा व्यवहार ।।२।।
 समाधि उत्थान सद्गुरुशिष्य ।। दत्त परात्पर ।।३।।

दत्तपदीं मम मति जडली ।। तैं चिंता सर्व मावळली ।।धृ०।। 
 मातापिता दत्त माझा ।। बंधुबहीण हीचि जाहली ।।१।।
 बंधमोक्षवार्ता निमली ।। कैवल्याची मूर्ति देखियली ।।२।।
 धन्य दत्त धन्य अवधूत ।। धन्य मनीं मात जाहली ।।३।।

सद्गुरुनें मज मुक्ति दिधली ।। शब्दभ्रांति समूळ गेली ।।धृ०।। 
 प्रेमभरें आपुला म्हणविलें ।। योगक्षेमाची निश्चिंति झाली ।।१।।
 जनदृष्टीसी द्वैत दिसतें ।। सदा विलास तूर्यमहालीं ।।२।।
 ब्रह्मानंदाची सुगी जाहली ।। प्रेमळ माझी दत्तमाउली।।३।।

सद्गुरुनें मज जोग दिला रे ।। मोक्षमार्ग हा सोपा केला रे ।।धृ०।।
 विरति विभूति अंगी चर्चियेली ।। ऐक्यबोध सोटा हातीं दिला रे ।।१।।
 श्रुत्युक्तिअनुभव कक्षीं झोळी ।। सहज सिद्धांत सैली गळा रे ।।२।।
 अन्वयमार्गीं मागुनी भिक्षा ।। जीवन्मुक्त दत्त भला रे ।।३।।

करितो फकिरी ।। नाहीं दिलगिरी ।। सदा अलख निर्वाणी ।।धृ०।।
 घर घर माता घर घर पिता ।। नाहीं सुखासी वाणी ।।१।।
 भक्तिझोळी कक्षीं शोभे ।। वास सदा निरंजनीं ।।२।।
 बालमुकुंद साई माझा ।। दत्ता प्रेमशिराणी ।।३।।

मी फकीर निरंजनवासी ।।धृ०।।
 वैराग्यविभूति अंगीं ।। स्वानंद सदा ही गुंगी ।। रंगलों नित्य निजरंगीं ।। नाहीं पडलों मायापाशीं ।।१।।
 ऐक्यबोधसोटा हातीं धरिला ।। संशय दूरी धाडिला ।। बद्धमुक्तभाव मावळला ।। सदा डुलतों प्रेमरसीं ।।२।।
 हरिहरब्रह्म नाठवती ।। गुरुचरण सदा आठवती ।। द्वारीं लोळे मुक्ति सती ।। दत्तावधूतपदवासी ।।३।।

व्यसनीं मानव बुडाले ।। स्वस्वरूपा विसरले ।।धृ०।।
 विषमचि सत्य मानुनी नित्य ।। त्यामाजीं रंगले ।।१।।
